GSP29nvtp1_1u:1: mātaḥ sarasvati punaḥ punaraṣa natvā baddhāñjaliḥ kimapi vijñapayāmyavaihi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2: vākcetasormama tathā bhava sāvadhānā vācaspatervacasi na skhalato yathaite //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3: viśvārādhya ityatra viśvaśabdena saṃsāricetanavargo vivakṣitaḥ, tasyaiva tadārādhakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:11: viśvamūrtirityatra yāvatkārakagrāmaḥ, tasyaiva sākṣāt tatprayatnādhiṣṭheyatayā asmadādiśarīrasamānatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:12: ata eva na tatra śarīrāntarāpekṣā, sākṣātprayantānadhiṣṭheyeṣu hi sā syāt daṇḍādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:14: pinākīti tu viśiṣṭaśastradhāradhamittaka nāmasaṃkortanena prārabdhavighnasya protsāraṇameva samīhitamiti sūcayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:16: yathāvasthitayojanāyāṃ tu arthapaunarūktyaprasarktā stutitvameva samādhānamadhyavaseyam iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:30: tā etāḥ kathaṃ bhūtendriyajayino mahāmunerbhaviṣyanti? ajitabhūtasya hi vivakṣostathāvidhaprayatnāniṣpatternirabhidheyā vāk bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:33: etāśca vacasāmaviśuddhīḥ chalajātinigrahasthāneṣu sūtrakāra eva prapañcayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:34: so 'yaṃ na tatheti bhavati vāgviśuddhīnāṃ nidhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:36: evaṃ parāparagurūn natvā śiṣyabuddhisamādhānāya samāhitavaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayati--grantheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:37: nanu tātparyaṭīketi vadatā pravṛttipāṭavārthaṃ granthasaṃkṣepo darśitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:38: na ca śiṣyāṇāṃ kathantāsaṃboghavidhurāṇāṃ rāddhāntamātraparigrahaḥ saṃkṣepato vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:42: nanvevaṃ granthatātparyāṃ vyākhyeyam, dūṣaṇāni ca nirasyānīti punarapi granthagauravamityata āha--granthavyākhyācchalenaiveti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:44: nibandhāstathāvidhāḥ santīti kṛtamanene ityata āha-- icchāmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:45: nanu yadi granthakārasaṃpradāyavicchedena te nibandhāḥ, kathaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:46: kunibandhāḥ? atha saṃpradāyo vicchinnaḥ, kathaṃ tavāpīyaṃ vicchinnasaṃpradāyā tātparyaṭīkā sunibandha ityata āha--atijaratīnāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:49: kiṃ nāmātra trilocanaguroḥ sakāśādupadeśarasāyanamāsāditamamūṣāṃ punarnavībhāvāya dīyata iti yujyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:50: na ca kunibandhapaṅkamagnānāṃ taddātumucitamatastasmādutkṛṣya svanibandhasthale sanniveśanarūpasamuddharaṇameva sāṃpratamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:51: tatra bhagavato 'kṣapādasya muniṣu madhye pravaratvaṃ śrutyādibhya eva suprasiddham kimanena saṃkīrtanena? na caitadatiśayena sāṃpratamupayujyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:53: tenāpi kiṃ prakaṭitena? svanibandhasya tadviṣayatāpi tadvyākhyānādeva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:55: kiṃ tayāpi kathitayā? na cāsya nyāyamahodadherūttānatāpratibhāsa evāgrataḥ kartumucitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:59: taditi digrāgādisamutthāpitaṃ śāstrācchādakaṃ kuhetusaṃtamasamapaneyatvena parāmṛśatā śāstrasyaivāyaṃ nibandha iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:60: bhāṣyasya ca tadvivaraṇarūpasya śāstraśarīrarūpatayā na śāstrādādhikyaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:63: etena śāstrasya yo nibandho bhāṣyagranthaḥ sa kutārkikājñānanivṛttihetuḥ kariṣyata iti vyākhyānaṃ ṭīkāvirodhenopekṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:64: nanu sūtroktaprayojanānuvādaḥ punaḥ kimartham? na hīdamanūdya kiñcid
GSP29nvtp1_1u:65: vidheyaṃ pratiṣedhyaṃ veha vidyate ityata āha--sūtreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:66: atha svanibandhasya prayojanavattāpradarśanena kiṃ siddhyatītyata āha--prekṣāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:68: ato vyutpādanapravṛttau vyutpattirevāmīṣāṃ prayojanamiti kimapareṇa prayojanenetyata āha--vyutpādamātrasyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:69: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanaṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇa ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:72: tatra mukhyārthinaḥ tatsādhānamabhyarthayamānāḥ tatra pravartanta iti tadapi prayojanamevati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:73: ato mukhye prayojane sati gauṇaṃ prayojanam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:75: na ca svātantryeṇaivāsya mukhyaṃ prayojanamastītyato yasyedamaṅga tasya mukhyaṃ prayojanamastīti darśite prekṣāvān pravarttito bhavatītyabhisandhiḥ vārttikakṛta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:78: na hi bhāṣyasya svātantryeṇa mukhyaṃ prayojanamasti yena vārttikaṃ tadaṅgatāmiyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:80: nanu karmendriyaniyamaḥ śama iti suprasiddhaṃ śānto dānta ityādi upaniṣatsu, na cāsau puruṣārthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:81: ato na mukhyaṃ prayojanamityata āha--atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:83: na tāvat kaścit jagadupacikīrṣuḥ kvacit pravartate yato munerapi tathātvaṃ saṃbhāvayāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:88: tasya ca rūpāṇi śamadamādisaṃpattiḥ nityānityavivekaḥ aihikāmuṣmikabhāgavairāgyaṃ mumukṣutā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:89: yastu anadhikāryeva pravartate karmakāṇḍa iva brahmakāṇḍe sa na phalabhāg bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:95: iha cāpavarga iva tadarthatayā tattvajñānamapyupeyameva, asiddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:96: upāyastu pramāṇam, na ca vedādhyayanavadanumānasya pratyakṣasya copādānaṃ śūdrādikaṃ prati niṣiddham, yena tatrāpyetasyānadhikāraḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:97: tathā sati dhūmādapi vahimadhigacchan pratyakṣād vā pratyavāyī syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:99: na cātmagocare pratyakṣānumāne śūdrāderviśeṣato niṣiddhe snātasya caṇḍāladarśanamiva brāhmaṇādeḥ prāyaścittānupadeśāt pratyuta striyo vaiśyāstathā śūdrā ye cānye pāpayonayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:101: tasmād yathā sa eva viśiṣṭaḥ svargo vaidikayāgādyanadhikṛtenāpi upāyāntareṇa traivarṇikaśuśrūṣādinā sādhyate, tathopāyānteṇānumānādinā yadyātmādhigamaḥ kriyate śūdreṇāpi, tadā kīdṛśo doṣaḥ? satyam, kiṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:107: tasmādāgamaikavākyatayā pravṛtte śāstre tadadhikāryevādhikārīti śūdrādayo 'nadhikṛtā iva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:110: santyeva hi kecit karuṇāmṛdumanaso yeṣāṃ jagadeva mitram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:113: sā ca yathaikaṃ duḥkhita paśyato bhavati, tathā jagadeva duḥkhita paśyataḥ kiṃ na syāt? bhavati cet--tatprahāṇopāyapravṛttau kā nāmānupapattiḥ? nanu karuṇārdrahṛdayo 'pyaṃ vyutpisumeva vyutpādayenna tu viparītam, na hi badhireṣu gāyano gāyatītyata āha--tatra yadi na kaściditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:114: na hi rogī mandabhāgyatayā carakādyupadeśe na pravartata iti tadarthatā tasya nivartata ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:115: nanvanadhikṛtavyutpādane pratyavāyamātrakamapaśyannayaṃ kathamavadheyavacanaḥ syāt, paśyan vā na pravarteta? kāruṇikatayā paśyannapi pravartate cet, pramādī syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:116: tathā ca paralokādabibhyato 'sya vacane kaḥ śraddhāsyatītyata āha--na ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:117: yadyapi prahīnamohatvādevāsya pāpapuṇyayorutpattireva nāsti, vakṣyati hi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:119: tathāpi kleśahānerdurūhatvāt pratyavāyotpattimabhyupagamya tadabhāvāya tapaḥprabhāva uktaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:122: na hi gāḥ paṅkamagnāḥ paṅkapralepabhayādanukampāparavaśāḥ samarthā noddharanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:124: nanu yadyanadhikṛtaḥ kathaṃ phalabhāgī, tathā cet kathamanadhikṛta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:126: yathā hi teṣāṃ tapaḥprabhāvādevaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyante, tathā tapaḥprabhāvādeva satyasaṃkalpatayā anadhikāriṇo 'pi phalabhāgina iti na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:130: anadhikṛtena tu kṛtaṃ karma viguṇaṃ sanna phalāṃya paryāptamityapi na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:132: yājaka eva tvayājyaṃ yājayan pratyavāyamāsādayet, rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇanniva vidvān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:133: sa ca tīvratadeṇa tapasaiva vilīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:134: tarhi mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:135: iti nyāyena vayamapyanadhikṛtān vyutpādayāma ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:136: nanu kutārkikāṇāmajñānaṃ nivartayatā kimanena śāstrasyopakṛtaṃ syādityāha--kutārkikairiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:138: iha karmārambhe prārabdhasyāntarāyaviraheṇa parisamāpti kāmayamānā abhīṣṭadevatā namaskārapūrvakaṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:139: dṛśyate ca tatra tatra bahuśoṃ vyabhicāraḥ kṛtanamaskārasyāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:143: itivat prārabdhaparisamāptikāmo devatāṃ namaskuryāditi śrutirasti, yena vyabhicore 'pi karmakartṛsādhanavaiguṇyaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:144: tasmādar thakāma iha vaṭe prativasantaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjayeditiva daprāmāṇikaprasiddhivijṛmbhitametadityabhisandhāya kimu na kṛto vāttikakṛtā iṣṭadevatānamaskāra ityata āha--avigīteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:145: pratyakṣamivāvigītaśiṣṭācāro 'pi śrutisadbhāve pramāṇameva, nirmūlasya ca śiṣṭācārasyāsambhavāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:150: yadyavaṃ kimanena na kṛta ityata āha--parameti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:151: yadi kṛtaḥ tat kimindraluptena gataḥ, yena na dṛśyata ityata āha--na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:156: na ca tanniveśanavyatirekeṇa te grāhitāḥ syurityata āha--maṅgalyāntara
GSP29nvtp1_1u:160: nanu daṇḍakasūtrasyānuvādo nāstītyata uktaṃ saṃkṣepata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:161: nanvādisūtratvamasya suprasiddhameva, abhisaṃbandhavākyatvāt, tatkimanena udīritenetyata āha--ādigrahaṇeneti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:162: nanu śāstraniḥśreyasayoranena saṃbandho varṇyate, tataḥ saṃbandhavākyamidamiti yuktam, abhistu kimarthamityata āha--abhimata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:165: na hi vācakād vācyapratītervācyasya niṣpattiḥ, yato mumukṣurvācake pravartatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:168: nanu nātra śāstram, tasya niḥśreyasahetutvaṃ vā śrūyata ityata āha--pramāṇādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:170: yadyapi śiṣyate anuśiṣyate pramāṇādikamaneneti śāstramiti vyutpattyā atrāpi kāraṇatā gamyate, tathāpi śāsakasaṃbaddhavyāpāravattayā, na tu śiṣyasaṃbaddhavyāpāravattayā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:172: anyathā pramāṇādīni tattvato jñātvāpi tāvanna mucyate yāvannānuśiṣyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:174: nanu hetutvakaraṇatve na viṣayabhedena bhavitumarhata ityata āha--teneti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:176: kiṃ tu padārthatattve jñāpakatayā niḥśreyase tadvyāpāravataḥ karaṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:178: evaṃ ca sati śāstrasya niḥśreyase karttavye padārthatattvajñānasya nirūktibalena vyāpāratve darśite vyāpāravyāpāriṇoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:179: tathā vyāpāravatā śāstreṇa vyāpāraviṣayasya pramāṇādeḥ pratipādyapratipādakabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:180: tathā vyāpāraviṣayeṇa pramāṇādinā vyāpārasya tattvajñānasya viṣayaviṣayībhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:181: tathā vyāpāreṇa tattvajñānena vyāpārulasya niḥśreyasasya kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:183: na hyataddhetukastadvacāpāro nāma, nāpyatatkarma tadvacāpāraviṣayaḥ, nāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:184: tatphalānanuguṇastadvacāpāraḥ, tadvacāpāraviṣayo veti pajcasu vaktavyeṣu upalakṣaṇārthaṃ dvayamāha--śāstrapramāṇāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:185: enameva vyutpattilabhyaṃ vyāpāramabhipretya tattvasya jñānamiti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī bhāṣyakāreṇa darśiteti na karaṇavyutpattirvirūddhā //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:186: nanu śiṣyācāryaśāstratadvyākhyānānāmapi saṃbandhāḥ kaiścit samānatāntrikaiḥ pradarśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:189: kiṃ nāma? yāvatyapratipādite prekṣāvatpravṛttirna syāt, tāvat pradarśyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:190: na ca śiṣyācāryādisaṃbandhāḥ prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgam, teṣāṃ pravṛttiphalatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:191: pravṛttyuttarakālaṃ hi śiṣyaḥ pratipādyaḥ, pratipādakaścācāryaḥ, śāstraṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:192: vyākhyeyam, vyākhyātā ca sa ityādi sidhyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:195: tasmāt prayojanamabhidhayaṃ tayoḥ saṃbandho 'bhidheyastaddvārā śāstrasya prayojanena saṃbandha ityetadarthatveme prathamasūtrasya nyāyyamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:196: nanu yasya mithyājñānaṃ saṃsāraṃ pratanoti tasyaiva tattvajñānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:197: niḥśreyasahetuḥ, ātmā ca tathā, tadanyeṣāṃ tu śāstrābhidheyānāmapi na niḥśreyasahetutvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:198: tathā ca na niḥśreyasasaṃbandhaḥ ityata āha--yatpadārtheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:199: nanu pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānasya yadi niḥśreyasahetutā śāstrapravṛtteḥ pūrvameva pramāṇasiddhā niṣprayojanaṃ śāstre prayojanābhidhānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:204: na ca pravṛtteḥ prāgeva munivacanānniścinoti, prathamasūtra eva prayojanāniścayena pravṛttyanupapatteḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:209: tridhā hi puṃsāṃ cittavṛttayaḥ, anubhava icchā prayatnaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:211: icchā tu puruṣārthe svarasotthitā, tatsādhane ca tathātvānumānotthāpyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:215: phalagocarā vā icchā pravṛttiḥ, cena tayorapi prayojananiścayāpekṣā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:218: nāpi mumukṣuṇānapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:219: puruṣārthasādhane tvicchālakṣaṇā vā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttirna svarasasiddhā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:220: na hi kaścit kṣudhī duḥkhaprahāṇaṃ tṛptisauhityasukha vā ananusaṃdhāyānnamattumicchati prayatate vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:221: tasmād yatra yaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ sa tatsādhyamarthaṃ daśayitvā, yataśca yo nivartayitavyaḥ sa tatsādhyamanarthaṃ darśayitveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:223: tattu śrotā kathaṃ śraddhāsyati, aśraddadhāno vā kathaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:231: sa ca prayojanaviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakametadabhidhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:236: tadidaṃ prayojanasya pravartakatvamuddeśyatayā, na tu pravṛttiviṣayatayā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:238: nanu munerāptatvāniścaye kiṃ tadvacane pravṛttirnāstyeva? tathā sati tasyāptatvaniścayo 'pi kathamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:241: nanu saṃśayānasya kathaṃ prekṣāvataḥ pravṛttiritya āha--na khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:242: yadyapi ca sasyādhigamasya kṛṣyādisādhyatayā saṃśayo nāsti, tathāpi bhaviṣyattayā astyeva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:244: yathā ca tatra śataikāṃśikaḥ phalābhāvaḥ phalakoṭistūtkaṭā tathātrāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:248: nanu saṃśayaḥ prayojanādivākyābhāve 'pi sulabhaḥ, viśeṣasmṛtistu arthitvaviśeṣāt bhaviṣyatītyāha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:249: yadvacanena hi yaḥ pravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate, na svātantryeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:250: na hi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ bhavenna veti yatra tatrocchṛḍkhalaḥ svayamutprekṣya pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:252: anyathā tvayaṃ prayojanābhidhānamanadhigacchan anarthamapyāśaṅketa, kiṃ niṣprayojanamidaṃ kākadantaparīkṣāgranthavat, utāśakyasādhanaprayojanaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:255: mātulakanyakāpariṇayaprakramopadeśavat, athābhimatasyāpi śakyasyāpi prayojanasya laghīyasyupāyāntare satyapi gururayamupāyaḥ pipāsuṃ prati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:259: na hi kaścid vaidyavacanādeva māśaḍkya nivartate yathā svayamutprekṣyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:266: nanvidindrayādīnāmajñāyamānānāmeva svaviṣayaparicchedajanakatvaṃ paśyannapi kathamevaṃ brūyādityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:267: pramāṇatvenājñāyamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ paricchinatti, na tvavadhārayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:271: yadyapi niścayākārameva jñānamādhatte tathāpi tathābhūtasyaiva bhūyo bhūyaḥ prameyaviraholabdherviśeṣānupalabdheśca saṃdehastadavaskandatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:272: tatkiṃ kvacidapyavadhāraṇaṃ nāstyeva? tathā sati toyamevedamityādiko
GSP29nvtp1_1u:273: laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ, tathā pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ kvacidapi viniścayo nāstyevetyādikaścābhimāno viruddhyetetyata āha--api tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:274: yadi kvacit prameyatattvāvadhāraṇaṃ paramārthaḥ, tadā pramāṇatattvāvadhāraṇadvāreṇaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:278: evaṃ copadhidvayāvacchinnāyāḥ sattāyā upādhibhedād bhinnāyā ivaikasminnarthe samavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvayoriva na viruddhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:280: pramāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ tarhi kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadeva hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:296: svato vetyasya svātmanā vā svagrāhakeṇa vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:301: yo hi yad gṛhṇāti sa taddharmamapi gṛhṇīyāditi saṃbhāvyetāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:302: yastu dharmiṇameva nākalayati, tasya dharmagrahaṇavārtāpi kva? yadyapi ca śabdagandhādayo vyomabhūmyādyagrahe 'pi gṛhyante, tathāpi na taddharmatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:304: taddhi mānasaṃ vā syāt laiḍgikaṃ vā? ubhayamapi manaso jñātatālakṣaṇāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:305: liṅgād vā aviśiṣṭāt jāyamānaṃ kathamiva tadābhāsaviśiṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyat?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:306: viṣayaviśeṣāt tu tathātve apramāṇyasyāpi svata eva grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:308: pramāyāḥ prāyikatayā tadvāsanāyāḥ samutkaṭatvādapramāpi samutkaṭatvādapramāpi prametyeva gṛhyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:309: tato bādhakādhīnamevāprāmāṇyamāsaṃjitarajatatāyāmiva śuktikāyāṃ śuktikātvamiti yadi tathāpyāsaṃjakasyāpi yadyāsaṃjakatvamavagataṃ kathaṃ na svato 'prāmāṇyagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:310: tatrāpi prāmāṇyārope tu kathaṃ nānavasthā? na ca kṛtrimaṃ rūpamaparibhūya grahaṇaṃ grahaṇāmityucyate, saṃśayenābhibhūtatvāt māyāliḍgini jhaṭiti parivrājakabuddhivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:312: yadi tu daivād gṛhyate, tadā jñānamityeva; na tu pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:314: nanu yadi svīyāt svata iti na nirvahati, vakṣyamāṇena ca nyāyena nāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:318: na hi tatra kiñcidanavasthādikaṃ paśyāma ityata āha--eteneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:320: kadācit pramāṇavyavahārasauṣṭhavāt svīkriyetāpi yadyayaṃ tena nirvahet, na tvetadasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:321: yathā hi pramāṇaṃ svātmānaṃ gṛhṇat prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇāti tathā tadābhāsamapi tadābhāsatva gṛhṇīyāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:323: na ca tatrāpi pramāṇyāropāt pravṛttiḥ, svātmabhūtasyāpramāṇyasya svasavedanatayā grahaṇe samāropāsaṃbhāvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:331: prātyakṣike ca vahnijñāne prātyakṣikameva vahnijñānāntaramiti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:339: āptopadeśajamapi saṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatyeva jñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:340: so 'yaṃ pramāṇye niścetavye saṃvādo yadyapi vyadhikaraṇastathapyarthatathātvamava dhārayannarthavattvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:343: evaṃ pramātvasya duradhigamatvamāpādya tadāyattāvadhāraṇe pramāṇānāṃ pramāṇatve yojayati--yadā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:344: nanu yadi prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇenaivapravṛttiḥ, tadā saiva sārvalaukikī svata ityādivikalpān phalgūkariṣyati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:345: atha tadavadhāraṇavyatirekeṇāpi pravṛttirapratyūhā tadā māvadhāri prāmāṇyam, kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha--tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:346: vaidikaṃ vyavahāramadhikṛtya cedaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttam, na laukikamityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:356: yadyapi deśāvasthābhede kālabhedo 'pyarthasiddhastathāpi yathākathañcit kālabhedamātraṃ vivakṣitamatreti jñāpanārthaṃ tadgrahaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:357: tathā hi dūrasthe sthāṇau puruṣarpatyayasya kālāntare 'pi visaṃvādo nāsti yāvat na pratipattā nikaṭastho bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:358: pratyetavya eva vā yāvanna nediṣṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:359: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyām arthapratyayasya kālabhede 'pi tāvanna visaṃvādo yāvanna jāgarāvasthānubhavaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:360: na ca vācyamevaṃ sati kiṃ kālabhedagrahaṇeneti, deśāvasthayorabhede 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:361: kālakrameṇāpi kvacid visaṃvādadarśanād yathā sunipuṇanibhālanādāpātajātasya kāmāturakāminījñānasya bhede 'pi kvacit kālāntare visaṃvādāt tadupagrahaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:362: tadanenendriyādīnāṃ kālakramabhāvinaḥ sahakāribhedāḥ sphuṭatarapratītihetavaḥ sarva eva saṃgṛhītāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:363: yadyapi ca pramāraviṣayāveva visaṃvādāvisaṃvādau saṃbhavavyabhicāralakṣaṇau tathāpyavisaṃvādasya dhruvaviṣayatvapratipādanārthaṃ svarūpagrahaṇaṃ sarvasya jñānasya dharmiṇyavisaṃvādāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:365: yadyapi samarthapravṛtti tvādityuktesamañjasaṃ tathāpi pravṛttiryasyeti sambandhe ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:366: sa ca pramāṇapravṛttyorjanyajanakabhāva eveti sa eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:367: nanu na tāvat pramāṇyasamarthapravṛtti janakatvayoravinābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:373: siddhau vā kimanumānena, anumānantarasiddhatve tvanavasthaivetyata āha--yadi punariti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:375: vyatirekī ca sarvatra sapakṣābhāvamabhyupetya pravartata iti nāsādharaṇānaikāntikatā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:376: na ca vācyam etasyaivānumānasyārthavattvānavadhāraṇe kathaṃ pramāṇānāmarthavattvasiddhiḥ? tadavadhāraṇe vā kathaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:379: tatra svaviṣayaparicchede kartavye avinābhāvāvadhāraṇamevāpekṣate na pramākaraṇatvāvadhāraṇamityanavaghṛtaprāmāṇyenaivānena pramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaphalatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhyata iti sarvaṃ sundaram //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:380: etenaitadapi nirastam yat prāmāṇyānavadhāraṇe aprāmāṇyānavadhāraṇamapi katham? prāmāṇyaniścayena hi tat niścīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:382: tathātvāniścayāditi? svarūpato dharmataścānavadhāritenaiva satā pramāṇena svaviṣayaniścayasiddheḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:383: nanu nāstyevāsau vādī yaḥ prāmāṇyāniścaye 'pi vipratipadyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:384: na hi prāmāṇyaṃ svīkṛtya tanniścaye vipratipattiḥ, svīkārasya niścayamūlatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:387: aniścite ca prāmāṇye tadatadrūpasaṃdeho 'pi kvacid durlabhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:393: na ca vikalpanirmite na saṃśayādivyavahāraḥ samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:394: nahi vājiviṣāṇaṃ veti kaścit sandigdhe, nāpi naraviṣāṇamiti kasyacid
GSP29nvtp1_1u:403: svata iti ca taditarasyāpi, svataḥ parataśca prāmāṇyasiddheriti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:406: prāmāṇyādyabhidhānadvārā hi śāstrasya niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ, na tu svarūpeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:407: tato yathā pramāṇāditattvajñānaṃ sādhyatayā prayojanaṃ pratijñāyate tathā pramāṇādyabhidheyatayāpi pratijñeyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:408: yathā athāto dharma vyākhyāsyāmaḥ (vai.sū.1.1.1) iti dharmasya vyākhyeyatvenaiva pratijñā samānatantre na ca tadabhidheyatāpratijñānamatra /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:409: tasmādabhidheyattvāpratijñānānna pramāṇādayaḥ śāstreṇābhidhīyanta iti śrotṛbuddhacanurodhenāśaḍkya sūtrakārahṛdayānurodhena vārttikamuttarayatisyādetaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:410: śiṣyākāṅkṣākrameṇa hi śāstramidaṃ pravṛttam, anapekṣitābhidhāne anavadheyatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:411: na ca śiṣyākāṅkṣā kiṃ vakṣyati bhavāniti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:414: tataḥ kathamiti? tataḥ ke, kati, kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ pramāṇādayaḥ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:419: uktāboddhāraṃ prati tu vyākhyātāro bhavanti, yata evamayamāheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:420: tadanubhavasiddhamapi pramāṇādyabhidhāyakatvaṃ yaḥ kutaścid vyāmohānna pratipadyate taṃ prati vyākhyātā śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:425: tathāpi tacchāstraṃ śreyo 'bhidhatta ityanene kim? atha śreyaḥśabdasya pramāṇādaya evārthaḥ, tarhi śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiriti kimityata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:426: yadyapi śāstra punaḥ puruṣaḥ punaḥ śreyaḥ punariti pratipadaṃ gṛhītvā vivaraṇaṃ prakṣayeṇetyantena sphuṭāvabhāsam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:429: na hi rāgādimantaṃ prati śāstraṃ na sasādhanaṃ śreyo 'bhidhatte /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:430: na ca taṃ prati na tat śreyo yena vītarāgo vivicya gṛhyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:431: tathāpi, tasmāt tat śāstraṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhatta iti madhyapatitopasaṃhāra eva vivaraṇavicchedabhramo mā bhūdityetadarthamavacchinatti--upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyanteneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:432: nanu samūho vyūhaviśiṣṭa ityasaṃgatam, paryāyatvādityata āha--vyūha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:433: te khalvamī samūhāḥ praṇetṛpuruṣecchānurodhinaḥ svārthānurodhino vetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:435: yadyapyekārthapratipādanāvacchinnā varṇāḥ padamityetāvadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tathāpyetadeva lakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāṇāṃ kathamityetaduktam--ekasmṛtisamārūḍhā iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:440: na ca vākyasāmānyamapi padasamūhamātram, gauraścaḥ puruṣo hastītyāderapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:441: vākyatvaprasaṅgādityata āha--evaṃ svārtheti samūho veditavyaḥ sūtratveneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:443: tatra cāvāntarasamūhabhede kāraṇābhāvāt, śāstrameva sūtrasamūharūpaṃ prakaraṇamiti prāptamityata āha--evaṃ kvaciditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:463: nanu ca tatra ekaprakāro 'pi na darśitaḥ, kathaṃ tatra tatra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:465: nanu śāstrasya sasādhanapuruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvaṃ pratijñāya śāstrasvarūpadarśanaṃ kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:467: nanu pratītisiddhaṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ ṣoḍaśatvaṃ kimityanūdyata ityatastannirākaraṇīyām āśaḍkāmāha--nanviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:484: tathāpi na tena te sākṣād viṣayīkriyante pramāṇādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:485: nanu yadi sākṣādupamānasya prakṛtānupayogādanabhidhānam, tarhi śabdo 'bhidhīyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:488: āgamo hi yatra pravartate tadviṣayameva pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā apekṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:489: te tu samūle api na sviṣayapravṛttaṃ pramāṇamapekṣete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:490: tato mūlāsaṃplutaviṣayatvāt te eva darśite ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:491: vainayiketi viśiṣṭo nayaḥ śāstraṃ nyāyaśāstram, tajjanyabuddhivirahiṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:497: vipratipanno 'pi kathāmārabhamāṇo 'pyamumukṣurgalite 'haṅkāre na sāpekṣo bhavatītyato niṣphalo jalpavitaṇḍārambha ityata āha-- śiṣyamāṇasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:506: te 'bhī durlalitāḥ śiṣyā yadi mokṣādāvapi indriyādyapekṣante, tadā kathaṃ pratipādyā ityato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:511: nanvetāvatāpi sāpekṣā anenaiva śāstreṇa pratipādyāḥ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ ceti parasparavyāhatamityata āha--ayamabhisandhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:512: paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ tu jijñāsava iti śeṣe nyāyeneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:513: iha yadyapi sukhaṃ dṛṣṭameva vidhāyakapramāṇagocara eva ahitanivṛttiradṛṣṭaiva niṣedhakapramāṇagocara eveti yathāsaṃkhyamapi saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:514: tathāpi śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśceti ato na kiñcidadhikamuktaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇāviśeṣasaṃbandhakathanameva param /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:516: na cābhimataśreyoviśeṣanirdhāraṇe kartavye vidhiniṣedhagocaratvopavarṇanamupayujyata ityabhisaṃdhāyānyathā vyācaṣṭe--tatrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:517: tacchreyaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśceti tacchabdena dvayamapi śreyastvena parāmṛśyata ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:538: nanu yadi nivṛttiriti nanu yadi nivṛttiḥ prāgabhāvo duḥkhasya, sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:540: prāgābhāvasya ca tathātve prāgityeva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:541: atha nivṛttiḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ, sa ca sarva evātyantika iti kuto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:551: atha śarīrādiṣu nivṛtteṣvapi dukhaṃ kiṃ na bhavet? mā bhūd duḥkham, sukhaṃ kiṃ na bhavet? na hyanyasminnatyantanivṛtte anyanna bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:552: tathā cānuṣaḍgāsukhinivṛttiḥ kimupavarṇyaya ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:554: atḥ śarīrādiṣvasatsu duḥkhavat sukhamapi na bhavati, tasyāpi tatkāryatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:558: anenaiva kāraṇamavidyātṛṣṇe, kāryāpravṛttiranuṣaḍgiṇau dharmādharmāviti ṭīkāvyākhyānam apahastitam, śarīrādīnāṃ duḥkhatvamanubhavabādhitamityata āha-- gauṇeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:562: nanu viṣayā apyanitaretarasādhanasādhyāḥ pajcaiva vibhāge parīkṣāyāṃ ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:564: yadyapi buddhisukhaduḥkhānyapi manaso viṣayaḥ, tathāpi, tasyaiva viṣayatvena duḥkhatvopacāro cadviṣayīkriyamāṇaṃ duḥkhamupajanayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:571: icchādveṣaprayatnāstu pratīyamānā eva sākṣād duḥkha janayanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:572: tathā hi, mumukṣustāvadicchāmi dveṣmi yogābhyāsādanyatra prayata iti pratītyaiva duḥkhī bhavati, ahitasādhanatvenecchādveṣaprayatnānāṃ tenāvadhāritatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:573: anyo 'pīṣyamāṇālābhe bubhukṣito 'smi pipāsito 'smīti pratītya duḥkhī bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:574: hitamevāhitamupalabhya dviṣato nivṛttabhramasya hitameva dveṣmi, dhiḍ māmiti duḥkham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:575: evamaniṣṭa evārthe iṣṭabuddhyā prayatamānasya nivṛtte bhrame tathā alasasya prayatnamupalabhyaiva duḥkhamityetāvataita eva manaso viṣayatvena nirdiṣṭāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:582: iha yadyapi anuṣaḍgo 'vinābhāva iti vakṣyati vāttikakāraḥ, tadupapattaye ca samānanimittatāsāmānādhāratāsamānopalabhyatāḥ, tathāpi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:595: tadapi duḥkhahetuḥ, iṣṭaviyogo hi duḥkhaṃ janayatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:596: kṣayitvaṃ kāme satīti tu vyākhyānaṃ duḥkhahetava iti bahuvacanaviruddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:600: na hi sukha tatsādhanaṃ vā anicchataḥ sukhaṃ nāma sukhasādhanaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:617: dvitīyā tu viṣayasya piriṇativirasatvād duḥkhameva prasūte, ativyāmohād viṣayeṣveva magnasyecchāntarameva vā, ubhayathāpyanarthamūlamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:620: duḥkhatadanuḍgisādhanabhāvādindriyādivat duḥkhatvena parisaṃkhyātumucitāstathāpi na śarīrendriyādivyatirekeṇāmūṣāmātmalābho duḥkhaṃ prati vyāpāro vā, indriyādīnāṃ punardeṣapravṛttyabhāve 'pi duḥkhaṃ prati vyāpāro jīvanmuktasyāstyeva pravṛttiphalaṃ tu dharmādharmau yadyapi sukhaduḥkhahetū,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:622: na hi bhāvini janmāntare śarīrendriyāviṣayabuddhisukhaduḥkhānyāhatya vyāpriyante yathā dharmādharmau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:636: nyāyo mārga iva nyāyamārgaḥ, niḥreyasabhūmeḥ prāptihetutvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:640: tadevaṃ pūrvoktena nyāyena mokṣamāṇasya śāstre pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:648: yadyapi ca yāvaccharīrādibhāvinī pravṛttistathāpi doṣānuṣaṅgasahakārivirahānnāsau pravṛttiḥ tatkāryāsamarthatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:650: yadyapi yathānādau bhāvaparamparāyāṃ karmāṇi pracīyante tathāpacīcante 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:653: tacca śarīrakoṭimadhyapatitamekaṃ śarīraṃ kadācit kiñcit kvacideva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:654: bhogastu nāstyeva taccharīraṃ yatra nāsti, bhogasya tadāyatanatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:657: tasya ca kramabhāvibhirapi kiyadbhiḥ kaiścideva śarīrairūpabhogāt prakṣayo 'pi na durūpapādaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:658: tathāpyāgamaprāmāṇyāt kāyayaugapadyasyāpi prasaṃkhyānaphalatayā siddhatvādanantāmaniyatavipākasamayatāṃ cābhyupagamyaiva parihṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:660: yogardhiprabhāvasampanno vividhaphalabhogino vicitrasvabhāvānekadaiva bahūn kāyān icchāmātreṇaiva nirmimīta ityatra daṇḍakāraṇyasṛṣṭirūdāhaṇamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:661: iha kecid āhuḥ, duḥkhanivṛtti puruṣārtha eva svarūpato na bhavati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:663: sukhaṃ duḥkhābhāve satyeva bhavatīti sukhasādhanāntaravat duḥkhābhāvo 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:665: na nu sa eva puruṣasya samīhita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:668: na tu vaiśeṣikī muktiṃ gautamo gantumicchati // iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:670: tadanupapannam, viparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt, bhojanādisukhe satyeva hi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:671: bubhukṣādiduḥkhaṃ nivartata iti duḥkhanivṛttyarthameva bhojanādisukhaṃ mṛgyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:672: na punastadeva tasya samīhitamiti kiṃ na kalpayate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:673: kvacid duḥkhabhāve 'pi sukhasyeṣyamāṇatvā diti cet--na, duḥkhanivṛtterapi kvacit sukhābhāve 'pīṣyamāṇatvādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:676: tasmād yadyapi duḥkhahānau sukham, sukhe ca duḥkhahānirniyatā, tathāpi parasparanirapekṣameva puruṣārthatvamanayoricchayoḥ apyasaṃkīrṇaviṣayatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:677: anyastvāha--bhavatyeva hi duḥkhahāniḥ puruṣārthaḥ, kiṃ tvanubhūyamānatayā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:678: na hi viṣādijanyamohāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhanivṛttiriti tadarthaṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:682: na hi mūrcchādyavasthārthaṃ pravṛtto dṛśyate sudhīḥ // iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:686: na hi paradāreṣu śāstraniṣedhāḍkuśanivāritāḥ prekṣāvanto na pravartanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:687: na tatra kāmaḥ puruṣārthaḥ, api tvalpīyaḥ sukhaṃ mahānanartha iti nivṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:689: mahīyān pravartata iti na te pravartanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:690: iyameva hi prekṣā yat puruṣārthatve 'pi lokaśāstravirodhaparāmarśaḥ, na tu apuruṣārthatvādeva svarūpeṇeṣyamāṇatāmātranibandhanatvāt puruṣarthatāyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:691: ataeva na yatra lokaśāstravirodhaḥ, tatra vyādhyādiparipīḍitāḥ prayāgavaṭaprapātānaśanādināpi dehaṃ tyajantaḥ prekṣāvanto dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:692: na hi kaścid duḥkhanivṛttimanubhaviṣyāmīti tatsādhane pravartate, api tu duḥkha hāsyāmīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:699: tathātve vā viṣayāntarasaṃcārābhāvaprasaṅgāt, nivṛtteḥ sarvadā tādavasthyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:700: tasmāt sarvadānanubhūyamānāpi yathā kaṇṭakādijanyaduḥkhanivṛttiḥ puruṣārthatayā puruṣaṃ prayojayati, tathā śāstrārthabhūtāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:705: aśakyāni ca vastūni nārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ / iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:709: yathā hyatrānarthasya bhūyastvamarthasya tu kṣudratvam, na tathāpavarge 'pīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:710: etenaitadapi nirastaṃ yaduktam, yathā duḥkhaśabalaṃ saṃsārasukhamanādeyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:711: tathā sukhaśabalatayā duḥkhamapyupādeyaṃ kiṃ na syāt? dṛśyante hi sukhārthino yagādiduḥkhamanubhavanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:713: heyahīnasya kā muktiḥ kena vāpyupadiśyate // iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:715: yastu ghanataraduḥkhatimiranirantarāt saṃsārakāntārāt sukhakhadyotikāsu dyotamānāsvapi bibheti taṃ prati ayaṃ nirastatamaskatayā sugamo mārga upadiśyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:718: tathā ca jagataḥ śamāyetyanena virodha ityata āha--avivekināmapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:719: yadyapi kasyacidapravṛttāvapi na sarvārthatā asya hīyata iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:720: prapañcitamadhastāt, tathāpi heyaṃ heyatvenāgṛhṇanto mandāḥ kāruṇikeṇa grāhayitavyā ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:721: nanu śāstreṇa tattvajñānād vairāgyam, vairāgyācca śāstre pravṛttiriti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:723: duḥkhādudvijato bhogavaimukhyamātramiha vairāgyaṃ vivakṣitam, na tu rāgābhāva evetyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:727: na hi kaścit sukhaṃ prāptumiva duḥkhamapyāptuṃ pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:730: nanu sukhasya heyatvameva kuta ityata āha--prāptavyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:745: idaṃ śuklabhāsvararūpaṃ śuktikādravyaṃ na rajatamiti jñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:749: tadevaṃ paricchedadvāreṇa paricchedakamunnīyata iti paricchedasyaiva sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ paricchedatvāparicchedatve darśite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:756: tataśca saiva buddhiḥ svarūpāvasthitenārthena nirūpyamāṇā pramā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:763: evaṃ ca pravṛttisāmarthyāsāmarthyasaṃdehe 'pi yadi tajjanakamapramāṇamasamarthaiva sā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:764: atha na tadapramāṇam, tajjanyā pravṛttirapi nāsamarthetyapramāṇānniyataḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:769: siddho vyatirekaḥ, ki cāta ityata āha--tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:772: nanu tasyā ityatra kathamanantaratvena prakṛtāmasamarthāṃ vihāya vyavahitvenāprakṛtāpi samarthaiva pravṛtti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:785: evaṃrūpatā ca prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasya vyāptismaraṇasāhityameveti tasyāpi bījaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:794: iha ca dvidhā pravṛttiḥ, aihikaphalā āmuṣmikaphalā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:799: pramāṇatattvaviniścayaḥ, tatrāpyasau svahetubalādāyato na pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakaḥ, anyathaikāntikavijayāniścaye prāmāṇyākṣepaka eva vijigīṣuḥ kathāyāṃ na pravarteta //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:800: na hi jalpato vitaṇḍayato vā avaśyamaikāntiko vijayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:805: te hi pramāṇatayā pravṛtteḥ prāgava niścīyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:808: sa ca viṣayagocarastannāntarīyakārthagocaro vā tajjātīyatvāvadhāraṇopāyo yatra svarūpato 'pi nāsti tatra pravṛttisāmarthyādeva tadgocarasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:811: yatra tu svarūpābhyāso 'styeva tadgataṃ tu śreyaḥsādhanamabhyastam, tatra pravṛttisāmarthyena tatsādhanatvagrāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:812: yathā angiḥ pākādisamartha iti saṃbhāvitāptatvasya vacanādupalabhya svayaṃ pacataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:813: yatrāpi śreyaḥsādhanatve 'bhyāsaḥ svarūpe tvanabhyāsastatrāpi svarūpagocarasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyādavasīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:818: tadamī saṃśayānā apipravartamānāḥ phala iva svarūpaśreyaḥsādhanatvayoriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:825: pravṛttisāmarthyamasti, tenāpi ca prāmāṇyamavadhārayituṃ tatra śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:826: tathāpi tajjātīyatvalakṣaṇenaiva liḍgena pravṛtteḥ prāgevāvadhārite prāmāṇye tatpramāturūttarakālaṃ pramitsaiva nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:831: nanu kimidaṃ tajjātīyatvam? na tāvat pramāṇajātīyatvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:834: taddhi samarthapravṛttisaṃbandho vā syāt? tadupahito vā niyataprāgabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:837: liḍgaṃ ca tasya prāmāṇyaikaniyatasya yadyasti tadā prāmāṇyameva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:838: tenānumīyatām, kiṃ tajjātīyatvānumānena? prāmāṇyāniyatasya tu tasyānumānena kim? nāpi pratyakṣasiddha eva kaściddharmastajjātīyatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:840: tathā ca tatrāpi pravṛtteḥ prāgeva prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ syāt, vyāpterapi prāgeva pratītatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:841: na hyayaṃ kvacidapi tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇyaṃ nānumitavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:842: tatra nāstyeva tajjātīyatvam, kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyatāmiti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:846: satyam, tathāpi jñānasya viṣyanibandhanatvāt tattadviṣayopādhaya eva te te jñānopādhayastaistairūpādhibhirūpādhīyamānaṃ jñānameva tajjātīyaṃ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:847: te copādhayaḥ pratibhedaṃ svasaṃjñābhirabhidhātumaśakyā iti tajjātīyatvamityanayā vācobhaḍgyā darśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:854: tatra svarūpaprakāreṇopahitamanubhava vivektuṃ viśiṣṭāḥ prakāropādhayo bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:855: te ca niyamena vibhramaviṣayavirodhitayā nirdhāritasvabhāvabhedā guṇādaya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:857: yadā tvapratyakṣe lakṣye lakṣaṇena jñānaṃ janyate tadānumānaṃ taditi tasyānyathaiva gatirbhaviṣyatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:861: karmaṇi tu avātulena tiṣṭhatā tīvravegāsaṃskṛtena calajjalādisvacchavilokanādivirahiṇā yad dravyaṃ calatītyupalabhyate tat tatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:862: evaṃ teṣu teṣu viśeṣeṣu te te viśeṣā vyabhicāravirodhino na pratipadamanukramituṃ śakyante
GSP29nvtp1_1u:865: yatra tu sa evārtho bhūyo bhūyo 'bhyastaḥ, tatra saṃvādakatvameva tajjātīyatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:869: abhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ punaretasya bhūyodarśanena mantrāyurvede tajjātīyatvāya prāmāṇyāvinābhāvasiddhiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:871: yathā ca prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyenāvadhāryate anabhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tathāprāmāṇyamapi pravṛttiviparyayeṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:872: yathā ca pravṛtteḥ prāgevābhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tajjātīyatayā prāmāṇyamavadhāryate, tathāprāmāṇyamapīti mantavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:885: phalajñānaṃ hi phalasya siddhāvasthasya sādhanānarhatayā niṣprayojanībhūtatvād vā na parīkṣyet tattajjātīyajñānasya sarvāsvavasthāsu arthāvyabhicāritayā niḥśaṅkatvād veti? na tāvadādyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:889: siddha eva hi phale parīkṣite tatsādhanasya tathātvasiddhāvuttarottarulābhisandhiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:890: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, phalajñānasyāpi bhūyo bhūyaḥ spapnādyavasthāsu vyabhicāra darśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:891: svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ na vyabhicaratīti cet--evaṃ tarhi pirīkṣitameva phalajñānaṃ syāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:892: tathā hi yat svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ tadavyabhicārīti vyāptisiddhau yatraiva tathābhūtajñānatvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:894: asyāpyabhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvināmūtaliḍgopalambhastathā tajjātīyatvaṃ punaḥ svasthāvasthasya phalajñānatvameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:896: nanu yadvijñāna dṛṣṭāntayitavyaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ sādhanīyam? evaṃ tattatsādhanasyāpi dṛṣṭāntaparamparāyāḥ kathamityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:898: tajjātīyatvena liḍgena prāmāṇye sādhiyitavye yadyad dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tasya tasyeti mantavyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:899: yadyavam, pravṛttisāmarthyamanavakāśameva, na hyasti tadvijñānaṃ yat sarvathaivāpūrvaviṣayam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:901: kathamanāditvamāha--vārttikakāra ityata āha--eteṣu ca madhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:903: yadyapi phalaṃ na pravṛttiviṣayastathāpi tatsādhanagocarāyāḥ tatsaṃtānagocarāyā eva vā pravṛtteḥ tajjātīyaphalāntarasaṃbandhastannāntarīyakavijātīyaphalasaṃbandho vā svasya narāntarasya vā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ phalajñānasya draṣṭāvyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:904: tadevaṃ samānanyāyatayā rūpādibāhyarthapratyakṣaprāmāṇyasamarthanānantaraṃ śabdraprāmāṇyaṃ samarthya tadubhayopapattaye samānanyāyatayaiva āntarapratyakṣajñāneṣu madhye phalajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:906: tasya cānumānasamānanyāyatayā anumānaprāmāṇyasamarthanānantarameva samarthanaṃ kariṣyata ityabhiprāyavānāha--anumānasyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:908: sā ca vyāptipakṣadharmatāgrāhakaireva pramāṇairapanīyata iti bhavati nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkamanumitijñānam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:909: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyata iti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:910: nanu pramāṇatvāviśeṣe 'pi kathamanumitereva svataḥ, na pratyakṣāderityata āha--anumeyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:923: na tvavadhāraṇātmakatayeti na tayoḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyagrahaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:924: atha daivādayogavyavacchedātmake evotpadyete anuvyavasīyete ca, tadā ca niyāmakamantarbhāvyaiva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:925: tadabhāve tvaviśeṣādavadhāraṇātmakatvaṃ paribhūya tadatadrūpasādhāraṇamevāvatiṣṭheta ityāśayavān niyāmakābhāvamevāha--pratyakṣajñānaṃ tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:927: yadyapi cārthādapi tathābhūtādeva tajjñānaṃ jāyate, tathāpyavyabhicāro vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:928: tadgraho vā? prāktanaḥ tatrākiścitkara eva, indriyāpātamātrādeva yugapadubhayorapyekajñānāvabhāsitayā parāmarśakālānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:932: etena śaḍkāmātramapanīyate jñānāntarairiti yaduktaṃ kaiścit tannirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:935: tathā ca jñānasvarūpagrāhiṇaḥ kauṇṭhye pratyakṣādyantarābhāve cānumānamevopāya iti tadāha--pravṛttisāmarthyamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:936: syādetat, yadi pratyakṣaśābdajñānayoḥ parataḥ prāmāṇyam, tat kimidānīmanuvyavasāyasyāpi parata eva? tathā ca liḍgaṃ niścitameva niścāyakamityanena nyāyena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:943: na ca śuktikākāre jñāne rajataṃ jānāmīti syāditi tadidamuktam--tādṛśasyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:945: sabāhyabhyantaraṃ dharmi mātragocaramapi pratyakṣaṃ svata eva pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:953: śakyagrahameva, santi hi tatrāpi yathāyogaṃ liṅgasādṛśyajñānasamutthatvādīni tajjātīyatvaliṅgāni tathāpi koṣṭhagatyā svata eva prāmāṇyagraho 'tra na svayamiti sa eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:954: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parata eva sādhanīyaṃ taditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:957: nanvetāvatāpi vijñānakaraṇānamindriyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyasya kutaḥ siddhiḥ? na hi phalayathārthatvamevāmīṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityata āha--sevadanasya ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:959: janayeyuḥ, tathātve vā rāsabho 'pi vahnadhiyamavyabhicāriṇī janacet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:961: yathārdrendhanaṃ dahanavyamicāryapi dahanasaṃbandhāt dahanāvyabhicāriṇaṃ dhūmaṃ janayanna
GSP29nvtp1_1u:962: kāraṇasvābhāvyāt, tathendriyādyapyarthavyabhicāriṇaṃ tathāvidhasahakāryupabṛṃhitaṃ tenārthena saṃbandhāt tadarthāvyabhicāri jñānaṃ janayedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:963: tadetatprāmāṇyaṃ nāvaśyaṃ sarvatrāvadhāryate, tadā śrayasyaiva saṃvedanasya sarvatrānavadhāraṇāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:964: tathā sati cānavasthāyā viṣayasaṃcāro na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:965: tasmāt tīvrasaṃvegitayā yattu saṃvedanamavaśyaṃ saṃvedanīyam, yatra yatra cāparo viśaṣataḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:966: sāmānyato vā vipratipadyate jijñāsate vā tatra tatra prāmāṇyamuktenāpāyenāvadhāraṇīyamityato nānavasthetyāśayavānupasaṃhāravyājenoktamarthaṃ saṃkalayya āha--tasmādathasaṃdehāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:967: nanvarthāniśvayenāpi pravartamāno na hi tatsādhanatāmanumāya pravartitumarhati arthitvābhāvāt, na hi tatsādhanatvānumānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:969: na ca so 'pi pravṛtti vineti tadavasthamevetaretarāśrayatvamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:971: yadyapi prāmāṇyāniścayavadapekṣitopāyatvāniścayenāpi tatra tatra pravartate tathāpyapekṣitopāyatāṃ pākṣikīmapyurarīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:978: nanu pramāṇasya prayojanavattvamākṣiptaṃ vā samādhīyeta jijñāsitaṃ vā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:980: na hyasti puruṣo yaḥ pramāṇaṃ niṣprayojanamiti brūyāt, tanmūlatvāt sarvapuruṣārthasiddheḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:981: yasya tu puruṣārtho nāsti sa nirūcchvāsa eva śīryeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:985: kiṃ nāma? śāstrārthaubhūtasya paramanyāyasya niḥśreyasaṃ prati gurupāyatve manyamānena laghīyati pravṛttyupāyaṃ vidyamāne śāstrārambha evākṣipyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:990: ādigrahaṇena tu tadupāyabhūtāḥ pravṛttayo yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmadhāraṇālakṣaṇa gṛhyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:998: nanu ubhayorapi tulyatve kuto viśeṣāt pramāṇameva vyutpādyate na pravṛttiparītyata āha--tathāpīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:999: śravaṇamanananididhyāsanasākṣātkāralakṣaṇāyā pravṛtteḥ svarūpataḥ phalataśca pramāṇāntarbhūtatvāt tadvyutpādanameva pravṛttivyutpādanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1000: na ca pravṛttivyutpādanena pramāṇaṃ vyutpāditaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1001: na hi pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1002: nanu śāstrārthasya prayojanavyutpādanāvasare pramāṇamarthavaditi kutaḥ? na hi pramāṇaṃ śāstrarthaḥ, api tu nyāya ityata āha--sāmānyābhidhānaṃ ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1004: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ lokavṛttamanūdyata ityataḥ prathama tātparyamanusmārayanneva vārttikamavatārayati--prāmāṇyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1005: apramāṇenetyatrāpi yadyapi vāñmanasavisaṃvādaḥ niṣedhavidhyupāya eva hi pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1007: tathāpi vyāmohādapyupapatterevaṃbhūtābhiprāyasthairye 'pi nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatirityetāvatā anujñaivāttaraṃ dattam--vāḍmanasayorvisaṃvāda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1009: tataḥ pramāṇenetyevaṃ vadato 'vaśyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manasi viparivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1012: nanu pramāṇena khalvayaṃ jñātetyādi, bhāṣyaṃ lokavṛttānuvādo 'stu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1017: āgāmibhāṣye heyādīnāṃ sphuṭatvāt tasyedānīmakṣarārtho vyākriyata iti mā śaḍkiṣṭhā ityāha--asyaiveti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1020: amidheyānāṃ paurvāparyaniyamāya guṇapradhānabhāve jijñāsyamāne abhidhānarūpasya śāstrasya kaḥ prastāva ityata āha--śāstraśabda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1021: evaṃ tarhi heyādīnāṃ śāstrārtharūpatayā na pṛthakkoṭitvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1022: tathā caikakoṭikatayā kimapekṣya guṇapradhānabhāvacintetyata āha-atra ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1023: kathaṃ punaranena pramāṇādicaturvargo 'tra labhyate iti vārttikamanuktopālabhbho mā bhūdityata āha--teneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1028: yadyapi ca hānasyāpi pramāṇarūpasya pratītirastyeva, tathāpi pramāṇādeveti taditaretyuktam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1029: niṣpattistu hānasyājñānādeva yasmāt kiṃ tajjñānena? jñānāt tu yasmāt tasya pramāṇāyattatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1033: nanu pramātrādīnāmapi prayojanavattvādarthavadityanena kiṃ pramāṇasyādhikyamāhitamityata āha--atiśāyane matuciti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1034: nanvasya caturvargadvayasya niḥśreyasādhigamaṃ prati vikalpaḥ, samuccayo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1035: vā? ubhayamāpyanupapannamabhinnatvāt tathā hi ya evārthaḥ pramātā prameyaṃ pramitiriti sa eva heyo 'dhigantavya iti ya evārtho hānopāyāviti sa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1037: saṃśayādīnāmapi nyāyaparikaratayā nyāyaśarīratvāt tasya ca pramāṇatvāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1040: na hi bhavati tarūṇā vā vṛkṣeṇa vedaṃ sādhanīyaṃ tarūvṛkṣābhyāṃ vetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1043: tenāyamarthaḥ yadyapyubhayatrāpi ṣoḍaśaiva padārthāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ, tathāpi yathā pramāṇtvena pramāṇaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hānatvenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1047: yathā ca svarūpeṇa saṃśayādayo jñeyāḥ pramāṇaparikaratayā tathā hānopāyatayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1051: yathā ca śarīrādayo daśa prameyatayā jñeyāḥ tathā heyatayāpi, anyathā aheyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1054: yathā cāpavargaḥ prameyatayā jñeyaḥ, tathā adhigantavyatayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1058: yathā cātmā prameyatayā adhigantavyaḥ, tathā pramātṛtayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1060: prameyatve cājñāte sopādhinirūpādhirūpatayā heyopādeyate na nirvahecātām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1061: yathā ca buddhirbuddhitvena tathā tabhdedaḥ pramititayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1062: anyathā pramityantaramanuśriyeta, niṣphalaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1064: tasmāt ta eva pramāṇādayaḥ ubhayathā jñāyantāmiti vivakṣitvobhayacaturvargopādānaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1072: adhigantavyamārogyamityataścaturṣu vaktavyeṣu ṣoḍaśapadārthavarṇanaṃ kkopayujyata iti tadāpi nirastam, caturvargasyaiva vivakṣābhedāt ṣoḍaśadhā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1074: vivakṣābhedasya copapatti pratipadaṃ bhāṣyakāra eva darśayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1079: kasmāt pramāṇāditi nābhihitam? evaṃ hyasaṃdigdhaiva pañcamī syādityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1081: pañcamyāḥ taseḥ prayogaṃ darśayitvā pañcamīvyatirekeṇa taseḥ ākṣepasamādhāne asaṃgate ityākṣepaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1083: nanu pramāṇābhyāṃ pramāṇairiti bhavataṃ saṃplavaḥ, pramāṇeneti tu kathamityata āha--yatra dvayoditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1084: viṣayaikatāmātra saṃplavaḥ, na tu kāraṇānāṃ samuccayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1087: tathā sati vyāpārabhedo na syāditi jñāpanārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1089: evakāraḥ sādhakatamāntaraṃ vyavacchindan tasya vyāpāraṃ phalaṃ ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1092: kasmāt punaḥ karaṇārtho gamyate? prakṛtipratyayayoḥ katarasmādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1094: yadi tṛtīyayā karaṇatvamabhidhīyate kiṃ prakṛtisthena lyuṭpratyayena? atha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1095: tenaiva, kiṃ tṛtīyayeti? jñāpakasya kārakatvaśaḍkā mā bhūdityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1098: pramāṇamiti, prātipadikādeva sākṣātkaraṇatvamarthato hetutvaṃ gamyata iti kiṃ vibhaktivyāptyetyata āha--atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1099: na ca vācyaṃ karaṇabhāvenāpi pramāṇaphalayostādātmyaṃ pratiṣedddhuṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1105: na cānuvādakatvaṃ śabdābhyāsasya prayojanavattāvyatirekeṇa sidhyatītyataḥ prayojanaṃ darśayati--pramākārakāntarebhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1106: laukike tu prayoge saṃkhyābhidhānādvibhakteḥ sārthakatvaṃ draṣṭavyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1107: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvena saṃplavākṣepo 'saṃgata eva, agnyādiviśiṣṭe parvatādau pratyakṣānumānayoḥ saṃplavādityata āha--viśiṣṭo bhinna iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1110: tat kiṃ hetutvameva viṣayalakṣaṇam? netyāha--sa eva cārtha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1114: nanu yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ na sāmānyarūpamavagāhate tathāpi yadyanumānamapi svalakṣaṇamavagāheta tata eva tāvatāpi saṃplavaḥ syādityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1115: nanu bhavatvanumānaṃ sāmānyamātraniyatam, pratyakṣamapi hyatra pravartsyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1120: tat kiṃ sāmānyasyāsattvāt svalakṣaṇe ca pratibandhagrahāsaṃbhavādanumānaṃ nirviṣayamevetyata āha--tadidamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1121: tat kimanumānamapramāṇameva aparamārthagocaratvāt? yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tadanyadullikhyānyatra pravartayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1122: kathaṃ ca tadavisaṃvādakam? kathaṃ ca bādhitākāraṃ pramāṇatayā vyavahiyata ityata āha-tasmāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1123: nanu pramāṇāntareṇa saha saṃplavo bhaviṣyatyanayorityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1129: na hyasatā sāmānyena paramārthasat svalakṣaṇaṃ tadvad bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1131: so 'yaṃ gahanaḥ panthā ityāśayavān āha--yathā caitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1132: viśeṣa ityatra yadi karmakārakaṃ na ca tatastadvannāmāparo 'stītyata āha--viśeṣa iti saṃplavamamṛṣyamāṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1135: adhigater'the pramāṇāntarasya na tāvadarthādhigamaṃ pratyupayogaḥ, tasya prāgave pramāṇāntarasiddhatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1137: na ca vācyaṃ smṛtisaṃtatiradhigatisaṃtatirvā astu vyavahārapravartinī na kaścidviśeṣa iti, smṛtivadupadarśitārthamātraviṣayatayā tāsāmapramātvena tatsādhānasyāpramāṇatvaprasaṃgāt tāsāṃ ca tata eva smṛtitvaprasaṃgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1138: smṛtisaṃtateścāvaśyaṃbhāvitayā tata eva vyavahārisiddhāvadhigatisaṃtatikalpanāyāṃ kalpanāgauravaprasaṃgādityāśayavān piṣṭapeṣaṇamevopasaṃharati--adhigatamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1139: nanu anyatheti vārttike yadi kāraṇagatamanyaprakāratvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tadā kāraṇagataprakārabhede 'pi na kaścid viṣayagato viśeṣaḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇaparihāropayogī darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1140: atha viṣayagata eva pramārabhado darśitaḥ, tadā anadhigatārthagantṛtayā kutaḥ saṃplavaḥ? na ca viṣayābhede 'pi pramāṇabhedāt kaścit phalaprakārabhedaḥ prakṛtopayogavānastītyata āha--ayamabhisandhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1141: piṣṭapeṣaṇe niṣphalatvaṃ vā syāt, aviśiṣṭaphalatvaṃ vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1142: anapekṣitaphalatvaṃ vā, adhigate 'pyarthe kimityadhigatisādhanamadhigati karotīti praśnamātraṃ vā, sādhanāsaṃbhava eva veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1145: na ca viṣayādhigamaḥ pramākāraṇavirodhī, yena tasmin, satceva pramākāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavet
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1146: tasmādālocya svayameva nivarterat yadi cetayeran, na caitadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1159: prathamapramāṇaphalato 'pyaviśiṣṭaphalatayā yadyānarthakyam, dvitīyavat prathamapramāṇasyāpi dvitīyāviśiṣṭaphalatayā ānarthakyaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1168: eve tarhi vārttikārthaḥ ka ityata āha--sa eva ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1169: nanu phalasyāpi sākṣātkārāsākṣātkārarūpaḥ prakārabhedo 'styeva, sa evānena kiṃ na pradarśyata ityata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1172: sa kathaṃ tenaiva pratibodhanīyaḥ? parapratibodhaśca prakṛtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1174: evaṃ siddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā saṃplavavyavasthe vicārite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1177: yadi niścayo 'bhimataḥ syāt tasya nāvaśyaṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvamiti sandigdhasya praśna upapannaḥ syādata āha--avadhāryata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1178: tathā ca vicārasya parīkṣāyā avaśyaṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvādagre saṃdigdhasya praśno yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1182: na ca sādhyasiddhau tajjātīyasya sādhakatamatvamasti, chinne vṛkṣe paraśoriva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1183: tasmād yathaivācchinnaviṣayatayā vyāpriyamāṇaḥ paraśuḥ chedanaṃ tathā pramite viṣaye vyāpriyamāṇamindriyādikaṃ pramāṇamiti momāṃsakāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1186: na hi pramāṇasyārthe pramātiriktamapi kiñcit kartavyamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1192: arthamapi tadeva vyavasthāpayati yadarthapratītiṃ tadīyatayā niyamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1193: tathātvenāniyatāyāṃ tu tasyāṃ na kasyacit sā pratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1194: sarvasya veti nārthena niyatā pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1195: aniyatārthapratītijanakaṃ ca kathaṃ pramāṇa nāma? na cendriyādibhirjñānakaraṇairjñānaṃ tadīyatā niyamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1196: na hi cakṣuṣā janitatvādeva nīlasya nīlavijñānam, pītajñānasyāpi tathātprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1198: tasmādarthākāra evabuddhigato buddhiṃ tadīyatā vyavasthāpannarthamapi tathā vyavasthāpayati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1202: na cābhinnātmani karaṇaphalabhāvo virudhyate, tatra kāraṇabhavasyaiva virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1203: sa hi vyāpāravyāpāribhāvo vā, gamyagamakabhāvo vā svīkriyate eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1204: vṛkṣādibhiḥ saṃyujyamāna eva hi paraśuḥ saṃyogena vyāpāreṇa karaṇamiti vyavahniyate loke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1205: na ca saṃyogo nāma vigrahavānanyaḥ saṃyujyamānāt paraśorasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1206: gamyagamakabhāvo 'pi svaprakāśe vijñāne bāhye ca vṛkṣe śiśapayā gamyamāne dṛṣṭa eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1207: na hi śiṃśapātaḥ kaścidanyo vṛkṣo nā vṛkṣād vā śiṃśāpā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1208: vaikalpike tu vyavahāre yathātra vyāvṛttibhedastathā ākāratadvatorapīti na kaścid viśeṣa iti sautrāntikāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1220: bhāvapraśnavyākhyānena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti tu sahetyaśyāhṛtya kecid vyācakṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1221: kecit tu bhāvapraśnavyākhyā boddhavyā anena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1222: anye tu bhavāpraśnavyākhyānena hetunā bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāto bhāvapraśnaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyātaḥ, tadantareṇa tadanupapatteriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1227: nanu sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropadarśitayorantaraḥ prāpyata eva, tat kathaṃ visaṃvādakatvam? kathaṃ cārthavattvamitya āha--no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1228: yato na prāpyate, ata eva nārthakriyāsūpayujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1236: anāgate tu so 'pi nāstītyata āśaḍkitaṃ jñāpakatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1238: tasyāpi taramparayā arthakāryatvamarthajñāpakatvaṃ ca sākṣāt samānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1244: tathā hi, na tāvad asya smṛtitvameva pravṛttinamittam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1246: nāpi tadekārthamasavetaṃ jñānatvādikaṃ tannimittam, yena smṛtirapi pramā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1248: nāpi pramātvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ samasti jñānagatasya sāmānyaviśeṣasya manomātragrāhyatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1250: kiṃ ca yadi pramātvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ syāt, tadā tadabhāvavati tadviruddhasāmānyavati vā viparyayajñāne na samaveyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1251: tathā ca viparyayajñānaṃ dharmiṇyapi na pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1253: sāmānyaṃ ca sāmānyāntareṇa saha parāparabhāvena ekasyāṃ vyaktau samāviśet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1254: tatrānubhatvaṃ vā paraṃ pramātvaṃ vā? ādye smṛti kathaṃ pramā? dvitīye tvanubhavaḥ pramātvaṃ na vyabhicaret /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1256: sākṣātkāritve ca yadi paraṃ tadā asākṣātkāravatyo 'numitiprabhṛtayo na pramāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1261: tenaivāyaṃ pramāṇaśabdo yathārthajñānamātre niyataḥ kṛta iti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1266: kiṃ ca smṛteryāthārthyamapi kṛtaḥ? na hi yādṛśor'thaḥ smaryate yadā tādṛśa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1272: nanu samānaviṣayatvepi smṛtyanubhavayoranubhavo yathārtho, na tṛ smṛtiriti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1273: kṛta etat? anubhavakāle tasyārthasya tādavasthyat, smṛtikāle tvatādavasthyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1274: nanu pūrvaṃ tāvattadavastha evāsāvāsīt, etāvataiva jñānamastu yathārtham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1276: nanvatītaḥ śyāma iti pratyayaḥ tatra yathārtha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1283: yathā rajjuṃ bhujaṅgatayā anubhūya vidrutasya tathaiva smṛtiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1286: tasmādubhayathāpi smṛteranyasyānubhavatvaikaniyataṃ yathārthatvameva pramāpadasya pravṛttinimittaṃ loko 'vadhāritavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1287: kathamanyathā tatraiva pramāśabdaṃ prayuḍkte nānyatreti yadyapi, tathāpi dharmiṇyapi smṛteḥ pramāṇyaṃ mābhūdityāśayavān prāguktayuktikaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1294: na hyasti saṃbhavo mīmāṃsakasyāpi yathārthānubhavo na ca prameti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1300: yadi na pratyakṣeṇānumānopadeśābhyāmapi anityeṣvapi prāyaśaḥ upalabdhānāmevopalambhācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1303: prakārato 'pi bhūyo bhūyastaṃmādiṣvanubhūyamāneṣu na kaścid guṇaprakāraḥ pratikṣaṇalabdhajanmāpavargaḥ paribhāvyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1306: na ca catuḥpañcakṣaṇāvasthāyinyapi tasminnekamevajñānaṃ janayitvendriyādikamudāsīnam anāgatakarmādijanma pratīkṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1307: tataśca sarvajanmāntaropalambhādanye taduttarakālapratyayā dhārayā vicchedena vā bhavanto na pramāṇaṃ syurityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1309: yadyapi svarūpasya prakārasya vā tathāvidhasya tādavasthyam, tathāpi pratyakṣajñānadhārāyāṃ vartamāna evārthaḥ parisphurati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1310: na ca kramabhāvināmeka eva vartamānaḥ kālo viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1316: na tāvat pratikṣaṇavartamānatvaṃ saugatavad vastunaḥ eva svarūpotpādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1317: nāpi saṃkhyavad vasturūpasthairye 'pi pariṇatibheda eva mīmāṃsakaiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1319: nāpi dharmabheda eva kaścit pratikṣaṇāpūrvo vartamānatvāparanāmā samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1321: na ca kālaḥ pratyakṣagocaraḥ, nāpi bhinnasvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1324: tatra na tāvat pratīyamānastaṃmādisaṃsṛṣṭā upādhayaḥ saṃbhavantītyuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1327: na tāvat stambhādiṣu taditarasaṃsargiṇaḥ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāḥ kecanāvaśyaṃ tajjñānasaṃsargabhājo bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1328: kvacid bhavantyapīti cet, tatraiva taddhiyāṃ pramāṇatā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1329: yatra tu tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇa upādhayo na santi tatra dhārāvāhikabuddhīnāmapramāṇatvameva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1330: tathāvidhā eva ca vicāraviṣayatvenābhipretā jñānāntaragocarā viṣayāntarasaṃsargiṇa upādhayo bhaviṣyantīti cet--evaṃ tarhi dhārāvahanabuddhayo na syureva iti lābhāya gato mūlamapi hāritavāt na khalu pramāṇāntareṇa indriyāntareṇa tenaiva vā taddharmiparityāgāddharmyantare anubhūyamāne vivakṣitaikaviṣayabuddhidhārasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1331: iṣṭa evāyamarthaṃ iti cet--na, apūrvāpūrvopādhyupanipātaniyame pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1333: ata eva ghaṭo 'yaṃ ghaṭo 'yamiti buddhisahasrasyāpi na viṣayakṛtaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1349: na hi sādhakatamasya tathātvaṃ sādhākatamāntarāpekṣayā, kiṃ tu pradhānakriyākārakāntarāpekṣayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1350: anyathā yatra karaṇānāṃ samuccayastatra parasparāpekṣayā anatiśayitatvādakaraṇatvāpatteḥ karaṇānāṃ samuccayaḥ kvacidapi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1354: na ca jñāte 'pi jñānāntarāsaṃbhavo yenātrāpyaphalatvādevākaraṇatvaṃ bhavet, dhārāvāhikajñānotpatteḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1355: tasmād yo 'nādhigatārthabodhanaṃ pramāṇamicchati, tasya dhārāvāhikabuddhayo 'pramāḥ prasajyerannityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1357: pravṛttiṃ prāptiṃ ca janayadeva vijñānaṃ pramā, tadarthameva pramāṇānusaraṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1369: nanu tathāpi prathamādevāpekṣitasiddhaḥ puruṣasya kiṃ dvitīyādinetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1374: na hyanadhigatārthagantari sārūpyevārthavyavasthāpayitari śaktau vā ātmānātmaprakāśayitryāmupalabdhihetutvaṃ virudhayate ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1378: tadīyatayā hyarthapritītiṃ vyavasthāpayannākāraḥ pramāṇamiti kor'thaḥ? na tāvat tadīyatayā niyatāṃ pratītaṃ janayan, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1383: nīlamidamityākāravyavasāyaḥ prarthamam, atha nīlamahaṃ jānāmītyarthakarmakapratītyanuvyavasāya iti cet--tat kiṃ buddhāvaniścitāyāmevākāro niścitaḥ? na caitat saṃbhavati, sāmānyāniścaye viśeṣāniścayāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1384: niśrvīyata eva, paraṃ na tadīyatayeti cet--atha keyamarthākārādanyā tadīyatā nāma? tadudbhāvatvamiti cet--nanvevamanumitiṃ bhāvāyannākāraḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1387: api ca yā kriyā yatkaraṇaphalatvena vivakṣitā, janayadeva tāṃ tatkaraṇamiti lokasiddham
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1388: na hi chidāmajanayanto 'pi cakṣurādayastanniścāyakatāmātreṇa chedanatayā vayavahniyante
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1389: api tu aniścāyayanto 'pi janayanta eva kuṭhārādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1391: na tu tāmajanayanniścāyako 'pyākāraḥ, evaṃ ca loke 'nukūlatā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1392: anyathā tu piribhāṣāṃ kurvatā loko 'pratipāditaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1394: etena śaktiḥ pramāṇamiti pratyuktam, śakteḥ śakayaniṣṭhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1398: nanu yadi pramāṇa siddham, kiṃ tatra pramātrādinā kartavyam? na hi siddhena siddhameva sādhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1400: athāsiddham, kathaṃ pramāṇam? na hyasiddhaṃ kārakaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1405: karaṇaṃ vyāpāryotpādya vā phalārthaṃ kartavyāntarābhāvāt kartuścaritārthatā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1407: atha prameyasya kathaṃ pramāṇe caritārthatvam? na hi pramātṛvat tenāpi pramākaraṇamutpādyate vyāpāryate vetyata āha--prameyasya tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1410: tatra phalaviṣayatvamasya na karmatvaṃ prati prayojakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1412: karaṇavyāpāraviṣayatvāt tu karmatvam, na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ karma ca, na ca karaṇavyāpāraviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1413: tatra karaṇasya vyāpāraviṣayatvābhāvāt vyāpāra eva na nirvahediti tannirvāha evāsya caritārthatvamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1417: nāpi phalaviṣayaḥ, taduddeśena karmaṇaḥ kartrā avyāpāritatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1429: tadanena kārakāntare 'caritārthasya hetutvameva karaṇatvamiti karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā kartṛvyāpāragocaraḥ karaṇamityapi karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1432: akaraṇā pramāṇotpattiḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karaṇe caritārthatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatamityata āha--nākaraṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1433: vastusaddhipradhānakriyāsaṃbandhanibandhanaprabhṛtayaḥ kārakaśabdā ityāśayavataḥ codyaṃ yadītyādinā buddhisiddhapradhānakriyāsaṃbandhanibandhanapravṛttayaḥ kārakaśabdā ityāśayavataḥ samādhānam--na pācakaśabdādivadityādinā iti ṭīkāyāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1435: tulyavaditi tulayā saṃmitamiva na nyūnaṃ nātiriktaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1436: tadanena prapajcena pramāṃ pramātṛprameyayorakāraṇatvameva darśitamati bhramo mā bhūdityupasaṃhāravyājenāha--tatpramāṇamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1440: sādhakatamārtha pṛcchatīti--na tāvat sādhakānāṃ phalakṛtāvatiśayānatiśayau, tasyaikasya sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1443: yadyapyayogavyavaccheda evātiśayaḥ, tathāpi tulyatve satyapyatiśayānatiśayau tasyaiva cintyete
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1447: nanu yathā kartrādau sati phalaṃ nāvaśyakam, tathā karaṇe 'pi sati kadācinna bhavet, kārakatvāviśeṣāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1449: na hi paraśau sati chidā bhavetyevetyata āha--pramātṛprameye hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1452: tathābhūtena ca phalasyāyogavyavaccheda eva, na tu vyāpāravatāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1461: yadyapi kartṛvyāpāryatvaṃ karaṇatvamiti na vyabhicaratyeva, tathāpi paramparāvyāpāryeṇāpi karmaṇā vyabhiyāro mā bhūdityāśaḍkya prakṛte
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1479: pramāṃ prati kāraṇānā sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatve nirūpyamāṇe puruṣaviṣayasya sādhāraṇyasya kimāyātamityata āha--aśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1485: tadebhirnimittaiḥ karaṇavyavahāre vyavasthāpyamāne yadi karmādivyavahāranimittasamāveśāt tadvyavahāro 'pi bhavati, bhavatu tasyeṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1490: teṣāṃ ca nimittānāṃ bheda eveti nātiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1492: evaṃ ca satyagre arthyata iti vyutpattirapi tātparyaparatayaiveti manatavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1497: tat kiṃ pravṛttisāmarthyābhāvādapramāṇameva tadityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1499: na tāvat sarvo viṣayaḥ sarvatra sarvasya sarvadopakṣaṇīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1501: tathā cānupekṣaṇīyatādaśāyāṃ pravṛttisāmarthyena tadviṣayasya jñānasya prāmāṇyamavadhārya gṛhītena tajjātīyatvenopekṣaṇīyatādaśāyamapi prāmāṇyaṃ sugrahameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1502: yatrāpyāhatya pravṛttirna bhūtā tatrāpyasaṃbhavadvādhasaṃvāditvaṃ prātyakṣikamānumānikamaupadeśikaṃ vā tajjātīyatvamavaseyamityakṣarārthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1504: sākṣāt janakatvaṃ gṛhītvā vyadhikāraṇatvaśaḍkā mā bhūdityavaśyaṃ darśanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1506: kathamayamartho vārttikāllabhyate ityata āha--pramāṇasya viśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1508: nanu tavāyamāśayo na tu vārttikakṛta ityata āha--tadidamuktamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1510: na hi pratipattipravṛttisāmarthyayoḥ pratipādyapratipādakabhāva ityata āha--ayamartha iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1514: yadyapyapavargasya sukhaduḥkhataddhetubhāvo nāsti, ata eva tathātvenāryamāṇatayārthapadena sarvasaṃgraho 'pyaśakyaḥ, tathāpi tadabhyupagame vyāghāta eva sphuṭa iti sa evoktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1515: sa ca śāstrāvatāreṇa yadi hyapavargaḥ sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā heyaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1521: pramāṇaṃ tu pramāṇāntareṇa heyaṃ sadanavasthāṃ sāvakāśayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1522: tataśca saiva pramāṇavyaktiḥ tenaiva pramāṇena hātavyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1526: tasmādubhayathāpi svātmani kriyāvirodhena paramapuruṣārthahetutvena ca pramāṇaṃ na śakayahānam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1527: na caive satyahānirevāsya syāt, svocchedakakāraṇavaśenopādeyasya puruṣaprayatnenāśakyahānasyāpi sukhavaducchedādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1536: ekadeśyupālambhe pūrvahetubhiḥ saha hetvantarasya samuccayaṃ darśayannāha--na kevalamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1539: tadabhāve vā kathaṃ sattvavyavahāra ityata āha--na tāvaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1540: anavasthāprasaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ tarkaṃ darśayatā tadviparyaye mānasameva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1541: ajñātoparatajñānavyavahāre tu kālāntare tadviṣayaṃ smaraṇameva nimittam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1542: evaṃ ca sāmānyākāreṇa jijñāsānurodhāt jajjñānamastyeva, ajñātasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1545: yadi jñānaviṣayaṃ jñānamavaśyaṃ jñāyeta, avaśyaṃ vā vijñāsyeta tadā jñānaparamparālakṣaṇā anasthā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1548: bhāṣyagrantheneti vadatā na kevalamarthavirodhaḥ granthavirodhaścetyapi pratipāditaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1550: nanvarthaśabdasya prayojanavattave 'pi virodhavyadhikaraṇatve tadavasthe evetyata āha--candanādīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1552: atha kimabhipretyāprastutameva bhāṣyakṛto idaṃ prastūyata ityata āha--evaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1554: na pramāṇaprayojanaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pramāṇasya bhūtārthatvādita bhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1558: sarvasādhāraṇanīlādivaidharmyeṇa hi kālpanikatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya vyutpādayatā nīlādi paramārthikameva svīkartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1560: na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpāramārthikatve nīlādi pāramārthikaṃ bhavitumarhati, nityatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1561: tasmād yo nīlādi paramārthikamicchati, tena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1573: aniyataḥ candanāt sukhameva kaṇṭakād duḥkhameveti niyamarahitaḥ, aniyata hetukatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1578: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yathā keṣucit kāladeśāvasthāsahakāriṣu satsu meghāḥ salilamudvamanti, keṣucit tu satsu ta eva salilaṃ pibanti, tathā candanādayo 'pi keṣucit satsu sukhamupajanayanti keṣucicca duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1580: nanvarthavati ca pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti bhavanti jñāyanta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1584: na ca vācyam, vaidikī pratipattirarthāvyabhicāriṇī āptopadeśajapratipettitvāditi śakayata eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1587: tathāpi loke tāvadevamastīti cet? ata āha--adṛṣṭārtheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1588: yadyapi tatsamavāyaḥ pramāsamavāyaḥ pramātṛtvamiti prakṛtopayogi syādeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1594: tena pacatītyādau sarvatrātiraścīnapākādivyāpāravato devadattādereva kartṛtvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1595: pācayatītyādau tu prayojyavyāpārapratītāvapi tasyānyatiraścīnatvāt na tadvataḥ kartṛtvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1600: svavyāpārāpekṣayā na karaṇādivyavahāraḥ, kiṃ tu pradhānakriyāpekṣayetyabhiprāyaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1602: pradhānakriyāpekṣayā ityetadeva kuta ityata āha-- avāntareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1604: asti hi kāñcit kriyāmuddeśya pravartamānānāṃ kārakāṇāmavāntaravyāpārayogaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1606: nanu na sarvo vyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyā vā puruṣamāśrayate, tat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1614: tathā ca tatprayoktṛtvamityatra tasya prayokteti vigrahaśaḍkā mā bhūdityāśāyavānāha---tasya cetanasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1615: etena sa cāsau prayoktā ceti vā tasya cetanasya prayoktṛtvaṃ dharma iti vā vigraha ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1618: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe parisamāpte itarāprayojyatvamityanena cetanaprayukti prati svātantryamitareṣāṃ vyavacchindatā parasparaprayojanakatvamapi vyavacchinnam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1620: tathā ca yathā kāryaṃ kartradhīnaṃ tathā kārakāntarādhīnamityubhayavyāptāt kāryādekatarāpāye 'pyanyatarāpāya iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1622: acetaneṣu tu kartṛvyavahāraḥ kathamityavaśiṣyate tatrāha--acetanasya tviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1624: tattvaṃ hi pramāṇavyāpyatvaṃ pramāṇavyāpāraviṣayatvamiti vadataḥ karaṇavyāpāraviṣayaḥ karmeti karmalakṣaṇa saṃmatam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1626: prakṛte ca pradhānavyāpāraḥ pramitilakṣaṇa iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1628: anena vārttikasthasya viniyogasya viṣayaniṣṭhatvaṃ darśayatā yogyatāpi viṣayagataiva draṣṭavyetyapi darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1631: tenāyamarthaḥ viniyogo vārthagatastadyogyatājñānaṃ vā caturvargasya paryavasānamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1647: nirjaraṇaṃ nirjaraḥ tapaścaraṇam, nigaḍakaṭakābhyāmivāyaṃ baddho 'svatanatro jīva ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1654: tacced bhavadabhimate abhāve 'pyasti so 'pi sadvyavahāraviśayaḥ prasakta iti ṭīkārthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1655: na ca vayamityādinā abhāvasya sāmārthyamaḍgīkṛtam, na tu sāmarthyena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1658: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ saditi vyavahniyate, na cāstipratyayaviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1659: asaditi vā vyavahniyate na ca nāstipratyayaviṣayaḥ iti prakāraṇārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1666: tathāpyabhāvidhau kimāyātam? na hi nīlaniṣadhe pītādividhiravaśyamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1670: santyeva hi kecid vādino ye vipakṣadaṇḍamapaśyantaḥ pratyakṣaparikalitamapahnutya śaḍakāmutthāpayanti, tān sāṃkhyādīn prati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1676: nanu yadyasadbhedāḥ prakṛtānupayoginaḥ, tadā anupayogādeva nocyanta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1679: pāratantryeṇa pratibhāsanāt nocyanta iti kkopayujyata ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1683: tadidamuktaṃ gamyanta iti nāktā ityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1684: nanu yadyupāyapratipādanenaiva pratipāditā iti noktāḥ, tarhi prameyādayo 'pi pramāṇapratipādanenaiva pratipāditā iti kiṃ tatkathanenāpi? atha pratītā api prayojanaviśeṣādabhyarhitatayā pratipādyante, hanatāsadbhedā api upayuktāstathā kiṃ netyata āha--atha veti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1685: nanu bhāvaprapañcavadabhāvaprapañce 'pyuddiṣṭo veditavya iti pratijñāter'the caturvargānantarbhāvāditi heturbhāgāsiddho viruddhaścetyata āha-niḥśreyaseti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1687: tadadhikāraṇatayā tathābhūta eva bhāvaprapañco dṛṣṭānto nocyata iti sādhyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1691: ata evoddiṣṭo veditavya iti anupalabdhibādhitaṃ manyamāna
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1705: asmākaṃ ca yathā bhābhāvastamaḥ [vai. sū. 5.2.19] ityevamādiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1716: tat kataradatra pāramārthikamityata āha--dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthikaṃ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1718: sūtrasya saprapañca tātparyam--pramāṇata ityādiprapañcaḥ, sacca khalu ṣāḍaśadhā vyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1720: tāsāṃ khalvāsāmityavatārabhāṣyasya, na tu sūtra pāṭhasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1730: tatrāpi sādharmyavaidharmyavipratipattijanyānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ parasparanirapekṣāṇāmeva nyāyapravartakatvamiti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1735: avayavānāṃ tu yadyapyekasmin vākyārthe pratipādayitavye mithaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1739: yatra tu nirdeśo nāsti tatra lakṣaṇe yathāvacanaṃ vigrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1743: arthaśabdaḥ pradhānakriyāvacano na kvacid dṛṣṭa itya āha--yaduddeśeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1744: kārakāṇāmavivakṣetyetāvataiva susthe pradhānakriyāyā avivakṣā kimarthamityata āha--kārakagrahaṇeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1745: nanu kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣalakṣaṇa tadā syād yadi tatra kārakatvaṃ saṃbhavet, tadeva tu nāstītyata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1750: tasyāsvatantratvāt pramāṇādayo gamyanta iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1752: na pramāṇādimātramucyate tattvaśabdena atha ca nārthāntaraṃ tattvamiti parasparavyāhatamityata ekadeśinaṃ kiñciduddīpayati--abhede 'pītīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1753: anāropitarūpeṇa svarūpataḥ pratīyantāṃ pramāṇādaya ityetadarthamanatiriktārthamapi tattvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1755: vyavahāragativastugatyoḥ samānayogakṣematvaṃ manyamāno hyabhāvamapahnotuṃ na śaknotyeva, abhāvavyavahāragateḥ sarvavādisiddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1760: nanu dṛṣṭāniḥśreyasadūṣaṇe kiṃ tātparyam? na hi tadasmānna siddhyatītyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1765: aprāmāṇikaṃ darśanābhāvāditi darśanaphalaikonneyaṃ pramāṇa kathaṃ tadabhāve 'pyastīti bhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1777: ātmanyeva ca santuṣṭastasya kāryaṃ na vidyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1792: pratyakṣamapi draṣṭavyam, evaṃ śarīrādiṣvapyūhyam, anumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti vipratipannaṃ pratipipādayiṣatāmiti śeṣaḥ upaniṣadāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1795: santānānumānasya ca pṛthagupadeśācca prameyasya pramāṇādibhyaḥ prathamasūtre etadvivaraṇādvacavacchetturagranthamevāvatārayati--yadi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1798: tadiyatā prabandhena vārttikakṛtā kiṃ kṛtamityata āha--tadaneneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1800: nanu dvitīyasūtrārtho nātroditaḥ, tat kathaṃ tatrānūdyata ityata āha--
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1802: atra ca hetvādyanuvādatrārttikaṃ nāstyevetyanāśaṅkanīyam, ṭīkākṛtā siddhavadutthāpitatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1805: vyācaṣṭa iti tu yad vyākhyātam, tadabhiprāyaṃ tena taccaitaduttarasūtreṇānūdyate ityasyānuvādānantaramavyākhyāne 'pi na doṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1806: evaṃ cārthaṃ dvitīyasūtra ityādinā pūrvameva vyākhyātatvāt tu nehedaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1807: nanu dveṣaḥ kiheya eva na vā pravṛttiheturityata āha--upalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1808: nanu hānapadamātyantikapadasamabhivyāhārādapavarge vartate, tat kathaṃ tattvajñānamityucyata ityata āha--hīyate hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1813: arthapadānīti bhāṣyagatasyārthapadasya tvanyathārtho bhaviṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tadāha--puruṣārthasthānānīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1816: prasthānaṃ prakāra itthambhāvaḥ tathā cetthambhūtatvādānvīkṣikyā iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1820: pratyayārthastu saṃśayādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate iti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇaiva darśitaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1821: tadetaduktaṃ bhavati, nyāvyutpādane vyāpāravattayā hi iyamānvīkṣikī vidyāntarād bhidyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1823: tato 'syāḥ saṃśayādayo 'pi viṣayabhūtāḥ tānantareṇa nirviṣayatayā vidyaiva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1826: na hyanyā vidyāḥ svaṃ svamarthaṃ pratipādayantyo 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1831: nāpi pramāṇapravṛttiviṣaya upalabdho bhavannirṇota eva bhavedityata ākṣepturabhiprāyantaraṃ darśayati--pañcarūpa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1832: yathā pratyakṣamāgamo vā ajñāte 'pyavatarati, tathā asandigadhe 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1833: anumānaṃ tu yathā nājñāte tathā asaṃdigdhe 'pi tasmādasyānyaiva rītirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1835: samāmānādhikāraṇyaṃ na samarthayasa iti, na tādātmyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1837: na tu tādātmyamityabhipretya parihāraṃ vivṛṇoti--sāmānya viśeṣayoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1838: saṃdigdhe pravartave ityasya yogyatāparatāṃ darśayati-asaṃdigdha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1839: saṃśayānarhaśca prakāradvayena, sarvathā ajñāto viśeṣato vā nirṇātaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1843: nanu kiṃ punaḥ prayojanamiti praśne yena prayuktaḥ pravartata ityuttaraṃ vaiyātyādityata āha--sphuṭataramevaitaditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1844: nanu vayaṃ nviti svābhimatapradarśanamekadeśimate aparitoṣaṃ sūcayitum, na cāparitoṣabījamupalabhāmaha ityatastadvījaṃ praśnapūrvakameva tāvad darśayati--tatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1846: tathā ca dharmādiviṣayastātsādhanaviṣayo vā kāmastatrāpi pravartaka ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1853: tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati, na hi dharmādiṣu dharmatvādikameva pravṛttiṃ prati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1857: nanu yathāśrute ko doṣo yena viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣayatīti vyākhyetyata āha--asatyoriti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1861: iha phalajñānamanyatra pravartavat tatsādhana eva pravartayatīti ato nātiprasaṅga ityevaṃ yadyapi śaṅkitumucitam, tathāpi tatsadhanatvenājñāne pravṛttireva nāsti ityatastajjñānamantarbhāvya āśaṅkate--tatsādhanatvajñānāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1863: evaṃ tarhi sukhaduḥkhāptihānibhyāmiti vārttikamasaṅgatameva kimityata āha--etaduktaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1869: etadeva ca tasya sākṣātpravartakatvaṃ yat sākṣāt prayatnajananasamarthāmicchāṃ prasūte /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1871: uddeśyajñānaṃ tu tadviṣayāmicchāṃ janayat tathābhūtatatsādhanajñānajananadvāreṇa ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1873: nanu parīkṣāśabdasya vicāraṇārthatve prayojanāpekṣitvaṃ kadācid yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1874: sa cet nyāyārthastasya ca vyutpattibalena pramāṇamātramarthaḥ, tasya ca na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1878: nanu avayavairarthasya parīkṣaṇamadhigatiryadi nyāyaḥ, tarhi kiṃ tasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1881: atha yadi parīkṣāparanāmā nyāyo nānumeyaviṣayaḥ, kutastadadhigamo bhaviṣyatītyata āha--parīkṣitaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1882: atha yathā pramāṇamūlairavayavairliḍgāṃ pratipādyate tathānumeyameva kiṃ netyata āha--na tviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1886: tathā cārthasya liṅgasya parīkṣādhigatirna pramāṇphalaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1888: na sākṣādityādinā liṅgādhigatāvavayavānāṃ svātantryaṃ nirākurvatā adhigaterapramāṇaphalatvamapāstam, avāntaravyāparatvaṃ cāvedayatā avayavānāmānarthakyamapāstamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1889: pramāṇatvāviśeṣai'pi tasyaiva vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ nānyasyetyatrāpi hetuṃ paraḥ prakṣyatītyatastathaivāha--samasteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1891: yatastasmāda vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakaḥ tataśrva parama iti vyavahriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1903: nanu viruddhārthaṃpariccheda eva pramāṇavirodhaḥ, sa cātra pratyakṣeṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1904: sphuṭatara eveti kimartha praśnaḥ kaḥ punarityata āha--idamatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1909: nanu yadi rūpatrayasaṃpattireva avinābhāvaḥ tadā kathaṃ bādhayā saha saṃbhavaḥ? ihaiva saṃbhavādityata āha--bādhāyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1911: ato na ca sapakṣetyādiśaḍkā na niravakāśā bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1912: yatredaṃ tatredamityākāreṇa pakṣasyāpi sādhanavataḥ sādharmyavattāpratītiḥ sarvopasaṃhāraḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1913: ayaṃ ca yatra nedaṃ sādhyamasti tatrāpyetat sādhanamabhimatamastītyetāvanmātreṇaiva bhajyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1914: eṣa ca vyabhicāraprakāraḥ pakṣe 'pi na nivārayituṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1915: na bādhasya svātantryeṇa dūṣaṇatvaṃ vyabhicārāt pakṣadharmatāvirahiṇi tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1917: vyabhicārādyutthāpanena tu viroghaḥ caritārtha iti pūrvapakṣārthaṃḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1918: anumānāviṣaye prayoga iti yathāśrute vārttike parābhimatamapakṣadharmatvameva sphuṭamapakṣasyaivānumānāviṣayatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1927: nanu kṛtakasya tejaso baddhau viparivartānatve yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sarvo 'nuṣṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1930: na hi yadyatra na sphurati tadapi tasya viṣaya ityata āha--sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛtaka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1931: anenākāreṇa so 'pi buddhau viparivartata eva, na tu viśeṣākāreṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1934: atha sāmānyākāreṇāpi tejo 'vayavinaḥ kimityavakāśo deyo yāvatā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1936: na hi samānyākāreṇa vyāptaugṛhyamāṇāyāṃ pratyakṣabādhāt prāgeva tejo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1938: tathā ca na kevalaṃ sa eva na dṛṣṭaḥ, pṛthivyādayo 'pi kecinna dṛṣṭā eveti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1941: adṛṣṭeṣu vyabhicārāśaṅkayā na vetyubhayathāpi sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1944: na hi vyāptyanapavāde vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ samastīti hṛdayam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1947: iha vyāpterapavādaḥ pakṣatāmaparibhūya, tatparibhave vā? tatrādyaṃ tāvad dūṣayati--neti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1948: pravṛttānumānāpratirodhe vyāpterapavāda iti kutaḥ? tatpratirodhaṃ tu viparītapratyakṣaṃ na cet karoti, ko 'paraḥ kariṣyatītyāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1949: nanu yadi pakṣe 'pi vyabhicāraḥ saṃbhavati, sa nodbhāvya iti kasyāyaṃ daṇḍa ityata āha--anyatheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1950: na na pakṣadharmatāmaparibhūya pratyakṣeṇa vyabhicāraḥ śakyagrahaḥ, na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ saṃdigdhasādhyadharmā dharmo tadviraheṇa nirṇotaśceti śūnyahṛdayaṃ prati tu pratibandirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1954: yathā hi sādhyaviparītapravṛttireva sādhyanivṛttiḥ, tathā viparītapramāṇapravṛttireva sādhananivṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1955: anyathā viparītapramāṇapravṛttāvapi yadi sādhakaṃ na nivartate tadā tadāyattaṃ sādhyamapi na nivarteta, tadanivṛttau tu na pakṣatvakṣatiriti na vyabhicārāvakāśa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1958: nanu yadi nāmānumānanivṛtteḥ pūrvamapakṣadharmatvaṃ vyabhicāro boddhārayituṃ na śakyastathāpi taduttarakālaṃ tāvacchākyata eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1960: yāvaddhi pratyakṣavirodhenānumānaṃ na dūṣyate, tāvad vyabhicārādyavakāśo nāstyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1962: tena ced dūṣitamanumānam, kimābhyām? na hi mṛto 'pi māryata iti siddhāntasaṃkṣepaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1963: nanvaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ śabdāsattvamabhipreyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1965: atha tatra virodho 'sti, tat kiṃ svarūpāpalāpe sa nāsti? tasmādabhiprāyaḥ parasya niyantuṃ na śakyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1978: asamāsapakṣe 'pi samānādhikāraṇayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayormadhye viśeṣaṇenaiva na saṃbadhyate, tatraivāsya sāmarthyamanvayayogyatā yataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1979: tadihobhayathāpi saḍketabalādanvayayogyatābalād vā na naḥ śabdapadena saṃbandha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1983: śrūyamāṇo hyartho yena vinā nopapadyate sa tenākṣipyamāṇor'thād āpadyata ityucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1988: tathā ca nāsattvādhikaraṇatvayorvirodha ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1992: nanu yadi saṃbandhaḥ, kathaṃ vārttikakāro vṛttirityāhetyata āha--vṛttiriti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1993: nanu na sākṣād vede naraśiraḥ kapālāśaucaṃ śrūyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1996: sa eva naraśīrṣamaṃpasaṃdadhāra iti viparitaiva śrutiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1998: yadyapyasminnarthe na sākṣāt śrutiḥ pratīyate, tathāpi tanmūlā smṛtireva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2004: kutaḥ punarasya nirghṛṇasya kapālaśaucābhimāna ityata āha--avigītā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2007: na ca vācyaṃ sārvatriko vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2012: atha śreyohetutaivāsyāḥ kuto nāvasīyata ityata āha--na khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2013: yadyapi śakyata evaitadāpātataḥ, tathāpi nirmūlatvaśaḍkālakaḍkitatvenānuṣṭhānaparyantatāṃ na yāyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2016: kimuktaṃ bhavati śucītyanena punaruktatāṃ pariharannāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2018: na ca vācyam, yāvati vivādastāvānevārthaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2025: na hi pūrvapravṛttena yadeva tadeva bādhyate, aniyamaprasaṅgāt, ata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2029: svasādhakena bādhitaṃ tu yathaikasantatipatitāni jñānāni ekapratipattṛvirahe 'pi pratisandhānayogyāni kāryakāraṇabhāvādityapi draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2037: tat kimidānīṃ satpratipakṣatā nāstyevetyata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2038: evametad vastutaḥ satpratipakṣatā nāstyeva, kiṃ tvagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣavasthāyāṃ pramānutpādakatvaṃ parasparapratikṣepeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2043: tatastebhyo na kaścidanumānasya viśeṣa uktaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2045: nanu yathā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣāvasthāyāmanumānayoḥ satpratipakṣatvaṃ tathā pratyakṣānumānayorapyastu tataḥ kva bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ? atha viśeṣeṇa gṛhīte pratyakṣamanumānasya bādhakamiṣyate, anumānamapyevamiṣyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2054: na hyananyathāsiddhaṃ tattvena bādhituṃ śakyate aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2058: na ca yatra pratyakṣamanyathāsiddhaṃ tatrānumānenāvaśyamanyathāsiddhena bhavitavyam, ubhayorananyāsiddhau vastu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2059: dustaraṃ vyasanamāsādayet, tatastadapi tenaiva paribhūtam, kiṃ tatra pratyakṣabādhayeti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2061: tasmād yāvat pratyakṣasyānanyathāsiddhatvaṃ nāvadhāryate, tāvatkālameva tatra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2066: anyaprakāravyavasthāpanaṃ ca viṣayasekocamātreṇa na bādhakaṃ vinā bhrāntatvenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2071: anyathāsiddhapratyakṣāgamasamutthāpitamupamānamanumānena yadi vādhyate satpratipakṣyate vā, tadā tathābhūtau pratyakṣāgamāvevābādhitau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2074: tasamād yathā tābhyāmanumānamapanudyate tathā tadutthāpitaphalaśarīreṇopamānenāpīti ṭīko pabṛṃhitasya vārttikasyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2076: vādajalpau saprayojanāvityādibhāṣye yadyapi prayojanamaṅgatayā śrūyate tathāpyaḍgi pratyetavyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2077: tenāyamartho bhāṣyasya, prayojanaṃ tāvad vādajalpau vyāpnoti, vitaṇḍāṃ tu vyāpnoti na veti cintyata iti vivaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2078: nanu vādajalpayoḥ prayojanavattvasiddhau vitaṇḍāyāstaccintyetāpi, tayoreva tu prayojanavattvaṃ kena bhāṣyeṇa pratipāditamityata āha--tatra
