GSP29nvtp1_1u:2080: vakṣyati hi pṛthagupadiṣṭa upalākṣaṇārtham, upalakṣitena vyavahārastattvajñānārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2082: asādhāraṇatayeha tatraśabdena bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitamatastadeva vārttikakṛtā vyākhyātamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2083: nanu tathāpi tatra nyāye vivecayitavye iti yuktaṃ , na hi nyāyābhāsa eva viveka pradhānamityata āha--nyāyāmāsa iti tu sannidhānāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2090: yadyapi parapakṣadūṣaṇenāpi prayojanena vitaṇḍāyāḥ saprayojanatva siddhacati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2092: iti vacanāt, yadi ca parapakṣadūṣaṇamapi nādhikuryāt tadā vaitaṇḍika eva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2093: tathāpyetadeva svayaṃ kiñcidapyanabhyupagacchato na syādityataḥ pāriśeṣyādapi svapakṣasiddhim abhisaṃdadhānasyaiva pravṛttiryuktetyāśayaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2094: nanu nāstyevāsau vādī yaḥ kiñcidapi nābhyupagacchet, antato narthasyaivābhyupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2095: tadanabhayupagame tu kiñcidapi nābhyupagacchāmītyetadapi na brūyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2098: anena hi parapakṣo nāmyupagamyate na punaḥ parapakṣapratiṣedho
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2105: nanu na hi yadeva pratyeti, tadevābhyupagacchati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2106: tathā sati prativādivacanārthaḥ pratītaścedabhyupagataḥ syādita matānujñā nigrahasthānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2119: atha lakṣaṇasūtravyāghāta eva kasmānna bhavati, yāvatā tadapi pratyakṣāpratyakṣasādhāraṇamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2124: dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthagāha bhāṣyakāraḥ, vārtikakāro 'pi tathaivānumanyata ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2128: tathāpyanumānāśrayatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāsaṃgataṃ liṅgasya pakṣāśrayatvāt tajjñānasya cāmāśrayatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2131: evaṃ ca satyanumānanimittatvāt pakṣasyāpi pṛthagabhidhānaṃ syāditi na codyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2134: agniṣṭomena yajeta svargakāmaḥ ityādau tamantareṇaiva vākyārthapratīterityata āha--saṃbandhagrahaṇaviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2137: yattu tatpramāṇye tadviṣayagocarānumānābhiprāyeṇa dṛṣṭāntāpekṣā āgamasyāpyastīti kaiścid vyākhyātaṃ tat pūrvaṃ jñātaṃ cārthaṃ parasmā ācaṣṭa iti vadatā vārtikakṛtaiva apāstam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2145: nanu vādādipravṛttyarthaṃ pratitantrasiddhānta evopayujyate, tat kimaparairityata āha--tatheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2146: nanu yata eva sarvatantrasiddhānta na vipratipattiviṣayaḥ, ata eva na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2149: yadyapi svarūpeṇa sarvatantrasiddhānto na vādādipravṛttyaṅgam, tathāpi pratitantrādisiddhāntotthāpanadvārā nyāyāśrayatayā copayujyeta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2151: kimāśrayaśrva nyāyaḥ syāt? asati sarvatantrasiddhānta iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2153: sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhānasāmānyamiti sādhanaviśeṣāt sādhyaviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ gamyeteti yojanā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2155: adhikaraṇasiddhāntena hi phalena viṣayeṇa vā pakṣadharmatā phalavatī viṣayavatī vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2156: tadabhāve tu sā niṣphalā nirviṣayā vā, tathā ca vyāptirapi sāmānyaviṣayā satī kevalā sāmānyamātramupanīya pakṣe kathaṃ vyavasthāpayet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2157: avyavasthāpya ca kathaṃ kṛtārthā syāt? tathā cānumānamātram ucchidyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2158: evaṃ ca kva nyāyaḥ? kva vā vādāyata iti? tasmādadhikaraṇasiddhānto 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2159: pakṣadharmatāphalaviṣayatayā avaśyaṃ vyutpādanīyo yena vyāptirapi tatsahāyā satī phalavatī syāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2168: tathāpi na samūho vyutpādita ityata āha--tadaneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2174: athānubhava eva kasmānna bhavati? na hyantyapadaṃ nānubhūyata eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2175: tathā sati smaryetāpi kathamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2176: tathāpyevaṃbhūtasyāpi tadasya smṛtiranubhūtimantareṇa na syādityata āha--saṃbhavanti tviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2177: astu tarhi tadanubhava evārthapratītyaṅgamityata āha--na caita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2182: yadi tu varṇānāṃ nirantarotpādavatāṃ nirantarā evānubhavāstadā vinaśyadavinaśyadavasthayoḥ upāntyāntyānubhavayoreva sahabhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2185: kāraṇasamuccayavaśād viṣayāsamuccayavataḥ pratyayasya svarūpasamuccayaṃ parasvīkṛtaṃ śaṅkate--na ca pūrveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2187: yadyapi sahakārilābhādaparaḥ saṃskārasyodbodho nāma nāsti, tathāpi na yaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2188: kaścit pratyayaḥ tasya sahakārī, sarvadā sarvasaṃskārodvodhe sarvasmṛtiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2192: tathā caikapraghaṭṭakenāpi vicitrajñānena viṣayīkṛto varṇāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ padabhāvena pratisandheyāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2196: atha tayorūtpādaḥ, sa eva padapratisandhānotpādātmā samayasaṃskārodbodhaḥ saṃbandhasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā saṃskārodbodhād vicitrapratyayasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2197: atha saṃbandhasmaraṇotpādaḥ vicitrapratyayasya vināśaḥ padatvānusaṃdhānasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2201: athāpi pūrvasmṛtiraśeṣapadāvagāhinyekaiva svīkartavyā ityata āha--evaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2202: anubhūtaṃ hi pratisaṃdhīyate, na taṃ prathamata eva, tathā ca pūrvavarṇāṇāmunabhūtatvena padatvānusaṃdhānasaṃbhave 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2205: tasmāt tadanantarameva padatvānusaṃdhānamiti suṣṭhūktaṃ, yadā padārthapratyāyane 'nubhavo na kāraṇamiti tadaupayikasmṛtyutpattau tu kāraṇameveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2207: prakaraṇādayastu yogyatāviśeṣatvāt tatraivāntarbhūtā iti tata eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2210: nanu kramānubhūtānāmapyekasmṛtisamārohaḥ saṃbhavatyeva, kiṃ tu padāni
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2216: nanu pratyekaṃ vyabhicāre hi parasparānugrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2217: na ca padakadambakapratisaṃdhānavat tadarthasmṛtirapi tathāvidhāṃ vākyārthapratyayotpatti prati vyabhicaratītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2218: ayamāśayaḥ, na tāvat tadārthā eva vākyārthe pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2220: nāpi ta eva smṛtāḥ, prakārāntareṇāpi smṛtānāṃ tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2221: nāpi ta eva padaiḥ smāritāḥ, padānāṃ padārthasmaraṇamātropayoge pūrvavat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2223: vākyārthapratītyupayoge tu teṣāṃ kathaṃ na taddhetutvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2226: tadarthānāṃ tu atītānāgatādirūpatayā kāraṇatvameva nāsti, kuto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2227: 'sādhāraṇatm? ata eva na smṛtisteṣāṃ vyāpāraḥ, kiṃ tu kāraṇībhūtānāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2229: tathā ca vyāpārāvyabhicāramādāya nirvyāpārāvasthāyā vyabhicāravatāmakāraṇatvābhyupagamo bahuvyākulayatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2234: na hi pratijñāvacanaṃ niśvāyakaṃ viśiṣṭasyeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2245: saprayojanaśca bhavati niḥśreyasena prayojanena prayojanavāṃśca jñāto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2249: tat khalu hetuvacanamanumānapratipādakaṃ parāmṛśyamānaliṅgapratipādakaṃ yadi syāt, tadā viṣayatayānumānena parāmṛśyamānena liḍgenānugrahītavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2250: na ca tasya parāmṛśyamānaṃ liṅga viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2251: nanu yadeva dṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ hetuvacanasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2256: dvitīyadaśanaviṣayaliḍgaṃ pratipādakaṃ na parāmṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ pratipādakamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2261: vyāptismṛtisahakāritānumitau, dvitīyāliṅgadarśanasyāpi vyāptismṛtisahakāritā parāmarśajñānajanana evetyubhayorapi saṃbandhasmṛtisahakāritāsāmyādanumānatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2264: nanu pratyakṣaviṣayasya smṛtitaḥ punarūpadarśanāditi vaktavye kuto viparītamabhihitamityata āha--yatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2265: yadyapi pūrvapratyakṣaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, tathāpyudāharaṇakāle tayāsmṛtyārūḍha eva vyāpriyata ityetāvatā tathaivoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2266: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣeṇa sahaikaviṣayatvamupacāre bījam, api tu samānavyāpāratvamapītyāha--punarūpadarśanāt panuḥ smaraṇāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2267: pratyakṣamapi hi vipratipatti paribhūya vyāptiviṣayatayā dṛṣṭāntaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2270: nanu yathā śabdatadarthayorūpanaye vārtāpi nāsti, tat kathamāha---yathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2272: yadyapi nigamane 'pi pramāṇaviśeṣasamāveśo 'styeva, tathāpi jātyabhiprāyeṇāyaṃ vivakṣitaḥ, na ca tatra catuṣṭavijātīyaṃ pramāṇamastītyatastadvyākhyānāt pūrvameva paramatvopapādanāya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2276: adhyāropo viniveśanaṃ vā bhrāntirvā na saṃbhavatītyata āha--adhyāropa iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2279: tadanena kiṃ punaḥ samarthyamiti pṛcchato 'bhisandhiḥ darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2286: bhago vāṃ vibhajatu, pūṣā vāṃ vibhajata, aryamā vāṃ vibhajatu ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2290: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghutasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2293: arthaikatvādekaṃ vākyaṃ sākāḍkṣaṃ cedvibhāge syāt iti jaiminīya vākyaikavākyatālakṣaṇamabhimatam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2294: nanu yadi vipratipannaḥ vākyenaiva paraḥ pratibodhayituṃ śakyate, atha vākye tadarthe vā vipratipadyamānaḥ kenopāyena bodhanīyaḥ? vākyāntareṇa cedanavasthetyata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2297: tasya prayojanaṃ vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā? atra cākṣepāvasare pratiṣadha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2298: viśeṣapratipādakatvamiti vadatā tattvavyavasthāśrayatvaṃ vivṛtam, tatra tattvaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2301: tatra viśeṣaḥ ka ityata uktama--dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmoti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2302: vākyāddhi sādhanadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmo sākṣāt pratīyate sādhyarūpadharmaviśiṣṭastu taddvāretyubhayamapi vivakṣitvā saṃmugdhamuktamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2303: nanu pramāṇāntaratve 'pi tarkasya pramāṇapadena saṃgraha eva sāmānyena viśeṣasya saṃkalanāt, tat kimityāha--na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2304: pramāṇāntaramiti? ata āha--pramāṇapadena hīti dṛṣṭo hi sāmānyaśabdenāpi kasyacidasaṃgrahaḥ kutaścit kāraṇādityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2311: etaduktaṃ bhavati, tarko hi pramārūpaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt liṅgadarśanavat,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2318: tadviparyayasya tu tena saha svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2320: na hi viparyayāparyavasitaṃ kvacidapi kṛtārthaṃ prasaṅgamīkṣāmahe //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2321: nanvevaṃ tarhi pramāṇasyāpi kevalasya na kvacidapi kṛtārthatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2322: tathā ca sati prasaṅgatadviparyayapiṇḍa eva pramāṇyaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2328: vārttikasya, yadyevaṃ nābhaviṣyat tadaivaṃ yuktatvamahāsyat, idaṃ cāyuktatvamupādāsyatetyata āha--itikāreṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2331: nanu bhavatīti pramāṇavyāpārāt prāgeva yadi niścitam, tadā tarkaḥ pramāṇameva syādityata āha-- saṃbhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2344: nanu na hi yadeva vidyate tadeva dṛśyata ityasti niyama ityata āha--tena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2346: tasmāt nāstīti phaladvāreṇa tarkasyānugrāhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2350: tadevamabhāvaviṣaye pratyakṣe 'pi tarkaṃ darśayatā anupalabdhiliṅgakānumānasya sādhyo 'bhāva iti saugatamatamapāstam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2358: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parīkṣakaistarkaḥ sahāyatvenopaneya iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2360: yajetetyatra samānapadopāttatvād bhāvyatvācca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyo bhavatu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2361: bhavatu, vā puruṣārthatvāt svarga iti saṃśaye tarkasyāvatāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2362: yadi sādhyo dhātvarthaḥ syāt, tadopadeṣṭurāptatvaṃ vidheśceṣṭopāyatvaṃ vākyasya tadabhidhāyakatvaṃ prekṣāvatā ca pravṛttirna syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2365: na hi yāgabhāvanāyāḥ svargaphalatve dhātvarthasyātatphalatve samānapadopāttattvabhāvyatvayoḥ kaścid vidodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2368: nanu pramāṇānugrahāya yuktatvāyuktatve vivecayati tarko na tu niścinoti iti kuto viśeṣādityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2369: kriyātipattiriti, kriyātipattiḥ pratyayopasthāpite ghaṭasattvadhātvarthasādhyatve eva kriyātipattiśabdena vivakṣite, na hyevaṃbhūtapratyayāviṣayo ghaṭo vā sādhyatayā dhātvartho vāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2371: yasminnāśraye tulyopalambhayogyatvena duḥkhatvena vā aniṣṭaprasaṃjakena hetunā upapannastarko yuktāyuktaviṣayaviścayasādhanaṃ bhaviṣyati sa eva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2372: tadanena prasajyamānasyāśrayāsiddhisādhanāsiddhī dirśite, pūrvaṃ tu svarūpāsiddhirdarśitā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2374: niyatasaṃbaddhasvaviṣaye viparyayāpekṣitve tu pāratantryāt na pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2376: nanu tarkapramāṇayorabhimataṃ bhedaṃ mīmāṃsāyā vedādabhedavādo virūṇaddhītyata āha--pramāṇeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2377: atha yathāśruta eva vārttikārthaḥ kāsmānna bhavatītyata āha--itikarttavyatātvaṃ cetyādinā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2378: nikāyaviśiṣṭābhiḥ rityasya vyākhyānasya śarīrendriyāṇāṃ śukraśoṇitāderāhārādibhūtakāryatvāt, tatkāryatvācca buddhivedanayornimittāntare pramāṇaṃ nāstīti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2379: vicitranimittatve sādhye bhedavatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpābhiprāyeṇānaikāntikaḥ syāt svarūpabhedavatāmapi ghaṭādīnāmavicitranimittatvādataḥ prakārabhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---vicitratvādityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2381: nanu nimittavaicitryamātraprasādhane siddhasādhanam, na hi nimittaṃ kiścid vicitram astītyetāvataiva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2384: nimittasya vaicitrye janmano vaivitryagrasaṅgaḥ nimittasyāvaicitrye janmano 'vaicitryaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2389: emistarkaiḥ pakṣadharmatāmupajīvya pravṛttairanugṛhyamāṇaṃ sāmānyavyāptibalapravṛttaṃ vaicitryānumānaṃ viśeṣavirodhaṃ paribhūyābhimataṃ viśeṣaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2390: nanu jātyā kiṃ phalanirṇayo nāstyeva, yena kālaviśeṣaṃ pṛcchati kadā punarityato 'bhiprāyamāha--syādetaditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2391: nanu nirṇayopādānaprayojane vaktavye nirṇītaprayojanasya tarkasya punarāvṛttau kiṃ tātparyamityata āha--saṃkalayyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2394: nanu yadyapi sarvatra jalpe nirṇayāvasānatvameva nāsti kvacidanirṇaye 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2395: puruṣāparādhataḥ kathāvicchedāt, tathāpi yatra nirṇayāvasānatvamasti, na tato jalpādanyatarādhikaraṇanirṇayāvasānatvena vādo vyavacchetuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2399: sā ca vivadamānayoḥ tattvabubhutsutayā tamuddhiśya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2404: jalpaḥ punaḥ kīdṛśa ityata āha--jalpe tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2406: tadayamarthaḥ, bhavatu nāma kvacita jalpato 'pi tattvanirṇayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2415: pūrvaṃ vādavyākhyānāvasare bhede heturuddeśyaviśeṣābhisandhiruktaḥ tadapekṣayā aparamapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2416: yau tau vādajalpayoḥ prayoktātau tāvekatrāvijigīṣayā anyatra vijigīṣayā viśeṣitau vādajalpau parasparato vyavacchindāte ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2417: dūṣayitum ekadeśivyākhyānaṃ tanmatena vyācaṣṭe iti yojyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2419: yadyapi vyabhicārādarśane 'pi avinābhāvo na sidhyati pṛthagabhidhānasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2421: tattvapratipattivyāghātahetutvaprayuktatvāt, tathāpi vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvāt sa eva darśitaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2422: tasmād vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantītyanena pṛthagabhidhānaprayojanamātraṃ pratipāditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2424: nanvevaṃrūpaprayojanalābho 'pi katham? na hi pṛthagabhidhānamātramatrapramāṇayituṃ śakyamityata āha---sāmānyeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2427: atha yadyetadeva vivakṣitamasya sūtrakṛtaḥ, tadā kimiti na kvacit śāstrapradeśe svayameva darśitavānityata āha--etāvāneveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2431: nanvagrevāde codanīyatvameva pratipādayati, iha tu vidyāprasthānabhedajñāpanārthatvaṃ varṇayati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2432: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha--vādajalpavitaṇḍā ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2435: yadi vidyāśabdenāsya vādādayo na vivakṣitāḥ kathamagre vādavyāpāraṃ darśayitvā jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ sarvāṇyeva nigrahasthānāni vyāpāratvenāha? tad yadayameva brūte nūnamayamasyārtho vivakṣita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2436: tadayaṃ tātparyasaṃkṣapaṃḥ, na tāvadajñātasvarūpa vadajñātavyāpāraphalabhedā vādādayaścetanenādhiṣṭātuṃ śakyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2438: tasmāt svarūpavad vyāpāraphalabheda apyamīṣāṃ pratipādanīyā bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2439: ata eva caturthe phalamapi darśayiṣyati sūtrakāraḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2441: na tu teṣāmasti saṃbhavati prayoga iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2442: nanu lakṣaṇena padārthasvarūpaṃ na vyavasthāpyate, api tu vyavasthitaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2443: jñāpyate, tat kuto lakṣaṇatantrtvamityata āha--lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2444: nanu yadi pṛthagabhidhānenaiva vāde codanīyatvaṃ pratipādyate, kathaṃ nyūnādhikāpasiddhāntānāṃ pṛthaganabhidhāne tatra codanīyatvapratipattiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2445: athānyathāpi teṣāṃ tad gamyata eva tadā hetvābhāseṣvapi sa eva prakāro
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2448: na hi hetvābhāsāḥ pṛthagabhihitā ityeva vāde codanīyatvaṃ teṣāṃ gamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2449: api tu vādasya tattvapratipitsukathātvāt, hetvābhāsānāṃ cānudbhāvane tattvapratipattivyāghātāt tattvabubhutsunā avaśyamudbhāvanīyāste /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2452: ayameva ca nyāyo viśeṣataḥ pṛthagabhidhānena sūcitaḥ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2454: evaṃ ca vyavasthite vārtikakṛto 'pi praśno nāprāstāvika ityāha--tatra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2457: apratibhādyudbhāvanena? atha na tadarthatvaṃ tayoḥ, kiṃ tadavatāreṇa? na cānyārthatve tayoretacchāstravyutpādyatvamityata āha--sāhaṅkāro hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2460: taccāpratibhādyudbhāvanaṃ vinā na syāditi tattvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā kartavyamevedamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2461: nanuc chalādīnāṃ parijñānaṃ na sākṣānniḥśreyasa upayujyate ātmādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2464: na ca parijñānameva phalam, apuruṣārthatvādityata āha--parijñānasya ca phalamuktamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2466: svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti granthasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt kimuktaṃ bhavatīti tatsvarūpapraśno 'saṃgata ityataḥ pūrayati--anena bhāṣyeṇeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2467: bhāṣye prayojanāntarābhidhānaṃ na sūtrakṛdabhihitaprayojanavirodhi, kiṃ tu tadanuguṇam evetyāśayavān sautraṃ prayojanamanuvadati--sūtrakāreṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2470: tenāyamartho bhāṣyasya, yataḥ sarvaṃ prekṣāvatprayojanamānvīkṣikīvyutpādyapramāṇamūlam, ato niḥśreyasasya paramapuruṣārthasya tanmūlatāyāṃ viparyayaśaḍkaiva nāsti, atanmūlatve puruṣārthatvahāniprasaṃgāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2474: kimānvīkṣikyā tatra prakāśayitavyam? tatpramāṇaireva prakāśitattvādityata āha--yadyapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2475: vyutpāditena pramāṇādīnā tatra vyavahārastadvyutpattistvita eva, na tu tata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2476: nanu praṇetṛśrotrapramāṇopajīvanamānvīkṣikyāmapi samānamato na vidyāntarād viśeṣa ityata āha--na tu pramāṇādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2477: pramāṇopajīvane samāne 'pi yathaitadvyutpādyamupajīvanti tāḥ, naivaṃ tadvyutpādyamiyamapītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2478: nanu upajīvakatāsāmye 'pi parasparopajīvyopajīvakabhāvaḥ kva nāma dṛṣṭa ityata āha--yatheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2482: na tūpajīvakānumānamapekṣya pratyakṣādi, anumānāntaraṃ tu svaprāmāṇyavyutpādakamapekṣate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2483: tadapi na tadaiva, kiṃ tu prāgeva ityabhiprāyeṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2487: tasya grahaṇaṃ pramāṇādigrakāśitamarthamitarā vidyāḥ pratipādyante iti vārttikena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2491: tadevaṃ svarūpeṇāpekṣāṃ darśayitvā viṣayagatā apekṣā bhāṣyakṛtā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2494: nanu vidyāntarāṇāṃ śabdātmakatayā pramāṇatvāt tasya ca svapratipādye
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2496: pramāṇasya sataḥ svapratipādye pramāṇāntarāpekṣā nāsti, na tu svetikartavyatābhūtatarkāpekṣāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2498: atha tarkamanapekṣamāṇasya kiṃ syādityata āha--mā bhūditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2501: yadyapi satarkapramāṇapravṛttireva parīkṣā, tathāpīha gobalīvardanyāyena pramāṇasya svapadopāttatvāt prayojanajijñāsātarkā eva vivakṣitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2504: arthatattvaṃ padārthatattvaṃ vākyārthatattvaṃ vā, avadhārya pramāṇāntarādarthavādādeva vā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2506: evaṃ ca daṇḍanītyāṃ yathā yamo rājā kubero vā rājatyādi, vārttāyāṃ māghe parikarṣitā bhūmiḥ suvarṇamayaṃ phalamādhatta ityādi tarkānapekṣayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2509: viṣayamiti śeṣa ityatrāpi vidheyatayā niṣedhyatayeti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2513: guṇasya yathā arūṇayā somaṃ krīṇāti ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2523: vārttāyāmapi dravyasya yathā yathartu bījaṃ saṃgṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2536: na ca śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā vihitatvenārthatvameva bhavatu kā kṣatiriti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2537: vidhirhi pravartakaḥ svajñānena icchāmantarā kṛtvā prayatyanotpādakaṃ iti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2538: sa ca prayatno na sādhyaviṣayaḥ kartuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2539: upayo hi prayatnaviṣayo na tu phalam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2540: tasmāt prayatnaviṣayatvāt sādhanetikartavyate eva vidhīyete na tu sādhyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2542: na hi jñāpakatvamātraṃ vidhitvam, api tvicchāprayatnaviṣayajñāpakatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2543: tasmāt śyenādisādhyā hiṃsā anarthabhūtaivārthaḥ syād yadi vidhiviṣayaḥ syāditi sādhūktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2544: siddhānte pramāṇamādarśayanneva sādhyapadasamabhivyāhārastarhi kvopayujyate ityāśaḍkāmapanayati--atha sādhyāṃśamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2549: nanu bhavatvevaṃ tāvat tathāpyānvīkṣikyā kimāyātamityata āha--tadiheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2551: yathā ābhikhyāyāḥ prayojakatvaṃ kṣīrahomasthāne tadviniveśanād rasādisāmyāt, vājinasyāprayojakatvamavarjanīyotpattikatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2553: sarvā vidyā iti vidyaśabdena taddharmān lakṣayatīti na bhāṣyavyākhyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2556: tathā ca vidyāntarulenaivāsya phalavattvaṃ na punarasādhāraṇaṃ phalamasyā astītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2564: jalpādayo hi madādihetavaḥ parābhibhavopāyatvāt dravyaśarīrasaṃpattivaditi prayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2568: kiṃ tu pratipannasya tattvapratipattipālanārthaṃ duravaliptapratipādanārthaṃ ca tayoradhikāraḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2574: anvayavyatirekābhyāmeva tu siddhacatvityata āha--madamānādihetutvaṃ ca heturasiddha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2575: sati ca tattvavidāṃ na saṃbhavantīti vadatā yathāśrutasya parābhibhavopāyatvasyānaikāntikatvamapi sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2576: ato jalpāditattvajñānavatāmapi yadi mānādayo dṛśyante, na te taddhetukāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2594: yadyapi cātra vacana eva sākṣāt saṃśayaṃ darśayati, tathāpi taddvārā artha eva draṣṭavya iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2595: saṃbandhini ca prayojane tattvajñānakāryatayā parīkṣyamāṇe saṃbandha eva kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parokṣito bhavatīti tadeva parīkṣyatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2602: nanu jīvanmuktipakṣe tadvatāmavasthānaṃ na syāditi codyamānamanavakāśamityata āha--tadatyanteti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2603: nanu mā bhūt tattvajñānānantarameva niḥśreyasam, kā no hāniḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2605: yadyapi sākṣādevaṃ na pratijñātam, tathāpi tattvajñānaniśreyasayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sūtrakṛtā darśitaḥ, sa cānanantaryaniyama eva syāt, nāto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2609: [1.1.22] ityatāvadeva niḥśreyasamiti kena pratijñānaṃ yāvatā jīvanmuktirapi riḥśreyasaṃ bhavatyevetyata āha--na cānyaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2612: tadidakukta vārttikakṛtā--satyapi tattvajñāne yasyābhāvānnāpavṛjyate so 'nyor'thaḥ iti sphuṭaṃ vārttikamiti ṭīkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2615: yathāśrutaṃ vārttikaṃ na pūrvāpakṣācchādakaṃ na hyaparamapi niḥśreyasaṃ śāstrīyāt tattvajñānāt sākṣādbhavatīti, yasmācca sākṣādbhavati na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2621: pratipattyantaropāsanam? na hi niścayātiriktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya phalamityata āha--na cāyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2623: na hi niścayo mohaḥ aupadeśikenānumānikena vā tattvaniścayena nirākartuṃ pāryate, tadupāyānuṣṭhānena tu tayorūpyogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2624: tasmād ye vedāntino vākyārthajñānādeva muktimicchanti, te praṣṭavyāḥ, kiṃ bhavatāṃ vastusantamupāyopeyabhāvasaṃbandhamabhyupagamya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2625: savṛtisantaṃ vā? ādye 'dvaitasiddhāntakṣatiḥ, kāryakāraṇabhāvasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatayā tayoḥ paramārthikatve bhedasyāpi pāramārthikatvaprasaṃgāt, dvitīye tu kimaviśeṣeṇa pravṛttiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2627: dvitīye tu na śābdādānumānikād vā tattvajñānādaindriyakavyāmohavigamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2628: kiṃ tarhi, sākṣātkārādeva dṛṣṭa iti tathaiva tadarthinaḥ pravṛttiryuktā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2629: na ca vācyaṃ vākyādevātmasākṣātkārodaya iti, tasya kevalasya sāmarthyānupalambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2630: yadi tu svasaṃviditasvarūpatayā kiṃ tatra dhyānādikamapūrvamādhāsrūtītyucyate, tadā śruterapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2632: yadapi bhautadaśakanadīsaṃtaraṇamudāhṛtaṃ, tatrāpi na kevalenaiva vākyena sākṣātkāraḥ kiṃ tu cakṣurādinaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2633: ihāpi manasā sahakṛtena bhaviṣyatīti cet--na, anekadhā śrutaśruterapi satyapi ca paṭīyasi manasi brahmasākṣātkārābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2634: tat kasya hotoḥ? bhautānāmiva svaśarīre cākṣuṣasya dṛḍhatarābhyāsasya mumukṣormānasasyātmanyabhāvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2637: lokasiddhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvastāttviko bhavatu mā vā bhavatu sarvasya puruṣārthapravṛttasya tāvat sa eva śaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2639: yadi nāma catasraḥ pratipattaya ātmādau prameye, prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata āha--atheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2643: kiṃ tarhi? paramparayā saiva catasro hītyādinā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2650: na hi śravaṇāderiva pare niḥśreyase kartavye sākṣātkārasyāpi kiñcit kartavyāntaramastītyata āha--na caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2652: na tāvat prāyaścittasyādhikārāpattiḥ phalam, āgamamantareṇādṛṣṭakarmaṇāṃ phalaviśeṣakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt śrūyamāṇaphalaparityāgaprasaṃgācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2653: balavati bādhake sati nedamaniṣṭamiti cet--na, ananyathāsiddhasyāgamasya bādhakasahasreṇāpyapanetumaśakyatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2654: śakyatve vā surāpayetvānumānamapi durnivāramiti haitukānāṃ dattaḥ svahastaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2655: ata eva na prāyaścittācaraṇaduḥkhameva brāhmahatyādīnāṃ phalam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2658: tasmādadattaphalānyeva karmāṇi prāyaścittena kṣīyanta ityeva sādhu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2660: atra cāgamabalapravṛttā āgamenaiva bodhayituṃ yujyanta ityāśayavānāha,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2666: syādapyevaṃ yadi nābhuktamityādismṛteranugrāhako nyāyo na syāt, asti ca tathā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2674: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2675: [muṇḍaka. 2.2.8] iti śrutau paripanthinyāṃ kathamucyate 'sati bādhaka iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2678: na hīyaṃ śrutiradattaphalānāmeva karmaṇāṃ tattvajñānāt kṣayamāha, kiṃ tu kṣayamātram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2687: nanu bhogena prakṣayo 'nupapanna eva, karmarāśeranantatayā aniyatavipākakālatayā cetyata āha--yogarddhīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2690: ayamāśayaḥ--yadi tāvat karmaṇāmevāyaṃ mahimā, yadekadaiva nānāvidhadehādyavāntaravyāpāraistaistairūpabhogaḥ sādhyaḥ, kiṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2691: yogaprabhāvaparikalpanayā? atha naiṣa mahimā neṣām, tathāpi kva yogaprabhāvasyopayogaḥ? na hīśvaro 'pi karmaṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ viparyāsayitumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2693: evaṃ ced varamadattaphalānyeva yogaprabhāvāt kṣīyanta iti kalpyatāṃ lāghavāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2696: yathā hyupabhogādeva karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ, dehādiṣu satsveva copabhogaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2698: vṛttilābhaḥ, te ca sahakāriṇaḥ kvacitphalonneyāḥ yathā yugapadanekendriyopagrahe, kvacidāgamagamyā yathā vāsudevasaubhariprabhṛtīnāṃ kāyayaugapadya iti sarvatra pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2700: yathā ca mahāpralaye sarvakarmaṇāmekadaiva vṛttinirodha āgamaprāmāṇyādāsthīyate, tathā yogarddhikāle 'pi sarveṣāṃ vṛttilābha āstheya āgamaprāmāṇyādeveti na kiñcit svapratibhāmātreṇa kalpitamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2703: atha paraṃ niḥśreyasaṃ kīdṛśamityata āha--paraṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2707: na hyasti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukhu yādṛśamajñāninaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2708: tṛṣṇājanakam, na tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti yādṛśamajñānino dveṣajanakamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2710: upabhogaprayatna āstheyo mokṣāya tvaramāṇenāpi kāyavyūhādāviti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2711: yastu ta tvarate yadā bhavitā karmakṣayastadā bhavitā mokṣo 'pi kiṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2712: tvarayā? prāptā tāvannirapāyā bhūmiriti samarthitahṛdayaḥ, tasya tu niḥśreyasadvayayaugapadyaśaḍkāpi nāstīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2723: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu tasyāpi sa eva grāhya ityāha--yogyatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2724: kāraṇasya hi pūrvavartitvaṃ yujyata ityata āha--atra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2726: uttarasyānantaraṃ ca pūrvameva syāt, na ca pūrvaṃ kāryamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2729: mithyājñāne kāraṇe tatkāryā doṣāḥ avyavadhānenaiva ādau paṭhitā iti śeṣaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2737: keṣāmiti duḥkhādīnāmiti ca padaṃ kiṃ bhavatīti sākāḍkṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2752: nanu sūtre mithyājñānamātrameva śrūyate, tat kathamāha tatrātmādāvityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2755: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe badaraṃ saṃyogena paṭe vā śauklyaṃ samavāyenetyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2756: nanu na tāvat sattāmātreṇa sārūpyaṃ bhrāntāvupayujyate japākusumādisannidhānaparibhūtasitimni sphaṭhikādāvanupalabhyamānaviśeṣasmaraṇe 'pi rajatādiviparyāsābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2758: tadapyasaṃgatam, sārūpyasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatayā tatpratibhāsane bhedasyāpi pratibhānābhedāropānavakāśāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2761: na hīdamane, sadṛśamiti kṛtvā sārūpyagrahaṇamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2762: kiṃ tarhi? rajatādau yo dharmaścakacikyādiḥ upalabdhapūrvaḥ sa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2763: tajjātīyo vā purovartinyupalabhyate yadi tadā bhrānti, nāto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2766: yadyapi hastimaśakādāvapi yathā kathañcit sārūpyamastyeva, tathāpi vyavacdedakadharmeṇānabhibhūtaṃ sārūpyamihābhipratam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2767: vyavacchedakānabhibhūtatvaṃ ca tatra nāstītyataḥ sarvātmanā vā sārūpyamekadeśena vetyevamādi parāstaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2769: idamatra vivakṣitam, sārūpyaṃ hyāropyasyāropaviṣayeṇa cintyate, anyathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2771: prathame tu na tāvata pītaguṇī śuklaguṇini śaḍkhe āropyate, pītaṃ ciravilvamidamiti pratyayānudayāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2773: nāpi śuklatvasāmānyādhāre rūpasvalakṣaṇe pītaguṇaḥ, cākṣuṣapratītau śuklatvasāmānyānavabhāse tadādhārasya rūpasvalakṣaṇasya bhāsanāyogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2776: taddhi tadātmatayā vā āropyet, tatsaṃsargitayā vā? ādye śuklatvasāmānyādhārā vyaktiḥ pītatvasāmānyātmanā prathamānā na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2780: na ca pītatvasāmānyameva śuklaguṇavyaktirūpeṇaropyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2782: nāpi śuklatvasāmānyameva pītatvasāmānyatadātmatayā āropyeta, tathā sati śuklatvena śuklatvaṃ pratīyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2783: na hi tasyānyat kiñcid rūpamasti, yena pratītipathamavataret /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2784: sarvathā apratītaṃ ca nāropaviṣaya ityasaṃgatirevāsya kalpasya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2785: saṃsargitayā tu sāmānye āropyamāṇe śuklaguṇasya śuklatvenaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2787: tasmāt pītaguṇa śaṅkhe samāropyata iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2789: samādhatte--na tatrāpīti, na hyatra pītaguṇa āropyo 'pi tu pītaguṇaśca śaḍkhaśca āropaviṣayau, saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvatvaṃ tvāropyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2790: tathā ca saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvābhyāṃ guṇaguṇibhyāmanayoḥ asaṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvayoḥ sārūpyamiha prayojakam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2791: upadarśitaṃ ca taditi kimaprayojakena guṇisārūpyeṇa guṇasārūpyeṇa vā, satā asatā vetyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2793: tena vyādhikaraṇagrahaṇāviṣayīkṛtatvaṃ sārūpyaṃ tayoḥ, yathā pītimācirabilvayoḥ tathaiva pītimaśaḍkhayorityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2795: na caivaṃ sati tādātmyabhrame 'pi bhedāgraha eva sārūpyamastu, kṛtaṃ cākacikyādineti vācyam, tadantareṇa saṃskārānudbodhāt, tena ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2801: nanu sādṛśyaṃ ced bhrāntibījamupapāditam, tarhi sarvaṃ sarvatrāropyet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2802: asti hi kenacit kasyacit kathañcit sārūpyamityata āha--neti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2809: apsu daṇḍasya vakratābhrame taraṅgavakrimadaṇḍayorasaṃsargagraha ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2812: yathā hi, indriyādinā vinā nātmā duḥkhaṃ janayitumalam, evaṃ nendriyādikamapi tamantareṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2816: na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet te 'pi tādṛśāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2818: [pra.vā.1.227] iti taccaitadasādhīyaḥ tathā hi, na tāvadātmano hānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2820: nāpi dandaśūkadaṣṭāḍgulīvad viprayogādilakṣaṇam, nāpi sutamaraṇādivat pratipattinirodhalakṣaṇam, svasaṃvedanatvāditi vedāntinaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2821: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ---taddhi tadā syāt, yadi jñātasya sato duḥkhaṃ pratyātmano hetutvaṃ sutamaraṇāderiva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2829: yadyapi rāgādinivṛttiheturnairātmadarśanamiti guḍajihvikā, vastutastu na tāvannityātmābhāvadarśanamātraṃ rāgādinivṛttihetuḥ, cārvākādīnāmeva vītarāgatvaprasaṃgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2831: sāpi kiṃ śarīrādau, cetane vā? ādye siddhasādhanam, śarīrādavahaṅkārasya mithyātvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2832: tanmūlatvācca rāgadveṣayoḥ, tannivṛttau tayorapi nivṛttiriti ko nāma nābhyupaiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2834: tvanukūlameva, na hi śuktikāto rajataṃ bhedenāvyavasthāpayatastasya rajatabuddhiḥnivartate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2837: na hi te śarīrādiviviktam ahamiti pratiyanti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2839: jñānābhāvādeva, cetanasyāpīdantāspadatvādeva vā, tasminneva nāstitvādhyāropād vā? na tāvadādyaḥ, adṛṣṭitvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2841: yathā yathā dṛṣṭinirodhāya prayatnaḥ, tathā tathā dṛṣṭeḥ pratyāpatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2842: na cādṛṣṭereva rāgādayo vinivartante, yugasahāstramapi suptasya punarjāgarāvasthāyāṃ rāgādidarśanāt, nāpi dvitīyaḥ, ahamabhāve satīdamo 'pyabhāvāt, ātmāni sati parasaṃjñeti tvayaivoktaṃ yataḥ nāpi tṛtīyaḥ, grahaṇāgrahaṇayorūbhayorapi asaṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2843: yadi hyahamāspadaṃ cetano gṛhītaḥ, kathaṃ nāstitādhyāropaḥ? na gṛhītaścet kutra nāstitādhyāropaḥ? na ca prathamaṃ grahaḥ paścādāropa iti tvayā vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2847: tattabdahirūpaplavavirahe satīti cet? tarhi bahirūpaplavavirahe svātmapratiṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2850: cet? evaṃ tarhi svātmadṛṣṭirapi dṛṣṭirna syādityadṛṣṭitvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2851: anālambanatayā niḥsaṃbandhitvamaudāsīnyamiti cet? tarhi nirātmīyatādṛṣṭiṃ vadan kuto nairātmyadṛṣṭiṃ supta iva pralapasīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2854: vastutastu nāsti karma, nāsti karmaphalam, nāsti pretyabhāva iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2855: yāvajjīvet sukhaṃ jīvennāsti mṛtyoragocaraḥ iti nyāyamālambamānena prāṇivadhādattādānādāveva ghaṭitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2857: na ca santānamādāya pretyabhāvādidṛṣṭirūpapatsyata iti vācyam, tadā hi tamādāya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2859: arthācca pravartayet pravṛttinivṛttī ca saiva dṛṣṭiḥ karoti yā rāgadveṣau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2864: tasmād yaḥ paralokārtho tasya paralokinamātmānamaḍgīkṛtyaiva svarge
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2865: 'paparge vā prayatnaḥ, yastu nityamātmānaṃ nābhyupaiti tasya cārvākasya iva svargāpavargāveva na staḥ, kutastadarthā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2867: yattūktam--ātmānamabhyarhitaṃ paśyanniti so 'yaṃ kasya prasaṅgaḥ? kiṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2871: na hyātmocchedameva kaścidupakāratvena manute, api tu duḥkhaṃ jihāsamāna ātmānaṃ jahāti, ātmānamanapahāya duḥkhasya hātumaśakyatvāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2872: manyamānastasmād duḥkhamajihāsataḥ sukhaṃ copādātumicchato nairātmyadṛṣṭerasaṃbhava eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2873: tathā ca tathābhūtasya nairātmyadarśino nityātmadarśino vā tulyaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2875: na hi sarvaduḥkhocchedam evopakāraṃ paśyati sukhāya tadupakārāya ca ghaṭata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2877: evaṃ sarvaduḥkhocchedamicchati paraṃ cāpakarotītyetadapyasaṃgatam, na hi parāpakāraḥ sarvaduḥkhocchedanidānamiti hṛdi nidhāyāha--abhyarhitatā ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2880: tenāyamarthaḥ, itarakārakaprayoktṛtvam bāhyakārakaprayojyatāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā bhedāgrahe sati śarīrādau kartṛtvamāropyātmatvena viparyasyatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2882: evaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā viparyayam anyathākhyātirūpamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2884: nanu sthāṇāvevāyaṃ mama corapratyayo vṛtta ityāgāpālāṅganaṃ prasiddhamiti tadatra saṃśaya eva nāstītyata āha--parīkṣakāṇāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2887: nanvidaṃ rajatamityatra dvayaṃ pratibhāti, jñānasyātmā, purovarti dravyaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2888: tatra purovartino rajatatve pratiṣiddhe, arthādāpadyate jñānasyeti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2891: tvasyānupalabdhacaraṃ katastyam? yaddhi yasya kadācidavagatam, tadanyatra pratiṣedhe pāriśeṣyāt tatra gamyate, na tu pratītipathamavatīrṇayoranyataratra pratiṣedhe pāriśeṣyāditaratrāsaṃbhāvitamapi, tathā sati nedaṃ rajatamiti śuktikāyāṃ rajatatvapratiṣedhe tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇo bhūtakāderapi rajatatvaṃ vidadhyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2893: tat kasya hetoḥ? tasya rajatatvaṃ kadācidapi nopalabdhacaraṃ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2894: yataḥ, tathā svātmāno 'pi rajatātmatvaṃ na kasyacidupalabdhigocaraḥ kadācit svapne 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2895: atha dṛṣṭameva satyarajatajñāne rajatākāratvamātmana ityāśayaḥ? so 'yaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2896: svapnāyate, tatrāpi hi purovartini rajate anubhūyamāne svātmano
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2900: yathā hi nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakabalena purovartino rajatatvapratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2902: ayameva bhrama iti cet? evaṃ tarhi na rajatatvamāropyate bāhye, kiṃ tu tasminnevāhamāspade bāhyatvamāropyate ityāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2903: tathā sati bādhakapratyayena tadevāpaneyam, tasmiścāpanīte 'haṃ rajatamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2904: evaṃ ca satīdaṃ rajatamiti kor'thaḥ? nāhaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2907: nāsti, tathā nedaṃ rajataṃ nāhaṃ rajatamityanayorapi virodhāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2909: asti ca, tasmādubhayorapi rajatatvapratiṣedho 'nyasya rajatatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatīti pāṣāṇarekheyaṃ na durūttarapāṃsupūraṇamātreṇāpanetuṃ śakyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2914: ata eveti kṛtvā vedāntyekadeśinaḥ api nirākārabauddhamatānumatirdarśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2916: pravṛttyaupayiko hyarthaḥ prakṛte prakāśate, na tu sadasattvena gṛhītvā pravṛttirūpapadyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2918: purovartibhedagrahācca śukto pravṛttirnānyatretyādi nāśaḍkitam, prābhākarapakṣeṇa tulyayogakṣematvādapohe nirākariṣyamātvācca //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2920: ta thāhi kimidam anirvacanīyatvam, kiṃ nirūktiviraha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2921: āhosvinnirūktinimittaviraha eva? na tāvadādyaḥ, idaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2923: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, nirūktinimittaṃ jñānaṃ vā syāt viṣayo vā? na tāvadādyasya virahaḥ, khyāteḥ svayamavābhyupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2924: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, viṣayo 'pi kiṃ bhāvarūpo 'bhāvarūpo vā? ādye asatkhyātyabhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2926: ubhau na sta iti cet? atha bhāvābhāvaśabdena lokapratītisiddhāvevobhāvabhipretau, viparītau vā? ādye tāvad
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2930: athāpi niḥsvabhāvatvamanirvacanīyatvam? atrāpi nisaḥpratiṣedhārthatvena svabhāvaśabdasyāpi bhāvābhāvayoranyatarārthatve pūrvavat prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2931: pratītyagocaratvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvamiti cet? atra tu svavacanavirodhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2933: yad yathā pratīyate tat tathā neti cet? atra na vipratipadyāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2935: nanu yadyathāsatprakāśate prapañco 'pi tarhi tathaivāstu jātyādikaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2937: asaccet? asatteyaiva prakāśeta, na pravṛttigocaraḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2946: vivādadhyāsite vibhrame pravṛttikāraṇamagraho vā syāt, idamiti jñānaṃ vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2947: rajatamiti jñānasahitaṃ vā, bhedāgrahasahitaṃ vā ubhayamiti? tatrādye na tāvadityādi dūpaṇam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2950: caturthe tu sāmyāpādane sati jñānadharmo vā agraho viśeṣaṇam, vastudharmo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2951: vā? ādye sāmyaṃ nāsti, ubhayajñānasyāgṛhītabhedasya bhrāntihetutvenānabhayupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2994: anugatamekaṃ svarūpaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyacchedako dharmo lakṣaṇamiti yāvat //2 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2997: svābhāvikaṃ tu śāstrasya traividhyaṃ nāstyeva tasya puruṣāyattatvādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3003: ato na sādhyāviśiṣṭatvaṃ vyadhikaraṇatvaṃ vā? avadyamāne
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3005: ataḥ samānadharmadarśanāt asati nibhāge saṃśayaḥ, tannivṛttyartho vibhāgārambhaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3006: nanu sadanupayogisaṃśayānucchede kiṃ syāt? kathamanupayuktaṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttiḥ? api cārthāpattyādīnāmupayogavatāmapi parairūdghuṣyamāṇānāmapi lakṣaṇākaraṇāt syāt sandehaḥ-- kiṃ lakṣaṇākaraṇādasanti, anupayogīni veti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3008: tathā bauddhāpekṣayā mīmāṃsakānāmadhikapramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ vinaiva pramāṇānām ādhikyāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3010: tad ihāpi sāṃkhyāpekṣayā adhikābhidhāne bhavati sandehaḥ, kiṃ satyādhikye athāsatīti? tadapanodanāya vibhāgavacanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3013: śakteranabhyupagame pramāṇābhāvo mūlam, asatpratipakṣebhyo dṛṣṭakāraṇebhya eva kāryotpattāvarthāpatteḥ kṣīṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3016: trayo hi bhāvā bhavanti kāryānukelāḥ, tatpratikūlāstadudāsīnāśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3021: te hi mantrādīn prayuñjānāstadvirahalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāriṇaṃ virundhanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3027: evaṃ ca sati yatra yadā yasya yathānukūlatve pratikūlatve vā pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3031: svarūpasya pratyakṣatve sākalyasya ca kāryaikavyaḍgyatve 'numeyamatīndriyaṃ sāmarthyam avaśiṣyata iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3034: nanvanyakāryeṇopadhānaṃ tatkāryeṇaiva vā? ādye ahetureva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3035: dvitīye tvitaretarāśrayatvam, tasya tatkāraṇatve siddhe sati tatkāryatvaṃ siddhaṃ syāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3036: tatkāryatve sati ca tadupalakṣitaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ bhavedityata āha--idameva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3038: yudatpādāt pūrva yasyāvaśyaṃbhāvaḥ tat kāraṇamitarat kāryamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3040: vā? na tāvat prativyakti, taduttarakāryābhāve 'pi kāsāñcid vināśadarśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3043: yathā yo yo dhūmaḥ so 'gnimāniti sāmānyato 'vadhāraṇe 'pi eṣa dhūmo 'gnimāniti navādhāritam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3045: na ca kvacit kāryamakṛtvaiva vinaṣṭe vyabhicāraḥ, sati sahakārisākalye kuryāditi sādhyatvāt, tasya ca sahakāryasākalyaprayuktakāryābhāvavattvarūpasya tatrāpi bhāvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3046: tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ sopekṣābuddhiḥ tṛtīyeti viṣayabhedād buddhibhedaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3047: sa ca sukhaheturduḥkhaheturataddhetuśceti trividha iti suvyaktamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3048: anumānapadaṃ vyutpādayatā bhāṣyakṛtā prasaṃgāt lakṣaṇamapyabhihitamiti ṭīkākṛd api smṛtyādivyavacchedyaṃ darśayati--tathā cetyādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3049: yato bhāṣye lakṣaṇamapyuktam, ato vārttike tadākṣepo nānuktopālambha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3057: nanu hānādiviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyamucyamānamanumānasya svagocaraṃ pratyevoktaṃ bhavati, hānādāveva tasya vyāpārānubandhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3058: ata āśaḍkaiveyamanupapannā kimatra samādhānenetyāśaḍkya vyāpārānubandhitayā hānādirasya gocaraḥ, pratīpatyanubandhitayā tu vahinajñānasya vahinareva viṣayaḥ, tadabhiprāyeṇa ca śaḍkāsamādhāne
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3060: vijñāne yat prakāśate yena vijñānaṃ nirūpyat ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3061: na ca svaviṣayādanyad viṣayāntaramasya saṃbhavati, atiprasaṃgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3064: nanu heyādibuddhayaḥ kena viśeṣeṇa dvitīyānumānasya phalam, na tu dvitīyasya pratyakṣasyetyāha--parokṣārthāvagāhitayeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3065: nanu sāmīpyasya sādṛśyasya mānaṃ mitiḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñiparicchede pramāṇamityukte kuto vyāghātāvakāśa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3067: nanu svaviṣayaparicchittau tāvat svarūpataḥ pramāṇam, vyāpāravataḥ kāraṇaviśeṣasya pramāṇatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3068: nāpi vākyārthapratipattirasyāḥ phalam, tadānīṃ tasyā vinaṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3072: nanu svaviṣayaparicchittau pradhānyamanumānāderapi, tat kutaḥ pratyakṣasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3073: pradhānatvād iti ekadeśī vaktītyata āha--pratyakṣaparā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3074: prāyeṇa pratyakṣamātrapūrvakamiti sākṣāt, paraṃparayā tu sarvamevānumānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3077: śabdapūrvakatve satyeva pratyakṣapūrvakatvaṃ tasya, kevalā tu pratyakṣapūrvakatā anumānamātra evetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3080: yadyapi śabdasyapi pramāṇasya vākyarūpasya smṛtisthasya padārthasmṛti padārthasmṛtisahakṛtasyaiva vākyārthabodhakatvam, tathāpi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3081: kvacidapyanubhūyamānasya liḍgaṃ tvanubhūyamānamapi śabdasya viśeṣābhidhāne nyāyasiddhe 'pyekadeśyabhimataprayojanābhidhānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3083: tathāpi dūṣaṇābhāsena ta tad duṣayituṃ śakyamiti śikṣayituṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3087: tatra mahāviṣayatvamanaikāntikāmiti śabdasya mahāviṣayatvāt ādyatvamāpādayatā pratyakṣasyānādyatvamicchatā anya eva dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3088: tathā ca citrādau vipakṣabhūte pratyakṣa'pi gatatvena mahāviṣayatvamanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3093: pūrvamupadiśyamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmi, mahāviṣayatvāditi sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3096: prādhānyakhyāpanaṃ prayojanaṃ yadi prāthamyaṃ vinā na siddhyet tadānumānasyāpi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3097: nanvasati ca saṃplave kā no hāniḥ? sati vā kiṃ bhevad yena bhāṣyakāro
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3100: yadyanumānamapi vyavasthitaviṣayaṃ bhavedityata āha---na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3102: avyākhyāne kāraṇamiti kimiti na vyākhyātamiti śaṅgānivṛttikāraṇamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3103: sandigdhena hīti upadeśaprāmāṇye taddvāra vahnāvapyuttarakālamiti mantavyam, ato vahinaṃ pratyāhita utpāditaḥ pratyayo niścayo yasyetyanena na virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3105: nanu ca niścavaphalatvāviśeṣe 'pi pratyakṣata eva ākākṣānivṛttiriti kuta etadityata āha--tāvadayamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3107: nanvaḍgaṃ viśeṣaṇamityekor'thaḥ, tat kuto vyāpakatveneti vyākhyāyate?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3108: kutaśca pūrvācāryapradaśitaḥ panthāḥ parihnīyata ityata āha--tatta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3111: 'numānādiṣu nāsti, tena nānumānādiparicchinner'the ākākṣānivṛttiriti hi prakṛtam, na ca viśiṣṭārthagrāhakatvopadarśanenānumānādiṣu tadabhāvo darśitī bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3120: lakṣaṇa hi jijñāsupratipādanāya, sā cānirjñātasāmānyasya viśeṣe nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3122: viśeṣavibhāgaṃ ca kṛtvā śiṣyasya jijñāsāmutthāpya viśeṣalakṣaṇāvatāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3123: tathā ca sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgoddeśajñānasya jijñāsadijananadvārā viśeṣalakṣaṇajñānaṃ prati hetutvāt tadgocarayorapi hetuhetumabhdāvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3130: ataḥ kārakāt phalabhūtāṃ kriyāṃ niṣkṛṣya darśayati--viśeṣakatvaṃ viśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3132: kaḥ punaranena lakṣaṇena pratipādayiṣyata ityata āha--yaḥ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3133: na ca sarve vyāmūḍhāḥ, yena pratipādyapratipādakavyavasthā na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3134: na ca sarvatra vyāmoho yenānavasthā syāt, na ca sarve vyāmohahetavo yenāpratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3135: na ca sarvāpratipattiḥ, yenāśrayāsiddhiḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3136: nanu lakṣyamaprasiddhatvāt kathaṃ dharmi? prasiddhatve vā kiṃ lakṣaṇena?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3137: kiṃ cāsyābhidheyam, yadibhidadhat tatparaṃ syādityata āha--tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3138: nanu lakṣaṇaṃ yadi prasiddhaṃ kiṃ vidheyam, tasyāprasiddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3142: pratipādyaśca vidheḥ pratītyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yāgamiva paścāt sādhyaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3144: nanvindriyārthasannikarṣaḥ pratyakṣakāraṇameva na bhavati, satyapi tasmin paramāṇvādiṣu indriyasaṃyuktavyavaghāyakasaṃyukteṣu ca ghaṭādiṣu tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3146: nanu rūpatvādisāmānyaṃ nāstyeva, tat kimarthaṃ saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyābhyupagama ityata āha--na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3147: nanu sādṛśyamarthāntaraṃ rocayamānānāmapi kuto vyāghātaḥ, na hi tadviparītamiha kiñcidabhyupetamityata āha--taṣāmiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3148: nanvasannikṛṣṭasyaiva sannikṛṣṭāśrayasya vā grahaṇamagrahaṇameva vā bhaviṣyati, tat kuto vyāghāta ityata āha--itaratheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3156: na ca rūpatvādisāmānyaviśeṣaviśiṣṭarūpādyupalabdhimantareṇa pramāṇamasti parasparavyāvṛtteṣu cakṣurādiṣu viśiṣṭopalabdhereva pramāṇatve parasparāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3157: na cāviśiṣṭopalabdhimātropanītamaviśiṣṭamindriyamātramupadhirviṣṭavyapadeśe rasādiṣvapi rūpādivyapadeśaprasaḍgād ityāśayavānāha--na cendriyāṇīti so 'yaṃ cākṣuṣatvādyupadhinibandhanatvamimānaḥ parasya rūpādivyapadeśābheda
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3162: nanu nendriyaviśeṣaṇatayā kasyacid grahaṇamasti, anyaviśeṣaṇatayā tadgrahaṇe kimāyātamindriyasannikaṣasyetyata āha--viśeṣaṇabhāvena ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3163: na ca viśeṣaṇabhāvapadenobhayasaṃgrahe samavāyapadenāpi catuṣṭayasaṃgraho 'stviti vācyam, viśeṣaṇabhāvasya śuddhasya pratyakṣānaṅgasvena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3164: tadaṅgaprastāva viśiṣṭasya sulabhatvāt, samavāyasya śaphaddhasyāpi pratyakṣāṅgatvena prastutatayā tatpadasya tāvanmātrābhidhānenaiva paryavasitatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3167: nanvavayavaśvāvayavī cetyādyevāpalabhyate, na tu tayoḥ sambandho 'pītyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3169: evaṃbhūtā hi pratipattiḥ parasparāsambaddhebhyo vyāvartamānā parasparasambaddheṣu viśrāmyatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3170: nanu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ samānenādhikaraṇena sambandha iti paryāyau, tat kimanenoktam ityāśayavān
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3173: nāpi badarāṇīva śuklatvapaṭatve ādheyatvena, api tu ya eva śuklaḥ sa eva paṭa ityabhedenaiva pratītirityāśayavānāśaḍte--tādātmyamiti cediti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3175: yadi hi guṇaguṇinorabheda eva syāt tadā tadvācakayorekārthatvāt tarūvṛkṣaśabdavat sahaprayogo na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3177: apaṭaḥ paṭa itivadaśuklaḥ paṭa ityapi virudhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3180: mahārajanādisaṃyukte śuklatvavat paṭo 'pi tirohita iti na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3185: tathā hi bhedamādāyāpaunarūktyam, abhedamādāya ca sāmānādhikaraṇyamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3190: sā cābhedaṃ nollikhatīti cintitamadhastādityato lokaprasiddhayorbhedābhedayorasaṃkīrṇatayā virodha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3191: laukikabhedābhedātiriktastu bhedābhedanāmā samavāyo vā syāt, vājñmātraṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3193: nanu yadyapi sāmānādhikaraṇyapratipattina tādātmyamullikhati, tathāpi bhedasambandhābhyāṃ vyāvartamānā abhedaṃ vā abhedasambandhaṃ vā sādhayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3194: tathā hi prayogaḥ, paṭaśuklatve na bhinne sambaddhe, sāmānādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3195: ye punarbhinne sambaddhe na te samānādhikaraṇe yathā dadhikuṇḍe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3198: bhavedevam, yadi bhedasanbandhābhyāmasya vyatirekaḥ svābhāvikaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3199: kiṃ tu raktaḥ paṭaḥ, agnirmāṇavaka itivat śabdavṛttibhedopādhikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3202: ca heturyathā bhedasambandhābhyāṃ vyāvartate tathā abhedasambandhābhyāmapītyasādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3203: abhinnaṃ ca tatsambandhi ceti sādhyam, na caivaṃbhūtamubhayavādisaṃpratipannaṃ kiñcidasti yato vyāvṛtterasādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāditi cet na, ubhayavyavacchedaparyavasānasya manorathenāpyasiddheḥ yo hyabhinnaḥ sa kathaṃ sambaddhaḥ, sambandhasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3204: yaḥ sambaddhaḥ sa kathamabhinnaḥ, tenaiva tasyāsambandhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3205: bhinno 'pīti cet? tathāpi bhedamādāyaiva sambandho na punarabhedamādāya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3207: abhedastvasambandhenaiveti katham abhinne sambandhe iti pratijñā na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3208: vyāhatā? prakārabhedamādāyeti cet---na, tasyābhāvāt, na hi dravyasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3209: guṇatvamapyasti, guṇasya vā dravyatvamapi, yenābhedaḥ syāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3211: sattvenābheda iti cet? kimidaṃ sattvaṃ sattā vā, svarūpaṃ vā? svarūpaṃ tāvad
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3213: sattā tu tābhyāmasādhāraṇābhyāṃ sādhāraṇī bhinnā kathamiva tayoḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3214: svabhāvaḥ? kenacidākāreṇa tatheti cet? na vaidravyaguṇakarmasādhāraṇādākārādasādhāraṇamākāraṃ sattāyāḥ paśyāmo yena sā tathā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3215: evaṃ teṣāmapi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ parasparāsaḍkīrṇāt rūpānna svabhāvāntaraṃ paśyāmaḥ pratīyamānarūpamevābhinnamityucyamāne sattā vā na syāt, tāni vā na syurityuktaprāyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3216: tasmāt dravyaguṇayoḥ sattaiva sādhāraṇaṃ svarūpaṃ svabhāvo dharmo viśeṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3217: dravyatvaguṇayordravyameva svabhāvo dharmī viśeṣyamityarthaḥ viśeṣyasyaikasyaiva viśeṣaṇadvayadvārobhayaśabdabuddhiviṣayatvād guṇaguṇyādīnāmevābhedaṃ bhedābhedau vā pare menire iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3220: sā guṇaguṇibhyāṃ vyāvartamānā svavyāpyamaikāntikaṃ bhedamapi vyāvartayatīti ata āha--ayutasiddhyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3229: yo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sarvaḥ saṃndhāntarapūrvakaṃ iti vyāptirihaiva bhajyata iti pareṇāpi svīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3230: na hyasau samavāyamabhāvaṃ vā abhyupagacchan viśeṣaṇatāmasya na svīkaroti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3232: kiṃ tu sambandhāntararahito viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣāḍgaṃ na bhavatīti kadācid brūyāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3235: yathā vinaiva sambandhāntareṇa tadviśiṣṭapratipattiḥ, tathā tasyā evaindriyakatvanāntarīyakaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ pratīyate, vipakṣe tvanavasthāprasaṅgalakṣaṇastarkaḥ samāna ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3236: na ca guṇakarmasāmānyeṣvapi viśeṣaṇatvamātreṇaiva grahaṇamastu, kṛtaṃ samavāyādineti vācyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3238: so 'pi tṛtīyo 'stviti cet---na, gandharasayoratathābhūtayorapi saṃyuktasamavāyena grahaṇāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3246: ataḥ kiṃ tadarthena viśeṣaṇabhāvenetyata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3250: kevalyaṃ hi bhūtaladharmo ghaṭādyavirodhī yudyucyeta na ghaṭādinā saha saṃbhavet, tathā ca sa doṣastadavastha eva, virodhī cet? sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3252: abhāvavyavahārakāle 'pi ca keṣāñcidasaṃbhavāt, bhūtaladharmāṇāṃ ca teṣāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3254: tadatiriktaṃ tu daśamaṃ dravyam, pañcaviśatitamo vā guṇaḥ, ṣaṣṭhaṃ vā karma, sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā na saṃbhavantyeva, tasya dravyādyanyatamatvena tadavinābhāvidharmāpatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3256: sa khalvayaṃ saptamaḥ padārtho bhavet? tatrāpyasau bhāvaniṣedhākāro vā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3259: niṣedhākāro 'pi yadyanutpanno 'pi na nivartate, tadā ghaṭādivyavahāraḥ kadācidapi na syāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3260: utpanno vā yadi nivarteta, tadā vinaṣṭo 'pi ghaṭaḥ kadācidupalabhyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3261: ataḥ padārthānāṃ saptamo niṣedharūpo 'nutpannapradhvaṃsī ca utpannavināśī ca bhūtalādidharmaḥ kaivalyamabhāva iti ekor'tha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3263: syādetat yadyapi jñeyarūpaṃ tattvāntaraṃ nāsti, tathāpi jñānarūpaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3264: viṣayaśca tasya dṛśye pratiyogini bhūtalamevetyata āha--na ceti, yathā bhūtalapakṣe ghaṭavatyapi prasaḍgo bhavati, tathā bhūtalajñānapakṣe ghaṭavabhdūtalajñāne 'pi prasaṅga ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3265: nanu dṛśye pratiyoginītyuktaṃ ghaṭavabhdūtalajñāne tu ghaṭo na dṛśyaḥ kiṃ tu dṛśyamāna ityata āha---nahīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3267: darśanārhe hi ghaṭaḥ tatra yadi na nāsti tadā bhūtalavadakāmenāpyupalabhyetaiva, bhūtalamapi vā nopalabhyeta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3270: yadyapyupalabhyābhāvamaḍgīkārayituṃ śakyate tarkagatyā paraḥ, tathāpi svavacanavirodhamapyapaśyantaṃ prati kiṃ tenāpītyāśayavānāha---dṛśye
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3272: anupalambho hyupalambhābhāvāka vā syāt, dṛśye smaryamāṇe bhūlopalambha eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3273: vā, ghaṭopalambhe vā smaryamāṇe kevalātmopalambhaḥ? na tāvad dvitīyatṛtīyau, smaryamāṇe dṛśyamāne ghaṭe bhūtalopalambhe sati ghaṭavatyapi prasaṅgasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3279: bhavati hi ghaṭaṃ nopalabhaitivat ghaṭo nāstīti pratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3280: na caikaviṣayatvamanayoḥ, nimīlitalocanasya hyupalambhābhāvaniścaya upalabhyābhāve ca sandeho jijñāsā ca kathañcid bhūtalaniścaye 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3287: asti hi tasyādhikaraṇasya grahaṇam, asti ca pratiyogismaraṇam, asti ca nīle śuklatvasya yogyasyābhāvo 'nupalabdhiśca //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3289: pratiyogigrāhakeṇendriyeṇa tadabhāvo gṛhyate bhāvāyattatvāt tasyeti siddhāntamarmatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3290: mamāpi yadabhāvo 'nupalabdhyā bodhyaḥ tadgrāhakeṇendriyeṇādhikaraṇagrahaṇe sa gṛhyata iti siddhāntasāramiti cet---na, vāyau tvagindriyopanīte
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3293: tatrāpi tāvaccakṣurindriyaṃ saṃbaddhamiti cet? evaṃ tarhi tasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3294: nādhikaraṇagrahaṇe vyāpāraḥ, nāpi pratiyogismaraṇe rūpābhāvapratītyā ca niyamena apekṣata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3299: abhāvajñānotpattāvindriyārthasannikarṣo na kāraṇaṃ vyabhicārāditi vādinam utthāpayati---nanu svarūpeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3302: seyamanupalabdhiḥ sattāmātraiṇābhāvaṃ gamayeta, svajñānena vā? na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3303: tāvadādyaḥ, tadānīṃ gehasya viprakṛṣṭasya vyavahitatvena yogyānupalabdherasattvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3308: saṃjātavādhaḥ prāha, na hi na hi bhrānto 'smi, dṛṣṭa evāsau tatra mayeti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3312: na ca svarasasiddhasya smaraṇasyānupalabhyamānasyaiva viparyayaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3313: iyatī ca sāmāgrī yaduta pratiyogyadhikaraṇasmaraṇaṃ tattāsmaraṇaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3314: na vā sādhāraṇaṃ pramākaraṇamadūṣayanta eva doṣā viparyayahetavaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3316: tvayāpyetat samarthanīyamiti cet---na, yogyāsmaraṇasya mayā liṅgatveneṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3322: asmaraṇamātrasya hi vyabhicāram upalabhya tadanādṛtya viśiṣṭāsmaraṇaṃ jñātukāmasya praṇidhānamupapadyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3324: kiṃ tu tadapi kathaṃ jñātavyamityavaśiṣyate? tatrāha---naitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3326: na cāvacchedyāvacchedakayorvaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ doṣaḥ, viśeṣaṇa eva tanniyamāt, atra tūpalakṣaṇatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3329: ata evānutpannapādavihārasya acalacakṣuṣa ityādi vyadhikaraṇameva darśayati sma vārttikakāraḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3334: sākṣātkāriṇī hi pratītirasmadādīnāmindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ na vyabhicarati, iyaṃ tvānumānikī pārokṣyavatī tasmānna kvacid vyabhicāraśaḍkā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3338: na tarhi ityādibhāṣyeṇa kaḥ sūtrāvayavo vyākhyāta iti śaḍkāmapanayanneva vārttikamavatārayati---saṃpratīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3343: nanu mahattvānekadravyavattvayoḥ parasparāvinābhūtayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvenobhayorapi cākṣaṣatvaṃ prati kāraṇatvāt samuccaya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3344: viśeṣe vā ekasyaiva kāraṇatvam, kuto vikalpaḥ? parasparavyabhicāriṇo hyarthakriyāyāṃ vikalpasambhavo na tvime tathā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3347: ata evāgre satyapyevaṃ lakṣaṇakatva ityāha uktasāmagrīsambhave 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3348: cakṣuravayavino na pratyakṣatā, ata uktaṃ vārttikakṛtā upalabdhiphalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3350: tathāhi guṇidharmo vāsau syāt, guṇadharmo vā syāt? tatra guṇidharmatve tabdale rūpasparśayoraviśeṣeṇa grahaṇam, na tu kvacid grahaṇam agrahaṇaṃ ca kvaciditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3351: tadekārthasamavetayorgrahaṇameveti cet---na, niśi nidāghasamaye tejaḥ-sparśagrahe 'pi rūpāgrahāt, candrātaparūpagrahe 'pi sparśāgrahāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3352: guṇadharmastvanityo na bhavatyeva, nityastu sāmānyarūpo na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3355: rūpādīnā svakāraṇavaśādeva sa svabhāvabhedo jāyate keṣāñcit,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3357: sa ca dharmādharmajanyatayā saṃskāra ityucyate, upalabdhiphalaśca bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3360: utpattivyavasthāpakaṃ hi lakṣaṇamalakṣaṇaṃ vā, kāraṇasvarūpavyavasthāpakaṃ tu kārakamakārakaṃ vā lakṣaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3365: nanu yadyapi svarūpataḥ santānato vā indriyābhedādindriyamanaḥsannikarṣābhedo yathāyathaṃ saṃbhavati, tathāpi vijñānābhedo vyaktikṛto jātikṛto vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3367: uttaratra tu indriyārthasannikarṣabhede pyabheda eva, sarveṣāṃ sākṣātkārijātīyatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3368: tat ekadeśiparihāro garbhastrāveṇaiva gata upanyāsayogyo 'pi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3370: asti hi svarūpajātikṛtabhedātirikto viṣayakṛto viśeṣo buddhīnām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3372: yatra tu dhārāvāhijñāne nendriyārthasannikarṣo bhidyate, tatra jñānasyāpi na viṣayakṛto bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3375: tasyaiva goścakṣuṣā saṃyogena tatraiva gavi samavāyena prathamaṃ śuklaguṇajñānaṃ paścād gamanakarmajñānamiti bhede 'bhedāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3381: ubhayātīndriyādhāratā tu ātmamanaḥsannikarṣasyāpi nāstītyata āha--ātmā tu yadyapīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3383: kaścidviśeṣaḥ, na hi rūpopabhogānarthinaḥ kṛṣṇasāre tṛṣṇā tatkarmasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3384: asaṃbhave ca kathamasyotpattiriti? ataḥ kārye 'pi karmaṇaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3387: yadi hi rathādisaṃyogānāṃ nabhovyāpakatvaṃ bhavet tadā tatkāryasyapi śabdasya sarvatrotpādaprasaḍgeḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3390: tataśca taddvāreṇopalamyamānā rathādayastatsaṃyogāśca na niyatadeśatayā pratīyerannityāśayavānāha---mā bhūtasarvatreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3394: tathā ghrāṇodāharaṇaṃ pūtigrandhābhāvaviśiṣṭā surabhitarā kastūriketyato bahuvacanāvirodhaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3399: nanu mā bhūt sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ sāntara iti vā grahaṇaṃ hetvarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3401: na hyayamanyathāsiddhaḥ, etasyaivottaropādhitvena prayojakatvādityata āha---indriyasambandho bhavatu mā veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3403: yadindriyasambaddhaṃ tadavaśyaṃ śarīrasambaddhamiti vā na pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3405: na hyasti niyamo yat pradīpena sambaṇsate tadavaśyaṃ mallimayāpi yad vā mallimayā tadavaśyaṃ pradīpenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3407: tasmāt tadanyathāsiddhirevetyasiddhivyavacchedārthaṃ sajalasatejaḥpaṭādigrāhiṇā prāpyakāriṇā tvagindriyeṇa viruddhamapi sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3410: iha dvividhaḥ sambandhaḥ prāptilakṣaṇo yathā, ālokādīnāṃ ghaṭādibhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3413: janakatvādityukte śabdādibhiraprāptasvaviṣayapratipattyādijanakairanaikāntikamatastadaprāptāvajanakatvāditi etāvanmātreṇa tu sarvathā ajanakairanaikāntikamato janakatve satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3418: ubhdūtānabhibhūtatvāt sūryamaṇḍalaṃ gṛhyata iti, evaṃ tarhi viṣaya eva sa kaścit tādṛśo yo gṛhyate netara ityabhyupeyatām, kiṃ vyabhicāriprāptiparigrahegotyata āha---prāptau tviti viṣayamāhātmyaṃ hi prāptisahakāri, na tu svatantram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3419: na hi sparśarasādayo grahaṇayogyā ityaprāptaireva tvagādibhirgṛhyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3420: prāpyakāritvād vā tairanubhdūtābhibhūtā api te prāptatvamātreṇa gṛhyanta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3421: yadyapi kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmanaye 'pi prāptānāmeva parasparaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṃ kāryajananam, na tvaprāptānāmapi, na hi parasparamapratyāsīdantaḥ sahakāripratyayā bhāvānatiśāyayanto dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3424: tathā ca svarūpayogyatāmindriyārthayobruvatā nirantarotpāda eva vaktavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3426: tasmāt prāptau svarūpātiriktāyāṃ vipratipadyeta, na tu nirantarotpāde 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3428: evaṃ nivāritābhimānaḥ paradarśane 'pi pramāṇamapaśyan sandigdha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3429: nanu janakatve satīti nirṇayahetuṃ paśyan kathaṃ nāma sandigdha ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3432: tvagādīnāṃ daṇḍādīnāṃ ca prāptānāmeva kāryajanakatvaṃ paśyan kathamiva sarvatra vipratipadyata ityato vipratipattibījamāha---yogyatayaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3435: nanu tasya vṛttibhedaḥ anupalambhabādhita ityata uktam---cakṣuṣa iveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3437: vyavadhānaviprakarṣau hi anirantarotpādo vā syādaprāptirvā, svarūpayogyatā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3439: na ca kṛṣpāsārasyārthena maṇervā lohena nirantarotpādaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3440: aprāptyabhāvastu prāptireva, tathā ca kaḥ pratikūlo 'nukūlamācarati?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3442: sa ca bauddhanaye kāraṇajātīyasya nirantarotpādānna bhidyata ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3443: tasmāt sthiranaye kāryaṃ janayanti kāraṇāni parasparaprāptiṃ vā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3447: nanu lakṣaṇāntareṇa vyavasthite lakṣye kathamanyonyāśrayatvamityata āha---agatirveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3449: uttaratra tu avagate lakṣye tatsāpekṣeṇa lakṣaṇena kiṃ gamayitavyamityagatirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3451: yadi vijñānābhinnahetujatvāt sukhaṃ vijñānajātīyaṃ syāt sukhābhinnahetujatvāt tadapi sukhajātīyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3452: vijñānaṃ na sukhenābhinnahetujamiti cet? evaṃ tarhi kathaṃ sukhamapi vijñānenābhinnahetujamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3453: nanu jñānahetvanugamaḥ sukhe 'pyasti, na tu sukhahetvanugamo jñāne, ato yatkāraṇānugamo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3456: na tu sarvasya yavāḍkuratvam tatkāraṇānugamābhāvādityāśayavān āśaṅkate---avāntareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3457: na hyasti niyamo yajjātīyakāryahetucakrānagamo yatra tatra tajjātīyatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3460: ākasmikatvaprasaṅgabhayāddhi kāryabhedopapattaye sakalakāraṇabhedamanusaran prayasyati bhavān, sa ca kāryabhedaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3464: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpādyupādānaṃ cārūpādikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3466: ajñānatve vā na jñānopādānatvamiti yadi pratyavatiṣṭhate tatrāha---na ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3467: yadi hyekajātīyopādānatayaikajātīyatvaṃ bhavet, avāntaraikajātīyamapi kiṃ na syāt? tathā caikasmāt samanantarapratyayādanekāvāntarajātīnayānutpādaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3468: dṛśyate ca rūpajñānād rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānādijātīyaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3473: so 'yamekopādānakatve 'pyavāntarajātibhedābhyupagamaḥ pareṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntārthamubhdāvitaḥ api cetyādyubhdāvitaṃ sandigdhavyāvṛttikatvaṃ sphuṭhayitumato nāsaṅgatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3475: paramārthatastu yadupādānavat tatsajātīyaṃ yadvyāpakopādānavat tadguṇajātīyamiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3477: tadyadi sattayā guṇatvena vā sukhajñānayorekajātīyatvaṃ sādhyate, tadā siddhasādhanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3479: ekopādānatve 'pi rūpādīnāṃ na vyaktikṛto bhedaḥ, nāpyavāntara jātikṛtaḥ nāpi guṇatayā piṭharopādānatve 'pi karmaṇo 'guṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3482: yathā ca teṣābhavāntarakāraṇabhedād dravyatvaṃ pṛthivyādīnām, guṇtvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3483: rūpādīnām, karmatvamutkṣepaṇādīnām, tathāvāntarakāraṇabhedād darśanasparśanasmaraṇādīnāṃ jñānatvaṃ nirūpādhyanukūlānūkūlatarādīnāṃ sukhatvamityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3485: śuklādibhedaḥ, utkṣepaṇasya ca pāṭavādibhedastathā jñānasyāpi darśanādibhedaḥ sukhasyāpi tāratamyādibhedo bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3489: na hi candanamahaṃ jānāmītyatra sukhaṃ parisphurati tadāhaṃ sukhīti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3490: nāpi sukhyahamityatra jñānaṃ parisphurati tadā jānāmīti syāt, na caitadasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3491: jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukhaṃ tathāvidhe ca sukhabuddhirbhavatyeveti cet---hanta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3492: bhostasya jñānaviśeṣasya viṣayaviśeṣo 'pyasti na vā? nāsti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3494: na caitad dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ śakayaṃ vā sādhayitum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3495: asti cet? bāhya ābhyantaro vā? na tāvad bāhyaḥ kaścid viṣayabhedo 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3496: yadeva hi rāgavatā gītamanubhūyate tadeva vītarāgeṇāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3497: tadeva gītam, paraṃ rāgavatā anukūlatayā, vītarāgeṇa tu tadviparītatayeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3498: cet? kimanukūlatvamasya nirūpādhikam, sopādhikaṃ vā? kathaṃ kañcit prati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3502: tasmāt tasya jñānaviśeṣasya sukhatvenābhimatasyābhyantara eva viṣayaviśeṣo nisargānukūlasvabhāva eṣṭavyaḥ, yaddhetutayā bāhyo viṣayo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3504: tathāpi mūḍhadhiyāṃ vyavahārārthaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakā dharmā jñānādīnāmuktāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3507: tatrāpyanukūlavedanīyatvaṃ sukhalakṣaṇam, pratikūlavedanīyatvaṃ duḥkhasyetyevamādi samānatantrānusādeṇa boddhavyamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3513: santi hi padārthāḥ svakarmopārjitatvāviśeṣe 'pi kecidadhyakṣā eva, yathā svaśarīrādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3514: kecit tu parokṣā eva, yathā tadantargatanāḍīsaṃsthānādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3520: na ca sākṣātkāraṇameva kāraṇam, tathā sati vyāpāriṇa udāsīnāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3527: jñānaṃ punaḥ kāryāvasānamapi indriyārthasannikarṣam atipatatyeva svapnāntike /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3533: ālambnaṃ tvasya viparyāsasya yathā pūrvānubhūtā smaraṇārhā kāminītyevaṃ tajjānmapūrvānubhūtaṃ smaraṇārhaṃ sukhameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3534: viparyāsatvaṃ punaretāvataivāsya yat viprakṛṣṭadeśakālayoḥ kāminītajjanyasukhayoḥ sannikṛṣṭadeśakālatayāvabhāsaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3536: tathā sati kāminītvasukhatvaniṣedhenānyasya kasyacit pratibhāsanaṃ bādhakaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3537: na ca vācyam yadi na svapnāntike sukhamutpadyate na nasmai ghirahī spṛhayediti, mohādasādhane 'pi pravṛttidarśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3540: smaraṇe prāpte viparyāsaḥ smaraṇaviparyāsaḥ anubhavalakṣaṇastadviṣaya evetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3541: nanu sukhaduḥkhotpādaprayojanau dharmādharmau yadasukhaduḥkhārūpān dehādīn utpādayataḥ tattadarthatayaiva, evaṃ tayoḥ sarvotpattimatāṃ nimittatvaṃ nirvahati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3542: idaṃ tu svapnajñānaṃ na sukharūpam, saṃkhasādhanamapi yadi na syāt, na tarhi dharmanimittakam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3546: na ca sukhādi svarūpataḥ upabhogaḥ, kiṃ tu tadanubhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3547: sa ca pratyutpannasukhādyanālambanatve 'pi pūrvotpannam ālambya jāyamānaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3553: tatra tu bādhakaṃ bhavad dvirūpaṃ bhavet---asukhametaditi vā, nāsīt sukhamiti vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3555: jāgarāvasthāyāṃ tu nāsīt kāminīti yujyate bādhakaṃ sthiratvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3560: nāstīdānīṃ sukhamiti tvidānīntarasukhasya bādho na prāktanasya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3562: tatkāryāṇāṃ ca harṣāśrupulakādīnāmanuvartamānānāmupalambhādanyathā āśutaravināśināṃ kṣaṇāntare 'darśanāt tadanubhavānāmaprāmāṇikatvameva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3565: yadyapi svapnāntikasukhasya jāgarāvasthāyāmāhatya bādhakaṃ nāsti, tathāpi svapnāntika eva tatkāraṇatvena pratītānāṃ candanavanitādīnāmasti bādhakam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3566: kāraṇe ca bādhite kāryaṃ bādhitameva yathā svapnāntikadṛṣṭapayodapaṭalabādhe tadāśrayo vidyududyotaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3567: harṣāśruprabhṛtayastu na sukhakāryāḥ kiṃ tu sukhajñānakāryā iti na tāvanmātreṇa tatsaṃbhavopapattiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3568: tasmāt svapnāntikodāharaṇabalena jñānamātrakāryato sukhasya sidhyatīti manorathādyudāhṛtya parihṛtam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3570: kiñcidabhyāsād yathā mṛgayādiṣu ; kiñcidabhimānād yathā candanādiṣu ;
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3574: na hi yathā manoratheṣu sukhaṃ tathā viṣayasaṃbhoge /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3576: tāvadeva hi bubhukṣito modakān manorathayati yāvadamī nāsya paramārthataḥ sannidhīyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3585: sa ca kāraṇabhedo 'nuvihitabhāvābhāva eva sidhyatītyatra vivakṣitamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3591: jñānābhede hi bhinnajātīyaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇāntaraṃ bhinnamākṣipet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3595: sa ca tādṛśo nāstīśvare tasya bubhukṣāvirahāt , kathaṃ tasya sukhotpādaprasaṅga ityata āha--yogarddhisampannānāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3598: na hi te sarvadaiva pratipakṣadhāraṇāvanto mā bhūdamīṣāṃ sarvadā bhogavirahād dharmādharmapracayatādavasthyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3599: tasmād yadā pratipakṣadhāraṇā nāsti tadā viṣayasākṣātkāramātrādeva teṣāṃ sukhaṃ prasajyetetyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3600: na ca vācyam, yadi bhavedevaṃ kīdṛśo doṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3603: na cendriyāṇāmarthānāṃ ca parasparamasannikṛṣṭānāmeva sattāmātraiṇa kvacidātmadharmasamutpāde sāmarthyamadhigatam, tasmād yogarddhimatāṃ satyapi viṣayasākṣātkāre indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvāt sukhaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3609: anyatra hi caritārthatvaṃ sākṣātkāre saṃbhāvyeta, sa tu yogajadharmasahakṛtena manasaiva janitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3612: so 'yaṃ sannikarṣo yadā nāsti tadā teṣāmapi na sukhādikamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3614: nanvindriyārthasannikarṣajanmā viṣayasākṣātkāraḥ sukhādihetuḥ, na ca tathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3615: siddhānāmasti, ato na teṣāṃ sukhotpādaprasaṅga ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3616: na tāvadindriyajanyājanyayoḥ sākṣātkārayoḥ kaścidājānato viśeṣaḥ, kiṃ tu indriyārthasannikarṣarūpakāraṇasambandha eva viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3617: sa ca yadi kārye vivakṣitaḥ, kathaṃ na tasya kāraṇatā sukhādikaṃ prati?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3620: tasmāt caramabhāvinyeva sākṣātkāre sati kimindriyeṇetyahṛdayasyābhiprāyaḥ avaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3629: nanvavyapadeśyavyavasāyātmakapadayoḥ saṃgrāhyaṃ vyavacchedyaṃ vā na paśyāmḥ pratyuta parasparaviruddhayoranayorekasmin pratyakṣe 'samāveśa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3634: vyapadiśyate vyavacchidyate 'neneti vyapadeśaḥ, sā ca vyavacchittirvyāvṛttipratītirūbhābhyāṃ kriyata iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3639: na tu sedava viśeṣaṇam, ativyāpakatayā alakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3643: ata eva saditi viśeṣaṇamiti cet--na, sato 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3646: tasmāt sad vā asad vā samānādhikaraṇaṃ vyavacchedakaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viparītamupalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3647: ata eva viśeṣaṇamātramudāharannopalakṣaṇam, tat kasya hotoḥ? tadeva vyādhikaraṇatayopalakṣaṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3659: yat punaryadātmakaṃ na bhavati na tat tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3661: pratīyante cārthāḥ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tasmāt tadātmāna iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3662: nanu gavāśvādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyāvṛtti kimabhedavyāvṛtterūta tatpratītyorūpāyopeyabhāvavyāvṛtteriti saṃdihyata ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3663: api ca yadi śabdārthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye upāyopeyabhāva upādhiḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3664: upāyatvanivṛttāveva tadapi nivarteta, na ca nivartata ityata āha--api ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3670: yathā ṣaḍjādyutkarṣāpakarṣavyavahāranibandhano mayūrādyutkarṣāpakarṣavyavahāra iti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ ṣaḍjādiṣvityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3674: yat punaryadātmakaṃ na bhavati na tat tadutkarṣādyanuvidhāyi, yathā gauraśvasyeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3675: nanu yadyarthapratyayo nāmadheyotkārṣādyavidhatte tat tasyaiva tādātmyamastu, kimāyātamarthasyetyata āha--pratyayasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3677: tadgatasāmānādhikaraṇyena virodha ubhdāvayituṃ na śakyata iti tadupekṣyānyathā śaṅkate--astīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3678: asti hi śuklabhāsvaratvādibhiḥ yuktikāgatai rajatatvasya sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyayo natu tādātmyaṃ parasparaṃ dharmiṇorityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3680: vyākhyānasya caitat prayojanam, yaddhetvantarasūcanam, tathā ca prayogaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3682: vyapadiśyamānatvāt, yat tu yadviṣayaṃ na bhavati, na tanniyamatastena vyapadiśyate yathā rūpavijñānaṃ raseneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3683: anuviddhatā saṃśleṣalakṣaṇārthenaiva vijñānasya nāsti, kutastarāṃ tadātmanāpi śabdena bhaviṣyatītyata uktamiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3690: tadato bāle 'pi prathamataḥ śabdamuccārayati eṣa eva krama unnīyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3692: prathame pakṣe 'siddho hetuḥ aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaśca pakṣaḥ śabdabrahmaṇa eva vājiviṣāṇāyamānatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3696: na hi bhāvanā vā tajjanitā smṛtirvā pūrvānubhūtasya sattāyām idānīmanubhūyamānasaṃbhede vā pramāṇamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3697: tathā sati vinaṣṭo ghaṭaḥ smaryamāṇatvāt sanneva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3698: anubhūyamānaṃ na bhūtalaṃ ghaṭasaṃbhinnaṃ bhavedevaṃ cocchinnamaghaṭaṃ bhūtalamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3701: tataśca tadātmā rūpaśabdo 'pi kathamaviśadaḥ syāt, kathaṃ cāprāmāṇiko rūpasya prāmāṇikatvāt, kevalamavyutpanno 'pi śabdena vyavaharediti prasajyeta, tadasaṃbaddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3702: na hi śabdātmatāpratyayaṃ vyavahārāṅgam ācakṣmahe, kiṃ tu sambandhagrahaṇamityata āha--na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3706: tadayaṃ bālo yad rūpaṃ paśyati sa eva rūpaśabda iti loṣṭalaḍḍukadṛṣṭāntamanuharatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3707: so 'yaṃ bhedapratyayo bhrānata iti yadi śaṅkate tatrāha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3708: ayamapyabhyupagamavāda eva, na hyasti bhrāntatve 'sya pramāṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3710: vyutpannānāṃ punaḥ savikalpā dhiyaḥ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena jāyamānāḥ śabdātmakatvamarthasya vyavasthāpayantu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3711: tathā sati bālamūkādivijñānānāṃ tadviṣayatvāt śabdasaṃbhinnaviṣayatvamarthataḥ siddhaṃ bhavatītyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3715: ayaṃ śabdo gakārādyākāro na tu sāsnādyākāra iti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3716: nanu yo ḍittha iti ḍitthaśabdamevoccārayasi, na tvayaṃ ḍitthaśabda iti tameva niṣedhasi ceti kimidamityata āha--autsargikaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3718: tat kiṃ sarvatraivameva? netyata āha--kvacit punariti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3719: yatra tarhi asaṃbhadena saṃketagrahe nityādipadāni santi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3720: tatrāsaṃketitatvānna tāvadarthaparaḥ, svaparo 'pi yadi na syād vyarthaḥ prayogaḥ syādityata āha--yatrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3721: yathā hi gaurvāhīka ityatra gotvaṃ goguṇayogalakṣakatvena vāhikopādhirna
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3722: tatsamavāyāt, tādātmyād vā, tathā hi ḍittho 'yamityatrāpi ḍitthaśabdo vācyatvopalakṣakatayā piṇḍopādhirna tu tatsamavāyāt tādātmyād veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3723: yathā cātra vāhīke gauriti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇam, tathātrāpi vṛkṣaviśaiṣe ḍittho 'yamiti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇamiti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3724: nanu śabdapuraḥsaratvaniyamād vikalpasya tadupāyatā vā tadviṣayatvaṃ vā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3725: syāt, tatpuraḥsaratvaniyamasyātadupāyādatadviṣayatvānniyamato vyāvṛtteḥ tatra yadyarthavikalpastacchabdavipayastadā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3727: tasmāt śabda upāyo bhavan jñāta eva vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3731: na tāvat śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ niyamato bhavati vikalpasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3732: kiṃ nāma? vyutpannasya śabdasmaraṇapuraḥsaratvaṃ niyamavad dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3736: tasmād ghaṭe vikalpayitatavye anupāyo viṣayaśca ghaṭaśabdaḥ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryata ityavaśiṣyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3742: na caitāvatā niyameva śabdasmaraṇapiṇḍavikalpayorūpāyopeyabhāvaḥ, śabdasya vā vikalpaviṣayatvaṃ sidhyati, yena tayostādātmyamāśaḍkyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3743: tathā sati vahnismaraṇadhūmavikalpayorapi tathābhāvaḥ syāt, vahnerapi vā dhūmavikalpaviṣayatā bhavediti vārttikārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3745: sarva eva vyavahāraḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā vikalpasādhyo na tvālocanenāpi kaścidarthaḥ sādhayitavyo 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3747: na tāvat sarvasyaivotpattimataḥ prayojanaṃ piśitacakṣuṣaḥ sākṣātkurmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3748: na ca prayojanāpratipattimātreṇa paṭutarapratyakṣaparikalitamapi kāryaṃ nānumanyāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3750: tathāpi sphuṭaṃ savikalpakotpattirevāsya prayojanam iti sādarśiteti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3752: nāmāvacchinne vikalpe kartavye yato na viśiṣyate viśeṣeṇa na gṛhyate, ato vaidharmyasya yogyapramāṇabādhitatvāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3754: ato bhāṣyapaunarūktyaṃ pariharato na sādhyāviśiṣṭo heturiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3758: tasya ca tadvyapadeśaviṣayatā tadā syāt yadi rūpatadvyapadeśayorabhedaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3759: anyenānyasya vyapadeśe atiprasaḍgo vyavahāravilopaśca vipralambhādityatra tannāmadheyatvādeva niyama iti sphuṭaṃ bhāṣya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3760: svarūpeṇaiva viṣayeṇaiva vā kimiti jñānaṃ na vyapadiśyata ityetad vivṛṇvan
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3762: ātmānaṃ prati tāvat svarūpeṇaiva jñānamajñānād vyavacchidyate, jñānāntarāt tu viṣayeṇāpītyetat ko nāma nābhyupaiti? parasya tu nityaparokṣaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3764: ata eva tadviṣayo 'pi tat kathaṃ svarūpaviṣayābhyāṃ paro bodhyatām? kathaṃ vā abodhito vyavaharatām? tasmāt tajjñānavācakena jñānamarthavācakena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3766: na cājñātena vācakena vācyamadhigattumarhatītyavarjanīyatayā pratipādako vācakamuccārayati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3768: na hi pramāṇavyatirekeṇa prameyamadhigantuṃ na śakyate ityetāvataiva tayorabhedaḥ syāditi tadidamuktam--anyathā aśakyatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3769: nanu kadācidarthajñānakāle 'pi śabdo vyāpriyata eva, yadā prayojakavṛddhāt prayojyavṛddhor'thamadhigacchatītya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3774: na hi gośabde karṇajapite 'pabhraṣṭe vā aṇīyān gauḥ kṛśa upahatākṛtirvikṛto vā pratīyate, viparīte vā viparītaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3775: nāpi sādhutvādibhedavato gośabdasya prāśastyamaprāśastyaṃ ca kiñcidasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3776: nandābhadretyādimaṅgalasaṃjñāniveśasya tvarthamaṅgalyādivyabhicāraḥ sphuṭatara eva, abhadrādāvapi bhadrādivyapadeśāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3783: śabdo hi yatkāryo yatkāraṇaṃ yadgrāhyo yatpramāṇaṃ yadvirodhi yaddharmā yadrūpo yadviṣayaḥ, tadakāryastadakāraṇaṃ tadagrāhyastadapramāṇaṃ tadavirodhyataddharmātadrūpo 'tadviṣayor'thaḥ pratyakṣata evāvasīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3788: cākṣuṣaṃ hi cakṣuṣaiva janyate, rūpa eva niyatam rūpeṇeva nirūpyate; na śabde pravartate, na śabdenaiva nirūpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3805: atrāpyanutpādo vināśo 'tyantābhāva iti viruddhaṃ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3807: indriyasya ca grāhyaḥ sa eva yastajjanyajñānaviṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3811: tasmādaprasakte 'pyarthaśabdasya padārthamātraparatvamabhyupagamya parihāre gatyantaraṃ vārttikakṛtā darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3814: indriyārthasannikarṣo hyajñāyamāna eva sattāmātravyavasthitaḥ pratyakṣe vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3815: anumāne tu liṅgasya jñāyamānatvameva vivakṣitam, na tu sattetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3816: nanvanumāne 'pi liḍgāsattaiva ki na vivakṣitetyata āha--ata eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3821: catra hi viṣayānapekṣaṃ jñānameva kāraṇaṃ tatra na viṣayakālānuvidhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3823: api ca liḍgānapekṣasya liṅgajñānasya liḍgijñānajanakatve pramāṇādīnāṃ gatidvayavādo 'pi tatra tatra na syāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3826: liḍgāt tu pañcarūpasampannādapi jñāyamānādevāsato 'pi yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tadanumānamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3827: nanvindriyaviṣayeṣvityadhyāhārastarhi sūtre pūrveṣāṃ kiṃ mūlam ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3829: na hyanumeyasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāditi vadatā hyevamuktaṃ yasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt tajjñānamutpadyate nāsau tasya viṣayaḥ, yastu viṣayo na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3834: tasmād vārttikakṛtā eva kṛto 'yamadhyāhāra iti keścid buddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3837: indriyārthasannikarṣādutpannasya hi jñānasya vyabhicārasaṃbhādavyabhicārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ yadyapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3840: na hi yata ityadhyāhṛtapadena karaṇamātraṃ parāmṛśyate tasyāprakṛtatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3842: tathā cāyamarthaḥ, indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānaṃ yataḥ pramāṇād bhavati tatpratyakṣam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3843: evaṃ ca vyabhicāriṇi kaḥ prasaṅga ityata āha--yadyapīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3844: nanvavyabhicāripadakaraṇaṃ pramāṇapadānuvartanaṃ veti kaścid viśeṣa ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3849: na hyuktarūpe dve pratyakṣe pūrvaṃ yasya jñānasya tadvyabhicāriṇīmapi pramāṃ janayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3851: tathāpyevaṃbhūtapratyakṣadvayajanite saṃskāre nirṇaye ca anumānatvaprasaṅgastadavastha eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3852: tasmāt tannivṛttyarthaṃ pramāṇapadaṃ na kṛtaṃ cedavaśyamanuvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3853: yadyevaṃ kimavyabhicāripadaprayojanamityata āha--tathāpīti nopayujyate na ca śakyate parasparāśrayaprasaḍgādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3854: tathāpi niyamo na sphuṭībhūta ityata āha--tatreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3855: nanvanumānavadavyabhicārasiddhyā phalasiddhirna pratyakṣe yathā, tathā śabde 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3860: ayaṃ ca niyamaḥ svarūpato 'pi phaladvāraiva pratyakṣamunnīyate, na tvanyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3861: anumānādikaṃ tu pratītaṃ satphalāya kalpate, na tvanyatheti niyame sati syāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3864: kāraṇamutpādakaṃ pratyāyakaṃ ca ubhayaṃ sādhayati---na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3866: āgamasyāpi ca vaktṛśrotṛgatatvena pratyakṣāpekṣā utpattau jñaptau ca cato 'taḥ saṃmugdhamāha--evamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3870: so 'yaṃ sūtrakārasyeha viśeṣataḥ prayatno jñāpayati yadetasminnavyabhicāriṇyanyatra vyabhicāraśaḍkaiva nāsti, ata ihaiva tadgrahāya viśeṣato yatitavyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3874: nanu bhāṣyavārttikāyoḥ kā gatiḥ? na hyayamarthastataḥ pratīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3876: sa evārthaḥ, kiṃ tu niyamyatayā, na tu vidheyatayetyāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3881: na cārthena kaścidartha upadarśito yamaprāpayannartho vyabhicaret /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3882: anyathārthopadarśanasvabhāvasya cotpattiḥ, na cārthopadarśanasvabhāvo na cānyathotpannaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3890: yathā hi sthāṇuradṛśyamānastathaiva puruṣatvenāpi daśyamāna iti tātparyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3897: nanu vyabhicāritvamevāsya katham? viparyājñānaṃ hi niścayākaram, ayaṃ tu na tathetyata āha--no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3898: na hi niścayatvaṃ prayojakamatra, kiṃ tu visaṃvādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3900: na ca prāptiyogo dvirūpasya vastunaḥ, kvacit kadācit kenacid
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3902: na ca vācyaṃ bhrānterabhrāntipratiyogitvādaniyatasya cārthasya kvacidapi pramāṇāgocaratvādasatkhyāteranabhyupagamācca sarvamidamasamañjasamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3903: no khalu dolāyamānaḥ sthāṇupuruṣavyatiriktaḥ kaścidaniyato nāmārthaḥ parisphurati yatrāsamañjasaṃ syāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3904: nanu sthāṇupuruṣāvubhāvapi yadyāropitau tadobhayopamardātmanā bādhakena bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3906: yathā yuktau rajatāṃśasya mithyātve śuklabhāsvaratvādiniścayasya satyatvam, tathā ca sthāṇvaṃśe niścayaḥ puruṣāṃśe tvekakoṭisanniveśavāneva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3910: samāropastatrobhayopamardātmaka eva bādhaka iti kimatra vaktavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3913: yatra hi rajatatvārope 'pi śuklatvādau niścayastatrāropitānānopitayormitho virodhābhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3915: yatra tu parasparaviruddhau sa saṃśaya iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3917: kimarthaṃ tarhi vyavasāyātmakapadaṃ sūtrākāraścakāra? san vā sa udārārtho vyākhyātṛbhiḥ kimityupekṣitaḥ? tathābhūtor'vācīnaiḥ kathamunnīyata ityata āha--tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3919: syāt tadavabodhārthaṃ, yadi tatpratyakṣaṃ syāt, na tvetadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3931: sa hi saṃvedanadharmo grāhyākārarūpo vā syāt? tannirapekṣagrāhakākārarūpo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3937: etaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvedanākāro hi jñātṛtvādistatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3944: evaṃ cārthādupajātasyāpyaneko 'bhilāpo 'pyasya viṣayo yadi syāt ko doṣa ityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3945: rūpāccakṣuṣo viṣayādupajāyamānaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ nayanāviṣayarasasahitamatad rūpamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3948: na ca śabdasaṃsargayogyatā arthasyāsti yena tadākāraṃ jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3949: na cendriyavijñānaṃ śabdaḥ svatantra evākārādhāyako, vikalpakāle tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3960: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yadi hi pratibhāsamānor'thopi vikalpasya janako bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3961: tadā tadākāraṃ niyamayet, na tu niyamayati, tadasannidhāvapi vikalpavāsanāvaśāt tasya tathāvidhākāropasthiteḥ
