GSP29nvtp1_1u:3962: nanvindriyamasya janakamastu, na hi tasyākāraniyāmakatayā kārakatvamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3965: indriyamapi hi jñānajanakaṃ bhavadākāraniyāmakārthasannikarṣeṇaiva, na tu tannirapekṣam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3970: anyathotprekṣāvyāpāratvād vikalpasya pravartakatvamapi na nirvahedityata āha--ātmīyamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3971: utprekṣā asadāropaṇaṃ yato bhavatyavaśyamato 'pyevamutprekṣāmaha iti vyāhāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3974: puraskāro bhedāgraho vā, taddhetuka āropo vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3977: yadi vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā arthasāmarthyalabdhajanmānaḥ, tadā na śabdakalpanānugatā ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3987: ki nāma? niyāmakatayā, tadatra saḍketa eva niyāmako yadi syāt ko doṣa ityāśayavānāśaṅkate--saḍketeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3991: ata eva sāmānyaṃ deśakālānugatam, tatraiva saḍketasya sukaratvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3992: kimetāvatāpītyata āha--na ca tattat dṛṣṭaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kiṃ tu svalakṣaṇaṃ darśanagocaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3998: nanu sāmānyamapi kiṃ na darśanagocara ityata āha--na tu sāmānyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4000: sarvaḥ puruṣārtho heyopādeyarūpastasya sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ, tadrahitaṃ yasmāt tat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4006: nanu sāmānyasya tāvadarthakriyāvirahād darśanagocaratvaṃ mā bhūt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4009: tannirvicikitsameva tarhyarthakriyāsamarthavaspupratipādanābhiprāyavantaḥ prayojakavṛddhāḥ prayojyavṛddhāśca tathāvidhārthapratipattimantaḥ śābde vyavahāre upalabhyanta ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4011: na cobhayavādisaṃpratipattiviṣayaḥ pratītamauṣṇyaṃ śītāpanodanaṃ karotītyapi kadācit /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4012: akurvaddhi sarvathā apratītaṃ na kuryādāropitaṃ vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4019: sā cāto nivarttamānā svavyāpyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamādāyaiva nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4020: tataśca jātyādīnāṃ parasparamasambandhānna svatanatreṣu teṣu śabdo 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4023: etena śabdasya vivekagrahasaṃbhave 'pi tadyojanā nirasto boddhavyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4031: nanu na hyekajñānaviṣayau samānakāle 'ḍgulyau na kāryakāraṇabhūte iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4032: niyatapūrvāparatve 'pi te sarvajñaikavijñānagocarau na tatheti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4033: yadyucyeta ko doṣaḥ? na hyupalabdhibhedābhedaprayukte kāraṇākaraṇatve /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4034: kiṃ tarhi? yadanapekṣaṃ tat kāraṇam sāpekṣaṃ ca kāryamiti, tadatrāpi samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4037: yattu naivaṃ na tat yathetyata āha--viśeṣaṇaṃ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4045: sa cāyamekajñānagocarayorekakālayośca dvirūpo 'pi niyato nāsti yasmādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4049: kṣaṇabhaṅgastu tvayāpyupapādanīyo mayāpibhañjanīya ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4050: yadyapi tīrthikaiḥ kuṇḍādhāvaśānna badarasyaiva apatanadharmakasyotpādaḥ svīkriyate sthaimaśraddhājaḍatvāt, tathāpi gatinivṛttilakṣaṇāṃ gurutvapratibandhakasaṃyogalakṣaṇāṃ vā sthitiṃ taddharmabhūtā vidadhadeva badarasya kuṇḍamādhāratayā abhyupetaṃ taiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4053: yadyapi badaravajjātyādīnāṃ dharmasya kasyacidupajanāpāyarūpamupakāraṃ nābhyupagacchatyeva paraḥ, tathāpyabhyupagamavādo 'yaṃ saugatasyeti mantavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4055: sannityanena hi vikalpena sattvopakārasamartho viṣayīkṛtaḥ na ca tato 'nyaḥ kaścid dravyatvādyupakārasamartho 'sattvopakārasamartho 'sti, yatra dravyādivikalpāḥ sārthakāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4056: tasmādete dravyavatvādyupakārasamarther'the sattvopakārasamarthābhedini pravartamānāstadadhikaraṇamarthamaspṛśanto 'narthakāḥ prasaktā iti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4057: bauddhasyātiparāmarśakuśalatāṃ codyasya cātitucchatāmālakṣyāsmākameva matilāghavaṃ saṃbhāvayiṣyatītyāśaḍkya tadgranthaṃ likhati--yadāheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4059: yasya darśane nānopādherapyarthasya dhīḥ vikalpadhīrgrāhikā bhedino viśiṣṭasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4061: sarvātmanā sarvaiḥ upādhibhirekasvabhāvasyaivopakāryasya viśeṣyasya grahe sati ko bhedo bhidyata iti bhedo viśiṣyata iti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4062: aniścitaḥ syāt? api tu sarvopādhimirviśiṣṭo niścita eva syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4063: emasyopādheḥ upakārakasvabhāve grāhye gṛhyamāṇe sati nopakārā upakārakāḥ svabhāvā upādhyantarāṇāṃ tato 'pare bhinna vidyante ye
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4065: kiṃ nāma? sa ervekasvabhāvaḥ sarveṣāmupakārakaḥ tatasadgrahe tadekopādhiviśiṣṭagrahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4067: nanu varaṃ vastusvabhāvavādamāsthāyānupakāryānupakārakayorapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ spaṣṭadṛṣṭamupapādayituṃ śaktāḥ pare /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4070: evaṃ ca tvaccharāstvayyeva nipatitā ityata āha--asmākaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4077: yatra viṣayādhīnā dhīḥ tatra tadāyattau viśeṣāviśeṣau, atra tu viparyayo viṣayasyaiva pratibhāsasattayā buddhyadhīnatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4079: tattadvadviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayāpi kiṃ bhinno 'bhinno vetyatra vikalpa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4081: nanu paramārthasannartho mā bhūdvikalpasya viṣayaḥ, janakastu bhaviṣyatītyata āha--api ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4084: artho vikalpasya na gocaro janako 'pi netyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4102: tadanyathāsiddham, tayorālocanamātra eva caritārthatvāditi cet? tat kimidānīmālocanasyāyaṃ mahimā vikalpopajananaṃ prati? tathā sati tasmānna
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4104: vāsanāparipākavirahānna tatheti cet? sa khalu vāsanāparipāko yadi niyamādindriyārthamadhyamadhiśete kathaṃ na tadapekṣā kāryasya?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4107: na vai sākṣātkāvān vikalpaḥ kaścit, kiṃ tu nirvikalpakabhedāgrahāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4109: na hi vivādādhyāsitavikalpagato darśanavyāpāro 'yamaupādhika ityasti pratyakṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4111: darśanavyāpāratā kalpanāpoḍhatvena vyāptā, taccāto nivartamānaṃ tāmapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4115: tathā ca vikalpasānnidhyādaupādhiko darśanavyāpāro 'yamālocanamiti kiṃ na syāt? anubhavastūpādhiśaṅkayā tvayaivāsākṣīkṛtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4116: anāgate vikalpe kathamiva taddharmo nirvikalpake pratibhāseteti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4123: upādānapratyayabalādupādeyapratyayastathotpadyata iti cet? hanta yadi sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkāravānutpadyate kathamasya tathātvamaupādhikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4126: sahakāriviśeṣādevamapi syāditi cet? tarhi yādṛśi kārye
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4133: tathāhi, yadyasya pāramārthiko visaṃvādaḥ syāt, tadā pratīyamāno 'pyaupādhiko 'yamavisaṃvāda iti saṃbhāvyeta, sa ca deśakālākārakṛtastāvanna bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4134: ananugatamevānugatatayā darśayatīti cet--na, asādhāraṇasya svalakṣaṇasya vikalpenāsaṃsparśāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4136: ajanakasyaiva tu vastusato viṣayatve pratyakṣatvamarthasāmarthyasamutthatvena vyāptamiti suptapralāpaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4139: na cārthakriyārthī tadasamarthaṃ dṛṣṭvā pravartate, tato 'samarthameva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4141: tathā ca kathamasya viparītāroparūpasya saṃvādo nāmeti cet--na, yadi hi sāmarthyamevāropayet, asādhāraṇamevollikhet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4142: na hyanyadasādhāraṇādrūpāt samarthaṃ nāma tava darśane /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4145: nanvasāmarthyavyāvṛttimātrameva sāmarthyaṃ na tu tattvāntaram, tasya ca na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4147: tathā caikātmyaprathanaṃ na viruddhamiti cet--na, avirodhe sati samāropānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4148: na hi yad yatrāviruddhaṃ sat prathate tat tatrāropitaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4151: tathā ca satyālocanamapi visaṃvādi syāt, kalpanālocanayorbhedānullekhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4153: anarthatvaṃ hi vikalpādabhedo vikalpyasya syāt, ālocanīyād bhedo vā? na tāvat kalpanāgocarasyālīkasya kalpanayā abhedaḥ saṃbhavati, yena bhedollikhanamāropaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4157: sa khalvākāro vikalpādabhinno 'pi bhinna āropyata iti cet? yadi tāvat vijñānanayamālambyaitaducyate, tadālocanasyāpyeṣaiva gatiriti tasyāpyāroparūpatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4158: grāhyākāre 'prāmāṇyaṃ vikalpasyāpi svātmani ca saṃvedanatvādubhayorapi prāmāṇyameveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4159: atha bāhyamarthamadhikṛtya prastuteyaṃ kathā? tathāpi yādṛśākāro vikalpastādṛśākāra eva bāhyatayā pratibhāseta? na cāsau sādhāraṇākāraḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4161: tato yedatat sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamābhāti tanna vikalpākāramabhiniviśate iti bahirevāvatiṣṭhate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4162: bāhyatvavat sādhāraṇatvamapyasyāropyata iti cet--na, asādhāraṇyasya pāramārthikasya kvacidapyanupalabdherāropayitumaśakyatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4170: tatastadekatayānusandhānamiti cet? hanta, yadyayamākāro vikalpātmā tatheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4172: asvasaṃvedyatvād vikalpasya, svasaṃvedanatvena vā, tato bhinnātvāt tādātmyasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4177: vyāvṛttyorbheda eva na tu vastunīti cet? atha keyaṃ vyāvṛttirnāma? na kiściditi cet? evamastu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4185: evaṃ sati sarva eva saugatenaprayujyamānāḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭatayā pratipakṣahetavaḥ padamadhyāropayitumasamarthāḥ prāgeva vikalpasyāpratyakṣatāṃ sādhayitum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4186: tathāpīdamavaśiṣyate, yadetāvatāpi na paramārthasad viṣayasya prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4188: nanu paramārthasato 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyatā aśakyavyutpādanaiva kṣaṇikatvāt jagata ityata uktam--sthemabhājamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4189: nanu sthairyasiddhāvapi jātyādīnāṃ durūpapādatvāt kathaṃ paramārthasato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4193: taddarśanecāpakṣadharmaḥ,na hyasti saṃbhavo vikalpasyārthasāmarthyasamutthatvaṃ niścitamaniścitaṃ ca tadarthasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4194: paramārthasattvam, tathāpi paro 'pi tannirākaraṇasiddhyaiva pratyavasthito na rājājñayā nirākaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4197: namu santu jātyādayaḥ paramārthabhūtāstathāpi yadi te 'pi piṇḍātmabhūtāḥ kathaṃ bhedena pratibhāsaren? tathā apratibhāsamānāśca kathaṃ viśeṣyatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4198: viśeṣyamavacchindyuḥ, anātmabhūtāścet kathaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamaśnuvīrannityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4199: tathāpi śabdo bhinnātmā atadvṛttiḥ kathamavacchedakaḥ syāt, yadi tadgatastadātmā vā na pratīyeta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4203: tacca tadātmatayā tatsaṃsargitayā vā? uktametat iti na hi tadvṛttitayaiva tatsaṃsarga iti niyamaḥ, api tu taṭasthenāpi jñāneneva jñeyasya vācakena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4205: nanu taṭastho 'pyayamavacchedako na sattāmātreṇa, api tu jñātaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4206: na tu śabdajñāne tadānīṃ śravaṇasya vyāpāraḥ, viṣayasya viprayogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4210: tathā aśabdavyāvṛttivikalpajanitavāsanāpaṭunā cakṣuṣaiva manasā vā śabdo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4214: ayamarthaḥ, yadi mano 'bhiprāyeṇaikendriyagrāhyatā prasajyate na kiñcidaniṣṭam, tasya sarvaviṣayatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4216: bāhyendriyamabhipretya, tatrāpi kiṃ nāma yojanātmake vikalpe, kiṃ vā jātyādiyojanātmake? tatra nāmno viśeṣaṇatvapakṣastāvadanabhyupagamenaiva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4222: kevalaṃ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryate śabda ityavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4224: tatkimidānīṃ śabdasmaraṇasya na kaścidastyupayoga ityata āha--indriyajavikalpotpādaṃ prati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4228: śabdastu na niveśayatyātmānaṃ gṛhītaḥ smṛto 'pīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4229: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ dṛśyate, na tu pūrvahṛdayasthaḥ śabdo 'pītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4233: yadyapi saṃjñā hītyādi śloke sā taṭasthetyetāvadeva prakṛtopayogi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4238: saṃhatau hetutā teṣām iti nyāyenātiśayaparamparotpādena pūrvāvasthāsmaraṇādisahakārimadhyamadhyāsīnaṃ yadevendriyaṃ tadeva vikalpajanakaṃ netaraditi nāsti kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4239: tathāpi vikalpasya sthiraviṣayatvāt kṣaṇikatvasvīkāre nirviṣayatvamāpādyeteti nisphalaḥ prayāsaḥ syāditi manyamānaḥ sthairyamālambyaiva pariharati--na ca janakatveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4241: syādetatsahakāritvaṃ saṃskārasyendriyaṃ prati, yadyanayorviṣayabhedo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4243: indriyasaṃskārayoḥ parasparādhipatyaṃ viṣayabhedāt kīdṛśānna bhavati kiṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4248: nanu vyāpāranubandhitayā saṃskārasya yadi purovartī viṣayaḥ, tadā atītāvasthāsphuraṇaṃ na syādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4250: tasmādatītaviṣayatvāt kriyāyāḥ vyāpārānubandhitayāpi saṃskārasya sa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4252: evamindriyasyāpi yadyatītāvasthasyaiva vyāpāravato viṣayaḥ, tadā purovartiviṣayasphuraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4253: tasmāt tasyāpi vyāpāravataḥ purovartyeva viṣaya iti vyāpārato 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4257: na hi cakṣuṣyapi sahakāriṇi gandhajñānād gamdhajñānam, api tu rūpajñānameveti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4260: tathā sati gandhajñānād rasanādisahakāriṇo 'pi rūpajñānameva syāt, na rasādijñānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4261: tasmāt kevalasya cakṣuṣo yadyapi rūpameva vyāpāraviṣayaḥ, tathāpi pūrvāvasthāsaṃskārasahakārimatastadvāneva purovartī vyāpāraviṣaya iti na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4263: pūrvāvasthā cakṣuṣā asannikṛṣṭā kathaṃ tadvyāpāraviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4265: atra tatsaṃbandhameva tadvyāpāraviṣayatvaṃ syāt, saṃbandhasya tadvyāpakatvaṃ vā? ādyaṃ nirākāroti--tatkimiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4267: pradhānavyāpāraviṣayatā hyavāntaravyāpāraviṣayatayā vyāptā, sā cātītāvasthāto nivartamānā tāmapi nivartayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4268: atha savikalpake janayitavye pūrvāvasthāsmaraṇamevāvāntaravyāpāro na tu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4277: viśeṣaṇaviśaṣyabhāvaḥ, tathāpi vidyamānadharmaviṣayaiva sā vyavasthitiriti na kaścit sūtravirodha iti yadyapi rahasyam, tathāpi atītāvasthāyāḥ saṃbandhānabhyupagame 'pi na kācillakṣaṇakṣatiḥ na hi yāvatpratyetavyagocara indriyasannikarṣa iti sūtram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4282: kāryamekamadhikṛtyendriyasannikarṣasaṃskārayoḥ parasparasahakāritā, tadeva tvekamanayoḥ kuta ityāśayavān codayati--nanu pūrvāpareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4284: yadyapi tadityullekho na sarvavikalpavyāpī, tathāpi pratisandhānajñāne tāvadasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4288: tannirākaraṇenaiva hi jātyādyabhāve apratisandhānātmakasyāpi vikalpasya pratyākhyānamayatnasiddhamityabhisandhiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4289: nanu viruddhadharmasaṃsargo 'pi syāt, na ca bheda ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4293: yadyapi viṣayabhedavato 'pi sarvajñavijñānasyaikatvamakṣatameva, tathāpi kṣaṇikānekakālīna (?) nīlālambanatvamava yadi pratisandhānasya paro
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4296: tasmādāropitaikatvaviṣayatvamasya pāramārthikaikatvaviṣayatvaṃ vā? tatra prathamaṃ yadi paro 'bhyupagacchedanukūlayedevāsmān tasmāt nānāvasthāviśiṣṭapāramārthikaikaviṣayatayāstyekatvaṃ parābhiprāyagocaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4304: kiṃ tu sannihitaviṣayamasannihitaviṣayaṃ vā yadeva liḍgādinirapekṣeṇa indriyeṇa vijñānaṃ janyate, tadevāparokṣarūpaṃ samutpadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4309: tathāpyabhyupagamavāde 'pi na kaścid virodha iti pratibandigraha iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4311: tasmād viṣayabhedādavirodha iti tvayā samādhātavyamiti cet? nanvihāpīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4313: tadidantāspadayorapīti? nanvevaṃ sati dattaḥ svahasto bauddhānāmityata āha--sambandheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4319: na ca kadalīkāṇḍapratyabhijñānataḥ padmarāgapratyabhijñānasya kañcid viśeṣamupalabhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4320: nanu nānādigdeśasaṃbaddhasyāpi tava kadācidekatvamupalabhyate, tat kathaṃ tasyāpyekatvaniścayaḥ? atha nānādigdeśasaṃsargaḥ svāśrayaṃ bhedayitvā na nivartata iti niḥsvabhāvatā vāpādayet, anaikāntiko vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4324: tathā hi yadi pūrvāparakālasaṃbandho vastuni virudhyeta, vijñāne 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4327: evaṃ ca buddhīnāṃ niyatārthatayā pratisandhānagandho 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4330: atītavartamānaviṣayatve 'pi naikaṃ jñānamatītaṃ vartamānaṃ ca svīkriyata iti cet? atha kimidra ca vartamānatvam sattvaṃ sadantarasaṃbandho vā? evaṃ cātītatvamapi naṣṭatvaṃ naṣṭāntarasaṃbandho vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4331: tatra sadantaranaṣṭāntarasaṃbandhaḥ pratisandhāne sarvajñavijñāne cāstyeva naṣṭānaṣṭaviṣayatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4333: sattvanaṣṭatve parasparaṃ virudhyete, te caikatra pratisandhāne na sta iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4334: cet? evaṃ tarhi padrāgamaṇirapyutpatterārabhya svāvayavavibhāgaparyantaṃ satsvarūpaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4336: sa eva tu satā kenacit saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kenacidasatā pratisandhānamiva sadasabhdyāṃ viṣayābhyāmiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4339: te yatra padmarāgādau na santi tatrautsargikamekatvameveti samaḥ samādhirityabhiprāyeṇa deśamantarbhāvyopasaṃharati--tasmāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4340: na cānyasya saṃbandhinaḥ kālasya bhedo viruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ anyasya padmarāgamaṇerbhedaṃ nānātvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4342: yadi vikalpajātīyaṃ pratīndriyārthasannikarṣo na kāraṇaṃ vyabhicārāditi parasyābhiprāyastadānujñaivottaram
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4343: na hi vayamapi vikalpamātraṃ prati tasya kāraṇatvaṃ brūmaḥ, kiṃ tu sākṣātkārivijñānaṃ prati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4348: na tu sākṣātkārādirasya viśeṣo 'sti, aupādhikatvāt tasyeti āśaḍkya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4353: tasmād darśanavyāpārā vikalpā indriyārthasannikarṣajanmāna iti yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4355: nanvindriyaviṣaya eva yadi śabdo 'pi pravarteta, so 'pi sākṣātkāriṇameva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4357: tasmād śabdaikaviṣayatayā pravartamāno vikalpo nendriyaviśayaṃ spṛśati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4358: tadasparśe ca na svābhāvikamasya sākṣātkāritvamityāśanayavānāśaḍkya nirākaroti---na ca śabdeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4359: ekatrārthe indriyaṃ kāraṇam anyatra tannirapekṣaḥ śabdādirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4362: śītadravyāpagamaḥ, tadapagame vā tadanupalambhaḥ, taddhetukaduḥkhābhāvo vā śītāpanoda ityucyate, sa coṣṇadravyopagamasādhyo na tu tadupalambhasādhyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4363: anyathā sannipātamūḍhasya svedane 'pi doṣāpagamo na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4365: tuhinācalaguhāmadhyavartini ca sarvajñe vaḍavānalasākṣātkāravati tuhinācalavilayaḥ syādityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4373: sa eṣa nyāyo yadi paramārthasatyapi syāt, kīdṛśo doṣaḥ? na kevalaṃ kālpanike vyavahāre tavedaṃ samarthanamapi tu pāramārthike 'pītyāha---api
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4378: tathā caikekaparamāṇuniyame sthūlapratibhāso bhrānto 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4379: jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi ca paramāṇunāmapyekatvaprasaḍgādamūrtatvādiprasaḍgācceti sa eva doṣa ityādyuttānaṃ dūṣaṇamutsṛjya anyamāha---teṣāṃ sarvān pratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4380: paramāṇūnāmekajñānasvabhāvatve vā na te dvitīyena viditā syurityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4382: viṣayaviṣayiniyamārthaṃ bauddhena svīkṛtastathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi ko niyanteti tulyo 'nuyogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4384: bhāvābhāvayoḥ samavāyatadvatorviṣayaviṣayiṇośca vayamapi svabhāvenaiva parasparopahitaṃ sambandhamātiṣṭhāmahe
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4386: tathāpi sambandho 'pyanubhūyamāno vinā bādhakaṃ nopekṣituṃ yujyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4389: na tāvadviśiṣṭavyavahāra eva nāsti, tasya spaṣṭatayā nihnotumaśakyatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4394: nanvasti vyavahāro na tu vāstavaḥ, sa ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4397: tvaduktameva vāsanādvāramupādāya yeti vāstava evāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ syāt, tadā kīdṛśo doṣa ityāśayavānāha--astu tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4398: tathāpi vāstava evāyamityatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha---tathā satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4403: manasaḥ sarvaviṣayatvaṃ na tāvad vyāpārānubandhitayā parasya vivakṣitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4405: tasmāt pratipattyanubandhitayā vā syāt, sarvavāsanādhāratayā vā? ādyaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4407: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayakamapi na pratipattyanubandhitayā asarvaviṣayamapratipattirūpatvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4408: na ca sakalasaṃskārādhāratayetyāha--acetanatayā na vicārakam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4410: tvadabhipretasya ca manasaḥ sakalavāsanādhārakatvaṃ niṣetsyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tasmādātmaiveti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4417: nanu yadyevaṃbhūtacetanādhiṣṭhitamindriyam, tarhi nirvikalpakotpattikāla eva labdhasaskārasacivatayā vikalpameva janayedityata āha--sa khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4420: tatsahāyaśca vikalpayatīti na cakṣuṣaḥ kaścidupayoga ityata āha--cakṣuṣeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4421: nanvevaṃbhūtā sāmagrī militāpi yadi cakṣurvyāpāravirahe na vikalpikāṃ dhiyam upajanayet, tatastasyāpi kāraṇatvaṃ kalpyeta, natvetadastītyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4423: etena sākṣātkāraṃ prati tasyānvayavyātirekau sta iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4426: tathāpi ka upakāraḥ samarthita ityata āha--teneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4427: jñāpyajñāpakabhāva ityupalakṣaṇam, kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi na sarvatrāstīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4429: tadarthālocanānugataṃ smaraṇaṃ yayoste viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye tathokte tayoḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4431: yadyapi svābhāviko viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nopakāramapekṣata iti tatra tatra vakṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4434: nanu yadi svābhāvikamanayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvam, prathamataḥ svabhāve gṛhyamāṇe kiṃ na gṛhītam, na ca svabhāvastadānīṃ na gṛhīta ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4436: na khalu rūpaparamāṇuṣu sparśādiparamāṇavo 'pi svabhāvataḥ sthitā ityetāvataiva pratītipathamavataranti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4437: sāmagryabhāvānna tatheti cet? sa ihāpi samāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4438: ata eva pramāṇaṃ kṛtsnavṛttīti matvā yadāpāditam, tadapi nāstītyata āha--teneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4449: pītaḥ śaḍkha ityādinā vyabhicāranivṛttyartham avyabhicāritve satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4451: na caitanmantavyamiti bhāṣyamiti indriyārthasannikarṣamantareṇāpi saṃśayotpattidarśanāt atatkāraṇatayā prasaṅga evāsya nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4453: yadyapi na savaḥ saṃśayaḥ indriyārthasannikarṣajastathāpi sākṣātkāravānavaśya tajjanyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4456: mana eva kevalamindrayanirapekṣaṃ bahirvyāpriyamāṇaṃ sākṣātkārisaṃśayādi janayati, dṛṣṭo hyasyānuvyavasīyamānajñānaviśeṣaṇe ghaṭadau vyāpāraḥ, indriyavyāpāravigame
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4465: bāhyena viśeṣyeṇāpyasannikṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ kathamiva jñānamutpādayet? utpādane vāndhabadhirāderapyutpādayet iti siddhāntaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4476: saṃvedanatve hi teṣāṃ svasaṃvedanatā śaḍkāspadamapi syāditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4477: nanvindriyasya vai sata iti vadato bhāṣyakṛto manasa indriyatvamiṣṭamevetyata āha---na ca taditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4478: manasa indriyatvābhyupagamo vātsyāyanīye gautamīyasūtra viruddha ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4479: mā bhūd vibhāgaparamidaṃ sūtram, tathāpi sūtrākārasya mana indriyaṃ yadyabhimatamindriyaprakaraṇa eva lakṣayedityata āha---tatra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4480: indriyatvena tatprakaraṇa evābhighāne prāpte yadanyatra karoti tenādhikamasya kiñcid rūpaṃ vijñeyamiti sūcayati, na tvindriyatvameva na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4482: darśayiṣyati hi vātikakāra ityāgāmikā phakkikā bhramanirāsārthaṃ bhūtābhūteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4485: saguṇānāṃ cakṣurādīnāmindriyabhāvo, manastu na saguṇamindrayamityatrāpi yo viśeṣaguṇo yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tajjātīyena guṇena saha vṛttiḥ saguṇatvam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4486: grāhyaviśeṣaguṇajātīyavirahaśca manasa iti yadyabhipretaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tadaitadapi vaidharmyameva, kiṃ tvebhirakṣarairetadapyabhidhātuṃ na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4489: tathā hi, indriyabhūtānāmeṣāṃ saguṇatvaṃ grāhyairguṇaiḥ saha saṃbandhaścakṣurādīnām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4490: manasastvindriyamūtasyaiva na saguṇatvam, na grāhyena guṇena saha saṃbandha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4491: tasmādatrāpi śabdadoṣaḥ, na tvabhripāyadoṣa iti mantavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4497: satrākāravacanasya vivādāspadatvāt kathaṃ tenaiva nirṇaya ityata āheti pūrayati bhāṣyakāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4498: śābdetyanena śabdendriyasamāhārajamayamasāvaśva iti jñānaṃ vyavacchedyamabhimataṃ vārttikakṛta iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayati---na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4500: vācyatvena hi viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhītena niśeṣyaniṣṭhena bhavitvayamataḥ kevalavācyatvaprastāve 'pi tathaivodāhṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4502: gṛhīte hyaśvatve tadasannikarṣe 'pi yo 'yaṃ piṇḍastvayā dṛṣṭo 'yamasāvaśva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4509: tatra spaṣṭagrahaṇarūpatvāt sākṣātkārāparavyapadeśādaindriyakametaditi yuktaṃ syāt, na tvasākṣātkārādapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4510: tayośca ko 'tra manasā vedyata iti bhavāneva paribhāvayatu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4512: asākṣātkāritvapakṣe ca nedam aindriyakamiti prathamapadeneva vyudastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4521: sa ca tadābhāseṣu āviṣkṛteṣu bhavatītyāśayavataḥ ayamārambha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4522: tator'thādityatra hi pañcamyā hetutvamarthasya vijñānaṃ pratidarśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4523: tatparaśca evakāraḥ evaṃ saṃbadhyate--sa vyapadeśakor'tho hetureva yasya na punaraheturapi tadvijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4527: yadi tata eva tabhdavati, nārthāntarādityavyapadeśakādityato na virodhaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4529: tato na tasya vyudāsaḥ kṛta ityata āha--tator'thādityatra hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4531: tasyāśca pratiyoginyanumānādijātireva, tathā ca tasyā eva jātervyavacchedo vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4535: tena vyapadeśo hi tadupādhikaṃ nirūpaṇami vivakṣitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4536: na ca jñānaṃ kartrā karaṇena vā nirūpyate, api tu karmaṇaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4541: sa cārtha eveti viśeṣyaḥ prāpyate, nāntarīyakatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4546: indriyādayo hyavyapadeśakā api vyapadeśakādhipatyenaiva jñānajanakā ityavirodhitayā na te vyavacchedyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4547: liḍgādayastu vyapadeśakādhipatyanirapekṣatayā tadvirodhina iti ta evānye vyavacchettavyā ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4548: nanu sarvaṃ ca svaviṣayāditi vārttikamasaṅgatameva, smṛtyanumitibhrāntīnāṃ svaviṣayāpanutpatterata āha--yatsaṃvṛtitveneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4549: nanu bhrāntijñānamapi na vyapadeśakam antareṇa bhavati, tat kutaścodyamatasmādapītyata āha--purovartīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4550: atasmādapītyatra yadyapi na śrūyate, tathāpi vyapadeśakādapi na bhavatīti boddhavyamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4551: tadidamuktam--yena viśeṣarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate na tatastabhdavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4552: tasmād yattata eva bhavati tato bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4554: nanu vyapadeśakādanutpatterityavyapadeśakādutpatteriti vā codyamupakrābhyāśakte rajatāt notpadyata iti vākchalamātrāmityata āha--na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4557: mithyājñānanirāso hyanyayogavyavacchedena vā, ayogavyavacchedena vā? na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4560: yadyavyapadeśakasyaiva, vaṇigvīthyāṃ svatantrasya rajatasya hetutvaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4564: rajataṃ vyapadeśakaṃ na heturiti cet? kathaṃ punā rajataṃ vyapadeśakaṃ svātantryeṇa purovartyātmanā vā? na tāvadādyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4566: purovartyātmanā ca pratyantare tad bhavati vyapadeśakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4569: ayaṃ tvabhiprāyaḥ syāt, yādṛśākāreṇa vyapadeśakor'thaḥ tādṛśādutpannaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4574: tadetallakṣaṇamābhiprāyikamapyasmannaye kadācit saṃbhāvyeta, tvannate tu viruddhamasiddhaṃ cedamuktaṃ vārttikakṛtā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4576: vyapadeśako hyartho vartamānatayā sarvatra pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4578: tathā ca pratyakṣatve sādhye 'pratyakṣatvameva sidhyatīti bhavati viruddhatvamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4579: atha vartamāna eva vyapadeśakastadā samānakālatayā tator'thādityasiddhamāha--tatsamāneti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4580: yattu kenacit pralapitam--aparokṣajñānāvabhāsitaiva vartamānateti, tat tucchamityupekṣitavān
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4583: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam ityādinā kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣa eva grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4584: sa ca bhinnakālayoreva bhavatīti svabhāṣayā samarthitaṃ pareṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4585: na ca vayaṃ bhinnakālayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣam avajānīmahe; kiṃ tvatītasya vartamānatayāvabhāsanaṃ tasya vā satyatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4588: anene hi na pratibhāsamānatayārtho grāhya iti vyavahniyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4590: ākāra eva tvavabhāsamamānatayā grāhyaḥ, sa ca jñānātmabhūtatayā vartamāna eveti na kaścid virodha ityata āha--anahaḍkāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4591: vijñānād bhinnasya nīlāderanubhavo yadi satyo, na jñānagatākāravedanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4592: asatyaścenna pratayakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti seyamubhayataḥ pāśā rajjurityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4593: api ca bhavatvākāravedanam, bhavatu vārthasyākārārpakatvaṃ vā , tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4595: tathā hi pratibhāsamānasyaiva jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate, na tvapratibhāsamānasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4597: tasmād vyapadeśakona janakaḥ, janakaśca na vyapadeśaka iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4604: lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogamantarbhāvyasihaśabdo māṇavake vartate, na tathā dhūmapratyakṣamagnau siṃhapratyakṣaṃ māṇavake,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4609: anumīyata iti kor'thaḥ? anumitau parisphuratīti, tacca bauddhanaye svapne
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4611: yaśca sarvathaiva jñānāgocaraḥ sa vyavahniyata iti kutaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4615: na hi kiñcid vastubhūtaṃ vācyaṃ nāma saugatānāṃ samasti, lakṣaṇavākyena tu vyavahāramātraṃ prasādhyate, sa cātadvyāvṛttiniṣṭha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4616: jñānasya kalpanāpoḍhasya pratyakṣatayā vyutpādyamānasya kathaṃ sarver'thā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4627: nanu vyatyaye 'pi satsaṃprayoga iti syāt, na tu tattacchabdasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4629: yadyapi pratyakṣajñānamapyanena lakṣaṇena svātmani pratyakṣaṃ na syādeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4630: tathāpīndriyārthasannikarṣajanyatvamātraṃ tāvat tatrāpyastīti kadācit paro brūyādityata āha--anumānādīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4642: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityanena hi viśeṣaniṣedhena kaṇṭhataḥ anumānaprāmāṇyaniṣedhor'thataḥ pratyakṣaprāmāṇyavidhiśca vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4651: tenāyamarthaḥ---yadyanu mānamapramāṇam, kathaṃ tenaiva vidhiniṣedhasiddhiḥ? atha tena vidhiniṣedhasiddhiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4654: na cet parapratyāyanam, nūnamaunmattyamāviṣkaroti vakturityāha---api ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4659: vyāptismṛtisahāyād dvitīyaliṅgadarśanādevānumitisiddheralaṃ tṛtīyaliṅgadarśanakalpanayeti yathāśrutabhāṣyānusāriṇaḥ tān risyati na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4661: yastu sahakārilābhādanyo na kaścidudbodho nāmeti manyate, taṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4666: na ca vyāptiviśiṣṭaṃ liṅgamekaikasyobhayasya vā gocaraḥ, kiṃ tu svatantramubhayamubhayasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4672: dvitīyaliṅgadarśanaṃ hi vasatugatyā liṅgaviṣayamityetāvataiva vyāptismṛteḥ sahakāriliṅgatvarūpollekhitayā vā? na tāvadādyaḥ, dūrād dhūmaviṣayavastutvajñānasyāpi prakārāntarāyātavyāptismṛtiṃ prati sahakāritvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4674: tadidamuktam--vṛttyā salvayaṃ ghaṭayet, vyāpāreṇa na rūpato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4677: iha tādātmyatadutpattisvarūpādiniścaye pratibandhaniścayastadā na syāt yadi te eva pratibandhaḥ, tābhyāṃ samānopāyo vā pratibandhaḥ, tayoreva vā pratibandhaparyavasānam, te eva vā pratibandhaniścayopāyaḥ tatropāyatvaṃ sahacārāvasāye vā, vyabhicāraśaḍkānirāse vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4678: vyabhicāraśaḍkāpyupādhidarśanād vā, upādhiśaṅkayā vā, bhūyo bhūyaḥ sahacaritayoḥ apyulabdhayoḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4679: veti? tatra ca sahacārāvasāyaḥ tāvadindriyasannikarṣādhīnotpattiḥ tadutpattyaniścaye 'pi vahnidhūmayoḥ sidhyati, vyabhicāraśaḍkāpi darśanayogyopādhyadhīnā yogyānupalambhabādhādeva nirastā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4680: atīndriyāstu upādhayaḥ anyatra pramāṇaparidṛṣṭāḥ śaḍkitā api yathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4682: pramāṇapathānavatīrṇopādhiśaḍkā tu tadutpattiniścayamapyāskandatīti kathaṃ sā tena nivartanīyetyāha--atrocyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4687: viśeṣastu svābhāvikasaṃbandhasya vyāpakatvam, avyāpakatvaṃ tu tadutpattyāderityāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4688: tadidamuktam--sa ca yo vā sa veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4689: na ca samānopāyatvādubhayoranyatarāniścaye nānyataraniścaya iti sāmpratam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4693: tayoreva pratibandhaḥ paryavasyatīti pakṣaṃ nirācaṣṭe--api ca rasāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4694: yattu bhede sati vyāpyavyāpakābhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva iti vyudapādi prajñākareṇa tat pāpādapi pāpīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4695: tathā hi niyāmakavirahe bhinnāyoravyabhicāraḥ śaḍkākalaḍkāḍkitatvāt duravadhāraṇa iti tāmapanetuṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nenopanītaḥ, sa ced rūpa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4697: na caitat kīrteranumataṃ yad rasena rūpānumāne 'nyathābhyupāyamāha--yadi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4698: ca sarvalokasiddhamativāhya svayaṅkṛtalakṣaṇairvyavahāraḥ, tadā bhede satītyetadapi parihīyatām
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4701: tadātmano 'pi etadastīti cet? astu śiśapāpi vṛkṣakāryam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4702: kathaṃ tenaiva tatkartavyamiti cet? ko doṣaḥ? asiddhaṃ siddhena sādhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4703: natu tadeva siddhamasiddhaṃ ceti cet? hantaivamanāgatamapi kathaṃ vyāpakatāmātreṇa kāraṇamasiddhatvāt? vartamānamapi kathaṃ vyāpyatāmātreṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4708: api ca rasarūpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo vahnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhasādhyo vā syāt, kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhau puñjāt puñjāntarotpāttiriti nyāyena vā? ādyastāvat kṣaṇayoraśakya eva, tayoreva pratyakṣānārohāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4710: na hi vahneriva rūpasya pūrvakālatāniyamaṃ dhūmasyeva rasasya praścādbhāvitāniyamaṃ laukikāḥ pratipadyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4711: kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhinyāyastu na laukika iti vastuto laukikānāṃ rasato rūpānumānaṃ na syādityāha---laukikānāṃ cedamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4712: api ca ityanena te eva pratibandha iti nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4713: tādātmyaṃ tu gamyagamakabhāve pratyuta viruddhamityāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4714: na hi tadeva karma niśceyam, kartṛ ca svaniścayena niścāyakaṃ ca,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4718: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānyamaniścitaṃ niścitastu viśeṣa ityāśaḍkya kenacit samarthitam utthāpya dūṣayati---yatviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4719: bhinnayoreva vyāvṛttyorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ kiṃ tvabhinnādhyavaseyasaṃbandhāt tayorapi tādātmyaṃ vyavahniyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4720: sa yadyabhinnadevadattasaṃbandhāt, chatrakuṇḍalayorapyabhedaṃ vyavaharati ko vārayitā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4727: tau hi na tāvannirnimittau sārvatrikatvaprasaḍgāt, niyataviṣayau copalabhyete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4729: sopādherapyavyabhicāre nirūpādherapi vyabhicāre aniyamaprasaḍgāt, , tathā sati kāryātmanorapi kāraṇātmavyabhicāraḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4732: tathāpi yatra sphuṭo vyabhicārastatra niṣphalamupādhyanusaraṇaṃ tadarthatvāt tasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4738: yato na svābhāviko na nirūpādhikaḥ, tato na niyato nāvyabhicārītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4739: atha dhūmādīnāmapi vahnyādibhiḥ kathaṃ svābhāvika ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4742: tat kimatra nāsau sphuṭa ityata āha---kvacidvyabhicārasyādarśanāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4743: nanu kvacit kadācid vyabhicāro 'pi syādayogyatvācca na dṛśyetāpītyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4747: nanūpādhyabhāve 'nupalabhyamānavyabhicārakalpanānavakāśaḥ, sa eva tūpādhyabhāvaḥ kutastya ityāśaṅkate---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4750: anyathā sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sarvadā sarvatra sarveṣāṃ jātyā kaścit anupalabhyamāno 'pi syādupādhiriti śaḍkā tadutpattāvapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4752: nānāpramāṇagocarārthasākṣātkāravataḥ sarvajñasyāpi svabhāvata evānupalabhyaḥ kaścidartho bhavet, bhavecca sarvapramāṇāpoḍhamapi kadācidadvaitam, prakṛtipuruṣau vā, niḥsvabhāvatā vā jagataḥ, vedānāṃ vāprāmāṇyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4753: tat kathaṃ caityavandanādāvapi bhikṣuḥ pravarteta? arthasandehāt pravṛttiriti cet? yatra pramāṇāni paribhūya śaḍkāpiśācī prasarati kutastatrārthasaṃbhāvanāpi? āstāṃ tāvat paralokapravṛttiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4755: yadyapi viśiṣṭāhārānantaraṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ puṣṭidhātusāmyādi daśyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4756: maraṇaṃ taṃ rogādyanantarameva, tathāpi āhāraviśeṣo maraṇasyaiva hetuḥ kadācid bhavet, kathamanyathānte tadantaramasyopalambhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4760: rogādikameva ca puṣṭyādihetuḥ, tattu puṣṭyādikāle adṛśyatvādeva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4762: na hi puṣṭyādikāraṇairdṛśyaireva bhavitavyamityapi kadācit syāt, yathā cāprāmāṇikopādhiśaḍkyā vyabhicāritvaśaṅkayā vā anumānanivṛttiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4764: tasmādutprekṣitārthaniścayavat tacchaḍkāpi bandhyaiva, pramitasyaiva tu niścayavat śaḍkāpi samīhopayoginītyāha---tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4769: sādhane sopādhiḥ sādhye nirūpādhireva upādhitvena niśceyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4786: sā ca na kvacidupādhiḥ, dhūmasya vahnineva tayāpi svabhāvasaṃbandhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4788: na ca kṛtakatvānuṣṇatvayoḥ saṃbandhe tejojātīyetaratvavadihāpi sādhyadharmajātīyetaratvamupādhiḥ, tasya pramāṇabādhaikamātraniyatatvāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4789: ata eva upādhimapaśyanto 'pi virodhipramāṇasadasadbhāvaniścayavyagratayā muhūrtam anumitau vilambāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4790: tadevaṃ sarvathopādhyanupalambhāt tadabhāvaniścayo yathā dhūmasaṃbandhe tathānyatrāpi draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4792: nanu pramāṇasiddhe vastuni svabhāvo 'valambanam, na tu svabhāvāvalambanenaiva vastuvyavasthetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kena punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4793: prathamadarśanenaiva vahnidhūmayoḥ avyabhicāragrahaṇam, dvitīyādibhistu śaḍkāmātramapanīyata iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayanneva prakṛtaṃ prapañcayati---yadā tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4795: yo 'yamupādhimādāya yena saha saṃbadhyate sa nirūpādhyavasthāyāṃ tasyāgamako yathā vahnirdhūmasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4796: sopādhyavasthāyāmapyupādheḥ, kevalasyaiva sāmarthye sa eva gamako na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4799: yatra tūpādhiḥ kevalo vyabhicārī tatra sopādhirapi gamaka eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4801: tat kasya hetoḥ? viśiṣṭasya nirūpādhitvāditi bhūyodarśanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4812: atra ca na vāraṃsakhyāniyame 'bhyupayogaḥ, mṛdumadhyādhimātrabuddhibhedena puṃsāṃ vicitraśaktitvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4818: bhūyaḥpravṛttau tu yadi na vyabhicāropalambhaḥ, upādhyupalambho 'pi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4819: syāt, dvayopagame tu tanniyataḥ saṃbandha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4821: dhūmādīnāṃ maitratanayatvādīnāṃ ca bhūyodarśanatvāviśeṣe 'pi kuto viśeṣādekasya gamakatvamaparasya natyata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4822: yat tvatroktam, yathā hyanārdendhane vahnau na dhūma iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4824: tathā yadi maitrājjātasyāpi kasyacid vivakṣitāhārapariṇativiraheṇa śyāmatopālapsyata sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4827: tathā satyapi copādhivādo vyarthaḥ, vyabhicārādeva maitratanayasyāhetutvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4829: tathā hi nopahitasya niścita eva sādhyavyabhicāraḥ, upādherlakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ nāma? sādhanāvyāpakatve sati sādhyavyāpakatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4835: nanu vajre lohalekhyatvaṃ prati pārthivatvahetoḥ ka upādhiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4838: na khalu nibiḍāvayavatvena ubhayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4840: na hyadbhyo medinī nibiḍeti na praśithilāvayavā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4842: yathā yathā śaithilyāpakarṣastathā tathā lekhituḥ prayatnaprakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4843: yadi tu śaithilyamaprayojakaṃ tadā mṛtkāṣṭhapāṣāṇādiṣu prayatnaprakarṣo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4847: ata evānayorekatarapravṛttinivṛttyorevānyatarapravṛttinivṛttī, na tu pārthivatvapravṛttinivṛttyoreva lohalekhyatvapravṛttinivṛttī, vajre
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4850: sa ca bādhaikaniyataviṣaya iti nātiprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4852: yadyapi dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya smṛtyā saha vinaśyadavasthasyaiva parāmarśajanakatvaṃ kvacit, tathāpi yatra dṛṣṭamātra eva vahninivṛttau nivṛtto dhūmaḥ kālāntare jijñāsāvaśāt parāmṛśyate, tatra dvayorapi liṅgadarśanayoratītatvamityāśayavatoktam---yadyapītyādi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4853: yena ca parāmarśo neṣyate tena vākyasya caturtho 'vayava apanayo 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4856: svārthānumāne tu sā dvitīyaliṅga darśanādevāvagateti kiṃ parāmarśeneti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4857: cet---na, pakṣadharmatā hi vyāptyā saha pratisaṃhitānumānopayoginī, tādṛśī copanayena pradarśyate, na tu dvitīyaliṅgadarśanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4861: tataḥ svārthānumāne yadyasti tasyopayogaḥ, nūnaṃ parāmarśo 'pi tṛtīyaḥ svīkartavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4864: nanu vyāpārānubandhitayā viṣayatvam, viṣayatve ca vyāpārānubandha iti parasparāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4865: atha vyāpārānubandhitayaiva viṣayatvam? tathāpyasaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣāt kathaṃ tasyaiva vyāpārānubandhitetyāśaḍkya pariharati--na cātiprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4866: na dhūmajñānasyāgniḥ svatantrasya vyāpāraviṣayo yenāsaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt, kiṃ tu jñeyaviśeṣaṇasya, tasya ca jñāyamānasya dhūmasyāgninā saha niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasaṃbandha eva, ato nātiprasaṅgaḥ ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4867: pūrvaṃ lakṣyapadārthapraśnāvasare anumīyate 'neneti kāraṇārtha ityuttaraṃ dattam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4868: idānīmanumitiḥ kasyāñcidavasthāyāmanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavena veti vijñāsāpraśne bhāvaḥ karaṇaṃ vetyuttaram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4870: ataḥ ṭīkākṛd api vyāpāratvenāpramāṇyaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvā phalāntarahetutvena prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayati sma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4874: pramāṇādhikāra'pi phalataḥ sa evārthaḥ, tatpūrvakaṃ pramākaraṇamanumānamiti sūtrasaṃbandhāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4875: tathāpi vivakṣābhedāt vikalpenobhayamubhayatra saṃbhantsyata iti vivakṣitvā ekaikakaniṣṭhatayaikaikaṃ darśitamiti tathaiva vyākhyātavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4877: vipakṣāvṛttiriti vārttike bahuvrīhisamāsasthito viśeṣaṇatayā vyatireko niṣkṛṣya svapradhānatayā tatpuruṣapadena pradarśito vipakṣāvṛttirvyatireka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4882: pṛthivīvadudakavad vā, vacanamātrānurodhād vā pradhānavat śaśaviṣāṇavacca,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4883: mūḍhapraśnānurodhād vā dharmāntaraṃ prati pūrvavadeva svavacanavirodhabhayād veti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4885: laukikapravṛttinivṛttyorvastumātraviṣayatvāt dvitīyādiṣveva ca paramparayā praviśatīti na pṛthak nirākriyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4888: ubhayathāpi niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikaraṇābhyāmeva nirūpyate, na tvekena satā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4890: nanu sata eva kutaścit pramāṇapratītānnivartsyatītyata āha---pakṣādanyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4891: tadanenāsatyadhikaraṇe nivṛttinirūpaṇaṃ pratiṣiddham, nivṛttau tu mūkataivociteti hṛdayam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4895: yatra khalu bhāvaḥ sarvathaiva na nirūpitaḥ tadadhikaraṇatayā tasyānyatropalabdhasyābhāvo nirūpyata iti dṛṣṭam, yathā gavi dṛṣṭasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4897: yatra tu śṛḍgābhāvo 'pi gaganakamalādau nirūpayituṃ na śakyate, tatra śṛṅgameva nirūpyata ityalaukikamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4900: taduktaṃ jñānaśriyā dharmasya kasyacidavastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kimihāsti no vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4901: kkāpyasti cet kathamiyanti na ḍhūṣaṇāni nāstyeva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ // iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4903: yadyapi svavacanavirodhabhiyāpi sarvathāvicārāsahor'thaḥ svīkartuṃ na śakyate, vacanād vicāro garīyāniti nyāyāt, anyathā vikalpaśabdau na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4905: tathā hi svalakṣaṇasyāsādhāraṇyenāśakyasamayagocaratayā, śabdasya ca samayādhīnapravṛttikatayā vikalpasya ca tadekaviṣayatayā na tayorvastugocaratvamiti vicāre,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4906: śabdasya kācidapi vastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kimāhāsti no vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4907: astyeva cet kathamiyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāstyeva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4909: tathāpi tattvaṃ nirūpayan pariharati---na vai tattvata iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4910: nanu yadi naikataraniṣedho vidhirvā tat kimubhayavidhiḥ niṣedho vā? tathā sati atitarā durghaṭamāpadyetetyata āha---no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4912: nirvahet, anyathā punarapi svavacanapratirodha ityata āha---upayoge veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4913: svavacanapratirodhabhayāddhi tadā niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvasvīkāraḥ syād yadi tathā sati bhayaṃ nivarteta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4915: no khalu sakalavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca tanniṣedhavyavahārabhājanaṃ ceti vacanaṃ parasparamavirodhi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4917: hanta ! sakalavidhiniṣedhavyavahārābhājanatvena kiñcid vyavahniyate na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4922: vyavahniyata iti pakṣe tu viṣayasvarūpaparyālocanenaiva virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4923: na hi sarvavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca vyavahniyate ceti ca //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4924: api ca yadyavastuno niṣedhavyavahāragocaratvam, vidhivyavahāraviṣayatāpi kiṃ na syāt? pramāṇābhāvasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4926: kiñciditi---cet---na, tatrāpi sutatvasya vidyamānatvāt, na hi bandhyāyāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4929: vacanamātrametanna tu paramārthataḥ suta evāsāviti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4933: asutatvanivṛttimātrasya svarūpataḥ kṛtijñaptyorasāmarthye samarthamarthāntaramavaseyam anantarbhāvya kuto hetutvamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4935: vyāvṛttirūpamapi ca tadeva gamakaṃ yadatasmādeva, yathā śiṃśapātvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4936: bandhyāsutastvasutādiva ghaṭādeḥ, sutādapi devadattādeḥ vyāvartate, ato na heturiti cet? nanvacaitanyamapyasyaivaṃ rūpameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4937: na hi bandhyāsutaścetanādiva devadattāderacetanādapi kāṣṭhāderna vyāvartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4939: vaktṛtvaṃ vastvekaniyato dharmaḥ sa kathamavastuni sādhyo virodhāditi cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4940: sa punarayaṃ virodhaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ, kiṃ vaktṛtvaviviktasyāvastuno niyamenopalambhāt, āhosvit vastuviviktasya vaktṛtvasyānupālambhāditi? na tāvadavastu kenacit pramāṇenopalambhagocaraḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4943: na hyavaktṛtvamapi vastuviviktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4946: nanu vaktṛtvaṃ vacanaṃ prati kartṛtvam, tat kathamavastuni, tasya sāmārthyavirahalakṣaṇatvāditi cet? athāvaktṛtvamapi kathaṃ tatra, tasya vacanetarakartṛtvalakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4947: sarvasāmarthyavirahe vacanasāmarthyaviraho na viruddha iti cet? atha sarvasāmarthyaviraho bandhyāsutasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4948: avastutvādeveti cet? nanvetadapi katham? sarvasāmarthyavirahādeveti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4949: soyaṃ kevalairvacanairitastato nirdhanādhamarṇika iva sādhūn bhrāmayan parasparāśrayadoṣamapi na paśyati //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4952: cāvastusādhanasya? kutastamāṃ cāvaktṛtvādisādhanānām? tataśca pramāṇameva sīmā vyavahāraniyamasya, tadatikrame tvaniyama evetyanenābhiprāyeṇedamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4955: yasmin kiñcinniṣidhyate pramāṇena, tasmin kiñcid vidhīra'pīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4957: tatra praṣṭurūttare vaktavye na viruddhamanarthakaṃ vā vaktumucitamityāśayavānāha---kasatarhīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4961: na hyapratīte devadattādau sa kiṃ gaurakṛṣṇo veti vaiyātyaṃ vinā praśnaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4962: tatrāpi yadyeko 'pratītaparamārthaviṣaya evottaraṃ dadāti na gaura iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4963: aparo 'pi kiṃ na dadyād gaura iti? na caivaṃ sati kācidarthasiddhiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4966: nanvapratīte vyahārābhāva iti yuktam, kūrmaromādayastu pratīyanta eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4968: na ca pramāṇāspadameva vyavahārāspadamityasti niyama ityata āha---na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4970: yadyapi sarvathāpratīte vyavahārābhāva iti vadato bauddhasyāpi svavacanavirodha eva, tathāpyayaṃ virodhaḥ prāgevodbhāvitaprāya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4972: tathā hi śaśaviṣāṇamiti jñānamanyathākhyātiḥ syādasatkhyātirvā? na tāvadādyaste rocate, tathā sati kiñcidāropyaṃ kiñcidāropaviṣaya iti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4978: sa hi saḍketo vā syāt, śabdasvābhāvyaṃ vā? na tāvadādyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4982: tathā cānanvitāḥ padārthā evānvitatayā parisphurantīti viparītakhyātirevāvartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4985: vāsanāviśeṣāditi cet? athāsadullekhinaḥ pratyayasya vāsanaiva kāraṇamuta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4987: kadācid vāsanāyāḥ, prabodhāt kadāciditi cet---na, prabodho 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4988: sahakāryantaraṃ vā, atiśayaparamparāparipāko vā? ādye vāsanaiveti pakṣānupapatti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4990: svasantatimātrādhīnatve tu bāhyavādavyāghātaḥ, nīlādibuddhīnāmapi vāsanāparipākādeva utpādāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4992: sa vicāryamāṇaḥ pūrvaṃ nyāyaṃ nātivartata iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4995: na cārthakriyāviśeṣo 'pyasti yato viṣayaviśeṣamunnīya tatra saḍketo gṛhyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4998: na ca śaśaviṣāṇaśabdamuccārayataḥ kaścidabhiprāyo vṛttaḥ, tadviṣayo 'sya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4999: vācya iti sugrahaḥ samaya iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5002: na ca viśeṣāntaravinākṛtaḥ kalpanāmātraviṣayo 'sya vācya iti sāmpratam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5004: na ca sarve pratipattāraḥ svavāsanayā asadarthaśabdasambandhapratipattibhāja iti sāmpratam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5006: na hi svayaṅkṛtaṃ saḍketamagrāhayitvā paro vyavahārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5008: na ca gāṃ badhānetivat śaśaviṣāṇāpadārthe vṛddhavyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5010: na ca yathā gaustathā gavaya iti vadupalakṣaṇātideśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5011: na ceha prabhinnakamalodare madhūni madhukaraḥ pibatītivat prasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5015: tathā hi ko 'yaṃ vyatireko nāma? yadyato vyatiricyate tasya tatrābhāvo vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5016: tadabhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ vā? tatra na tāvat kramayaugapadyayoḥ śaśaviṣāṇe 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇagocaraḥ, vṛkṣarahitabhūbhṛtkaṭakavat kramayaugapadyarahitasya śaśaviṣāṇasya pramāṇāviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5017: nāpi kramayaugapadyābhāvarūpatvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya prāmāṇikam, ghaṭābhāvavat śaśaviṣāṇasya pramāṇeṇa anupalambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5018: ghaṭābhāvo 'pi na pramāṇagocara iti cet--na, tasya tadviviktetarasvabhāvasyāpi pramāṇata eva siddheḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5021: etāvataiva tadabhāvo 'pi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5023: na cānyasya svabhāve pramāṇagocare tadanyo 'pi siddhaḥ syāt, atiprasaḍgāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5024: evaṃbhūtāveva ghaṭatadabhāvau yadekasya paricchittirevāparasya vyavasthitiriti cet---na, ghaṭavad ghaṭābhāvasyāpi prāmāṇikatvānabhyupagame svabhāvavādānabhyupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5026: na tu svabhāvavādālambanenaiva vastuparicchittiriti hi bhavatāmeva tatra tatra jayadundubhiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5029: vastusvabhāvairiti vācayamitthaṃ tadottaraṃ syād vijayī samastaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5030: tat kimidānīṃ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvo ghaṭaḥ pramāṇānaiva siddhaḥ? tava dṛṣṭyā evametat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5031: ghaṭo hi yādṛktādṛksvabhāvastāvat pramāṇapathamavatīrṇaḥ tasya yadi paramārthataḥ abhāvo 'pi kaścit syāt, paramārthataḥ so 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5035: aprāmāṇikatve vā anayorapi na tathābhāva iti śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīyameva gatiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5037: dahanavattvādisādhane prameyatvādau śabdānityatvādisādhane cākṣuṣatvādau nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvādāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5039: tatra ye kalpanopanītāḥ, tatra kālpanikā eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5043: tathāpi prāmāṇikāt jalahnadādeḥ prāmāṇikyevaiṣitavyā, sā ca na siddheti kutastasya hetutvam? evaṃ prāmāṇikāt śabde 'pi pakṣīkṛte prāmāṇika eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5045: vaktavyaḥ na cāsau cākṣuṣatvasyāstīti so 'pi kathaṃ hetuḥ? evaṃ kṛtakatvasyāpi vastvekaniyatasya dharmasya vāstava evānvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5046: vastuno vipakṣācca vāstava eva vyatireko vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5050: na hi niyāmakamantareṇa saṃpadaṃ prati kalpanā tvarate, vipadaṃ prati tu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5052: tathā ca niragnikamapi kūrmaroma sadhūmamiti kalpanāmātreṇa vipakṣavṛttitvād dhūmo nāgni gamayet
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5053: vāstavyāṃ rūpasaṃpattau kimamena kālpanikadoṣeṇeti cet? tarhi vāstavyāmasaṃpattau kiṃ kālpanikyā tayeti samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5054: virodhāvirodhau viśeṣa iti cet? kuta etat? ubhayorekatra vastvavastutvādanyatrāvastuvaditi cet? tat kiṃ kālpaniko 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5055: dhūmo vastubhūto yena kūrmaromṇastena saha virodhaḥ syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5056: kvacid vastubhūta iti cet? nirdhūmatvamapi kvacid vastubhūtamiti tenāpi virodha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5057: tasmād yathā kālpanikī vipattirna doṣāya, tathā kālpanikī saṃpattirapi na guṇāyeti tasyāśca sarvatra sulabhatvāditi ṭīkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5058: etaccābhyupetyoktam---vastutastu na na nirūpākhyaṃ kasyacid vyavahārasya bhājanamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5059: nanu yadyāvayorakuśalatayā svavacanavirodhaḥ, atha praṣṭuḥ kimuttaraṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5061: yatra vacane sarvathaiva virodhasatatrāvacanameva śreya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5063: nanvekarūpamavikalamidaṃ kathaṃ gamakam? gamakatve vā vyatirekavikalavad
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5064: rūpāntaravikalamapi tathā kiṃ na syādaviśeṣādityāśaḍkyāha---na caitāvateti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5066: evaṃ tarhi satyapi vipakṣe vyatireko na paryeṣaṇīya ityata āha---vipakṣasambhave tviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5067: vipakṣe sati tatra vṛttiśaḍkā, tatastannivṛttyarthaṃ tadupayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5068: vipakṣābhāve tu śaḍkaiva nāsti, yathoktaṃ prāk /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5069: na hi tāyābhyavaharaṇe 'pyasamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5072: asya tu kālpaniko 'pi vipakṣaḥ pareṇābhidhātuṃ na śakyate, abhidhāne sapakṣatvāpatteḥ asapakṣatve 'nabhidhānaprasaḍgāt, tataścābhidheyatve sādhye yaḥ kaściddheturūpādīyate, tasya kiṃ vipakṣe vṛttiravṛttirveti praśne anenottarakovidena kiṃ vaktavyam? mūkībhūya tiṣṭhāsostu na kaścit pratimalla iti svayamevollapitamanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5073: na tvevaṃbhūto 'hetureva doṣābhāvāt, arūcimātrasya sarvatra sulabhatvāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5077: tadidam uktaṃ ṭīkākṛtā---asti gandhavatvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5078: nanu sādhyasajātīye śeṣaśabdasya na kācid vṛttirityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5085: yogyadarśananivṛttyā ca dṛśyanivṛttirvivakṣitā, tena vipakṣe asadityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5089: vyākhyāte, atha kiṃ liṅkam, katividhaṃ veti jijñāsāyāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5090: trividhamityavacchedena vyākhyāya, kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti jijñāsāyāṃ pūrvavadityādyekavākyatayā vyākhyānena parāmarśaviṣayaḥ saṃjñito vibhakto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5101: tathāvidhavṛṣṭyā bhaviṣyannadīpūrādijñānam, prakārāntarāvagatena vāyunā tvarāvatā vṛkṣādisaṃkṣobhānumānamityādi neyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5106: śeṣavallakṣaṇayoge 'pi tadudāharaṇāntaravailakṣaṇyenedameva sāmānyatodṛṣṭapadārthe bhaviṣyatītyata āhā---na caitāvateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5107: na tāvadaśvakarṇādiśabdavadayaṃ sūryavrajyānumāne vartate, anyatrāpi vṛddhaprayogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5112: kṣayavṛddhipratyayāviṣayatve satīti spaṣṭārtham, prāḍmukhopalabhyatve parivṛttya tatpratyayaviṣayatvāditi paryālocanayaivāvināśasya prāptatvāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5114: prāḍmukhopalabhyatve cetyasya ṭīkayā sphoritasya prāḍmukhopalabdhasya prāḍmukhenānupalambhe satītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5116: anyathā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyāpi lokāntaravartipuruṣāpekṣayā prāḍmukhopalabhyatā durvāretyasiddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5119: na hi yathātathā pādavihāraṇamātramasya hetoḥ kṣatimāvahatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5120: satyavināśe iti ca draṣṭavyam sati draṣṭavyatva iti veti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5121: iha yadyapi diśaḥ pratyakṣatve sādhye 'ḍgulyā nirdeśo vyadhikaraṇaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5124: tathāpi yasyāṃ diśi ete taravaḥ sā prācīti tarvādibhedena apyaḍgulyā vyapadeśo 'stīti na vyadhikaraṇatvamāhatyābhidhātuṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5127: aḍagulīnirdeśasyācākṣuṣe vāyāvapi gatatvena vyabhicārasya api saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5128: rūpeṇa sparśānumānamityādāvādigrahaṇena rasena rūpānumānam, gandhena rasānumānamityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5129: vṛkṣādarśane sandehe vā na śiśapādarśana niścayo vā tato 'navasaraparāhatamevānumānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5137: tathā sati śiśapātvādayaṃ vṛkṣo vyavahartavyaḥ iti śiśapātvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamākalayet
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5143: tadanena ye cānye sādhyasamānakālāḥ, te sarve sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānasaṃgrāhyatvena upalakṣitā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5144: svamatena vyākhyānāntaram, na tu tātparyāntaramityarthaḥ, pūrvaṃ sādhyaṃ tadyasya vyāptyetyanenaikatātparyatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5147: sāmānyena kāryaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā anubhayātmakaṃ vā avinābhāvitayā dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭameva ca yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5152: yadyapi pratipannaṃ pratyanumānasya na saṃśayaviparyayanivṛttirajñātajñānaṃ vopayogaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5155: tenādivākye pratipannaḥ pratipādayiteti pratipanna eva pratipādayitā, na tu pratipannaḥ pratipādayitaiveti boddhavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5164: na hi saṃtatamūrdhvagamanamātreṇāgniranumātuṃ śakyate, dhūlīpaṭalādau vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5165: ekadravyatvādityasya sapakṣe rūpādāvanvayasya spaṣṭatvāt vipakṣavyatireka evoktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5169: kāryatvaṃ punarasyānupalabdhikāraṇabhāve sati anupalabdhasyopalabhyamānatvād vā pratyakṣād veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5171: prayogastvevam---avyāpyavṛttiḥ śabdaḥ, āśrayāprāptāvapi kvacidanupalabhyamānatve sati kvacidupalabhyamānatvāt saṃyogavaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5172: yadyapi caitāvanmātreṇa guṇatvaṃ sidhyati, tathāpi bhāṣyakārīyo heturūpekṣitaḥ syādityato 'vyāpakatāmātraṃ prasādhyaiva prakṛte lagayati---karṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5173: atrāpi prayogaḥ, śabdo vīcītaraṅganyāyena karṇaśaṣkulīmantamākāśadeśamāsādayati, prakārāntarāsaṃbhave satyupalabhyamānatvāditi vyatirekī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5179: sa evābhiprāyeṇa vyāpyate, yena vinā pratijñātor'tho nopapadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5183: tathā hi kṣityādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityatra sarvajñatvamantareṇa kṣityādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva nopapadyate, paramāṇvadṛṣṭādīnāmajñāne tadadhiṣṭhānānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5188: na hīcchādīnāṃ kṣityādipāratantryamasaṃbhāvit, api tu mānasapratyakṣavedyatvādibhaḥ bādhitam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5190: tasmādubhayathāpi saṃbhavādātmā naivābhiprāyavyāptaḥ, tadavyāptatvācca na pakṣadharmatā tamaṅkamāropayitumarhati, api tvicchāsaṃbaddhaparamātramādāyaiva nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5191: etaduttarakālaṃ kṣityādau bādhite tadanyāsiddhau vidhāyakapramāṇābhāvānniṣedhamukhena vyatirekī pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5192: tamimaṃ viśeṣaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatva iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5193: nanu sāmānyatodṛṣṭād yadrūpaṃ siddham, na tat kevalavyatirekiṇā sādhyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5194: yādṛśaṃ ca tena sādhyam, tādṛśaṃ na kvacit siddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5200: na hi vākyārthasayāpūrvatayā padārthānāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vihanyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5202: na ca dravyāṣṭakātiriktādipadārthā evāpūrve, yenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatā syāt pakṣasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5203: na caivaṃ sati śaśaśṛṅgadhanurdharādāvapi prasaṅgaḥ, tatrāpi tadārthamātrāprasiddheḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāditi vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5213: athavā pratyekotthitaḥ saṃśayaḥ samudāye viśrāmyatīti nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5214: tathā hi guṇatvaṃ pṛthivyāśrite gandhādau, tadatiriktāśrite snehādau ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5216: tat kimicchādayaḥ pṛthivyāśritā, uta tadatiriktāśritā ityanenākāreṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5217: sarvadravyeṣu bhavan sandehaḥ samānadharmadarśanādeva dravyāṣṭakatadatiriktakoṭyoreva paryavasito bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5221: tadiha vartamānāvartamānārthatvavyākhyānaṃ tadviruddhamapi kuta upādīya ityata āha---pratyakṣaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5222: atha tathaiva kiṃ na syādityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5226: nyāyābhāvena hi tarkasya niścayāparyāptau sandehastadavastha ityāśaḍkitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5228: astyeva nyāyaḥ, sandehavirodhiniścayasamartho yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5230: athopādānatvam, na tatsādhye samavāya ityata āha---nimittatvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5237: deśasyāvacchedakatāmātreṇa saptamyā nirdeśo vane sihanāda itivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5238: tathāpyasiddhaṃ lakṣaṇam, na hyātmādayaḥ sarvatropalabhyante ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5240: tathāpi viṣayasyāpyupalabdhikāraṇatvād yatra yatra ghaṭādiparamāṇvantāḥ svopalabdhisāmagrīsahitāḥ, tatra tatropalabhyanta eveti taireva vyabhicāra ityata uktam---antareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5242: anyathā yatra ghaṭādayo na santi, tatra tato 'nyasya tadupalabdhikāraṇasya tadindriyasaṃyogasyābhāvādeva teṣāmanupalambhaḥ, tatsadbhāve tu sarvatropalambha eva ityetadapyāśaḍkyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5246: yadyapi ca sarvatrāstitvaṃ vyāpakatvam, tathāpi lakṣaṇamantareṇa tad
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5249: kartrā avyāpāryamāṇasya karaṇasya svayaṃ vyāpārāyogādityāśayavāniti bhāvaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5251: yāvatā svatantra evāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ kiṃ na syāt? na hi kāryasyānādhāratvamasyeṣṭamevetyata āha---syādetaditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5253: na hyutpanno 'pyasaṃyukta eva turyā prathamekṣaṇe paṭa iti kasyacinniścayaḥ, atha ca pramāṇabalādiṣṭa evāyamarthaḥ, tathotpanne 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5254: prathame kṣaṇe tantuṣvasamaveta eveṣyata iti pādau prasārya tiṣṭhato nedamuttaramityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5258: anavasthābhiyā avaśyamantataḥ kācit prāptiśca na ca vṛttimatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5262: janite bīje vartamānaṃ bījatvaṃ tasyāḍkurapūrvakatāmavagamayatīti yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5264: idaṃprathamatāyāṃ tu kāryotpādānuguṇasamaye bhaviṣyatpravāhasyāsattvāt prathamasyānutpāde tadāśrayasya hetostasminnasatyāśrayāsiddhatayā sarvasyāgamakatve pramāṇābhāva ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5266: kāryamakṛtakasaṃbandhavaditi pratijñāyāṃ ghaṭāderbhūtalādināpyakṛtaka eva saṃbandhaḥ syāt, sa cāniṣṭa iti pratijñāṃ viśinaṣṭi---svopādāneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5268: kāryamiti ca samavetamātropalakṣaṇaparam, anyathā jātyādiṣu vipakṣeṣu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5270: athavā pratijñā yathāśrutaiva, ādhāravattvādityatrādhāraśabdena nāśrayamātraṃ vivakṣitam, kiṃ tvadhikaraṇaṃ kārakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5278: sannapyasau na kāryamādhāravat karoti, svasamavāyenaiva tasyādhāravattvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5284: nanu vidhīyamānaniṣidhyamānavyatirekeṇa jagati na svatantro nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5288: tatra ye vartamānāḥ, teṣāṃ kaścit paratantro vṛttimānityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5290: pratiṣidhyamānāstu paratantrā na santi, asattvādeva iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5291: tadevaṃ vidhīyamānaḥ svatantro vidhīyamānaḥ paratantraḥ pratiṣidhyamānaḥ svatantraśceti tisro vidhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5292: tadevamavartamāno gharmaḥ pratiṣidhyamānatayaiva vyavahriyate, na cāsau pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ, kiṃ tvanumānaviṣaya iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5295: tenāyamarthaḥ, asannavartamāno na kevalaṃ pratiṣedhavyavahāraviṣayaḥ, kiṃ tu vidhīyamāno 'pi, vidhivyavahāraviṣayo 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5302: asattayā sattayā vānabhyupagamāditi sattāyā jāyamānatayā virodhāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5304: kathaṃ nābhyupagamyate na hi sattāsattābhyāmanyaḥ prakāro 'stītyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5306: vidhīyamānatāpakṣe hi jāyamānatābhyupagame ubhayathāpi virodho, na tu pratiṣidhyamānatāpakṣe 'pītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5307: tasmāt jāyamāne ghaṭe na vidhāyakapratyakṣapravṛttiḥ, virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5308: niṣedhakaṃ taṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartamānamapi tanniṣedhameva gocarayet, na tu niṣedhyaṃ ghaṭam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5317: nanu tathāpyubhayorapi pṛthivīdravyaśabdayorūbhayavācitvāt kathaṃ viśeṣapratipattirityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5319: pṛthivītvaṃ dravyam, dravyatvaṃ ca pṛthivītyapi na bhavatītyapi draṣṭavyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5327: nanu aniyataprasareṇāsati nāstīti sahiteneṣṭalābho yadyapi tathāpi sarvathā sapakṣāvṛttirasādhāraṇo 'pi nivartayitavyaḥ, na hi pakṣavyāpako
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5328: vipakṣe ca nāstyevaitāvataiva tasya nirākaraṇam, tasyāpyevaṃbhūtatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5332: na cāsaṃbhavo 'pi prasakto, yenāniṣedhāt tasyāpyupādāne tadviparītahānaṃ saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5333: prathame pade saṃbhavasya vidheyatvena ivāsaṃbhavasya niṣedhyatvenānupādānāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5337: uditaṃ hyanūdyate, natvanuditam na cobhayatvaviśiṣṭaṃ havirūditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5340: ubhayatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu nāyamanuvādaḥ, kiṃ tu vāda eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5347: viśeṣaṇam, vivakṣite tasminnanenaiva vākyena viśiṣṭo vādaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5350: nanu yadyanūdyamānamaśakyaṃ viśeṣṭum, athārtirapi kathaṃ haviṣā viśeṣyata ityata āha---atra hi yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5352: ubhayatvasya tu na pūrvaprāptatvam, nāpi tadantareṇārtiraśakyapratipattiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5359: tenedaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati, ekamanekaṃ vā haviryasyārtimārcchedityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5360: ubhayatvavivakṣāpakṣe tu naikaikahavirārtau prāyaścittavidhiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5362: na cānumeye sadbhāva eva, tattulya eva sadbhāva iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5368: atra naiyāyikasamādhānamāśaḍkya bauddhaḥ svabhāṣayā nirākaroti---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5369: yadyapi tattulya evetyanyayogavyavacchedasya vipakṣamātraviṣayatvaṃ tadā syād yadi viṣayāntarasaṃkocaḥ syāt, sa ca tadekavākyatayeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5371: anyathobhayorapi tattulyānyatvāviśeṣe vipakṣayogasya vyavacchedo na tvanumeyayogasyeti kutaḥ? vihitatvāt tasyeti cet? ata eva virodhādekavākyatvāsaṅgatirityucyate, yasmāt tadekavākyatāyāmeva satyāṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5374: tathāpi bauddhanaye śābddhaṃ vyavahāramāśritya samuccaya eva na nirvahet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5381: nanu sādhyate 'neneti sādhanamityevāstu, saṃbhavati cāyamartho jñānasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5388: nityasyānekāśrayatve jātitvaprasaḍgāt ekāśrayatve tasya nāśe anāśrayasyāvasthānānupapatteḥ nityatve pramāṇābhāvaprasaḍgācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5391: idaṃ tu na tatheti kathaṃ nityamiti jñātavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5394: anityeṣu ca sadṛśavyavahārahānaprasaḍgāt, anityasya tvanekāśrayatve guṇavato dravyatvaprasaḍgāt ; nirguṇatve guṇatvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5397: guṇeṣu ca karmasu ca sādṛśyavyavahāro na syāt, teṣāṃ samavāyikāraṇatvābhāvenānityadharmāyogāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5404: tathāpi karaṇavyutpattyā sādhanapadavyākhyānasya parityāge na kācidupapattirdarśitā, prajñāpanapadasyāpi karaṇavyutpattisaṃbhavādata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5406: pratyakṣāt sādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti vadan sādṛśyasyaiva prajñāyamānasya kāraṇatvamabhipraiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5407: tathā ca tena saha sādhyasādhanapadasya vyadhikaraṇatvādanyasya ca karaṇasyābhāvāt sādhyasādhanapadamanarthakamāpadyeta, yadi bhāvasādhanaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5408: na ca tajjñānamevāstu karaṇamiti vācyam, avāntaravyāpāravirahiṇaḥ karaṇatvāyogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5411: pramāṇānuvṛttyā tannivṛttirityapi na vācyam, vṛttaireva padaiḥ samīhitasiddhāvanuvṛtteranavakāśāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5413: tathāpi prajñānaṃ prasiddhipadārthona tu prajñāpanamityata āha---ityetadarthe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5415: jñāyamānasya sādṛśyasya karaṇatvamāviṣkartuṃ tasyānyatra acaritārthaḥ phalānuguṇo vyāpāro darśita iti tātparyār'thaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5418: lakṣyapadaṃ hi lakṣaṇavyavasthāpakaṃ na bhavati parasparāśrayatvamagatirveti doṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5420: nanvevaṃ sati prathamaivāstu, na ceyamaśokavanikā, tasyāḥ prathamatvādeva prathamaṃ buddhāvupanipātāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5424: satyamevaitat, kintu phalābhāvenaiva hetunopamānasya prāmāṇyamapanīyate pareṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5425: tasmāt tadavabodhāya niṣkṛṣya phalamasya darśanīyamiti tathaiva sūcitavān
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5428: karmadhārayasamāso 'pi na nirasta iti draṣṭavyam, aviruddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5429: prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasyeti bahuvrīhāvapi karmadhārayārthasya praviṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5430: evaṃ prasiddhena sādharmyamityatra tṛtīyātatpuruṣasya praveśād virodhāntaramāśaḍkyāha---bhāṣyakāreṇa hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5437: atropamānasya phale vipratipadyamānān prati sāśaḍkaṃ jarannaiyāyikajayanta prabhṛtīnāṃ parihāramāha--yadyapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5439: mānāntaraṃ śabdo vā śabdārtho vā liṅgabhūtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5441: śabdādavagatena gosādṛśyena pratipādyamānaḥ piṇḍa samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyamavaganatumiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5442: śabdapakṣe, tu gosādṛśyenopalakṣito viśiṣṭaḥ śabdādavagamyamānaḥ piṇḍaḥ samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyo 'vagantum, guṇakarmādivat sādṛśyasyāpi samānasamānajītīyavyavacchedakatvāditi sugamam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5444: atha gosadṛśa eva ka ityāśaḍkānivartanāsāmarthyamateḥ pariplavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5447: tarhi viśiṣṭaiva pratipattirvākyādastu ityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5450: sa hi pramāṇasamāhāro vā syāt, phalasamāhāro vā? ādye 'pi pramāṇatve sati samāhāraḥ, samāhṛtayorvā prāmāṇyamiti? na tāvat prathamaḥ, phalānekatve sati samāhārānupapatteḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5455: tat kiṃ tatphalasya tatpramāṇabahirbhāva eva, antarbhāve vā kiyatī sīmā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5457: asti tarhi sādṛśyādijñānakāle 'pi vistāritasya cakṣuṣo vyāpāraḥ? na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5462: pūrve hi yathā gaustathetyeva vākyaṃ gavayapadenāpratītasamayenāpi prayogamātropayoginā sahitaṃ saṃbandhapratipattihetuḥ, pratisaṃbandhinastu śabdād vopalakṣaṇād vopasthāpanamityāhuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5464: avācakaprayogasya vākyānaṅgatayeti tadvirahiṇaśca saṃbandhyupalakṣaṇaparyavasānāditi manyamānā etadeva prayogamāropya darśayanti---yo hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5466: yadi hi saṃbandho viditaḥ, kaḥ pariplavārthaḥ? atha na vidita iti tatrākāḍkṣānuvṛtterevamucyata iti cet--tadapyayuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5467: na hi viśeṣaniṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ, tathā satyaśakyagrahatvāt, api tu kiñcit
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5469: tadeva nimittaṃ nāvagatamiti cet? avagatireva tarhi saṃndhasya saṃbandhino
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5470: 'navagamāditi kiṃ pariplutaṃ pramātuḥ? na caiṣa paramārthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5472: anyathā piṇḍopakṣepe 'pi nimittānupakṣepe manodharmādiśabdānāṃ jātiśabdatvaṃ na syāt, avācakatvameva vā syāt, tajjātīyānāṃ nityaparokṣatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5479: tatra prathamadvitīyayorasaṃbhāvitatvādiha viditavṛttāntatayā tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ nirasya pañcamaścaturthamupayātīti caturthaṃ vyavasthāpayati---na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5481: aviditagavayaśabdavṛttāntasya tu yad bhaviṣyati, tadanantarameva vakṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5484: tataśca tathābhūta eva piṇḍe saṃbandho grāhyo,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5487: na ca gosādṛśyenopalakṣyata iti upalakṣaṇamanumāpanam, smāraṇaṃ vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5491: yaduta gavayaśabdo vā gavayatvaṃ gamayet, yathā gauḥ tathā gavaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5494: nanu sādṛśyameva jātibhedamanantarbhāvya pratyetuṃ na śakyam, tasya bhinnapradhānasāmānyavyaktiguṇāvayavakarmasāmānyabāhulyarūpatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5501: naitadapi sādhīyaḥ, darpaṇa iva candraḥ, candra iva mukham
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5502: mukhamivāravindam, ado 'ravindamivedamaravindamiti caturdhā sādṛśyagatau bhinnapradhānasāmānyaniyamāyogena tadanantarbhāvyaiva sādṛśyapratipattyupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5503: kvacid dṛṣṭamiha smaryeta tāvaditi cet? smaryatāṃ tāvadatrāvagatam, na tviha tadavagatamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5504: tasmād gosāmānyenopalakṣyamāṇaḥ piṇḍaḥ kiṃ tadvāneva gavayaśabdasya vācyo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5505: bhavatu? pacikriyayopalakṣyamāṇaḥ karteva pācakaśabdasya, āhosvit taṭasthameva gosādṛśyam, tadupalakṣita eva piṇḍa ākāśavat tasya vācyo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5506: bhavet? kiṃ vopalakṣaṇaṃ vihāya gandhāpalakṣitapṛthivītvajātimāniva gosādṛśyopalakṣitajātiviśeṣavāneva piṇḍo 'sya vācyo bhaviṣyatītaraniyatakoṭisaṃśayatiraskāreṇa koṭitrayāvalambī sandeha eva jarannaiyāyikairūpaplutaḥ saṃbandhapariccheda ityucyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5507: etāsvavaśyamanyatamā koṭirgavayapadārtho bhaviṣyatīti nirdhāraṇasaṃbhāvanāṃ hṛdi nidhāya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5513: yadyapi gavayatvāvagame 'pi saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhānavagame tatra prayujyamānatvāditi heturasiddha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5514: na hyasati vṛttyantare tadviṣayatayā prayogaḥ saṅgatimavijñāya jñātuṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5515: śakayate, prāgeva pramāṇāntarāt tadavagame tu kimanumānena sādhanīyam? ata eva pratyakṣe 'pi gavaye anumānamanavakāśameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5516: tathāpi saṃbandhyavagame gavayapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ vākyameva saṃbandhaṃ bodhayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5517: avācakasyāpi ca samabhivyāhāra upayokṣyate upamānapakṣa iva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5518: tadapi hyatideśavākyaṃ vākyameveti matvā tannirāsārthaṃ saṃbandhina evāpratipattirūpapāditā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5520: ata eva vākyasya vyāptiparatāpi nirākṛtā, saṃbandhino 'navagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5523: yadyapi vinigamanāyāṃ hetvabhāve 'pi nopamānasya kācit kṣatiḥ, ubhayorapi vācyatve saṃbandhasya tadānīmavadhāraṇāt, tathāpi vastugati vivecayati---tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5528: sa ca prasiddho dharmaḥ samānaḥ pratiyogitayā tadupakṣipto 'samānaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5531: jaranmīmāṃsakamataṃ gosādṛśyaṃ gavayasthaṃ pratyakṣameveti vadatā nirastam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5541: iha śabde trividhā vipratipattiḥ---prāmāṇyato, bhedato, lakṣaṇataśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5549: tatra vipratipadyamānaṃ prati tu parīkṣāvatāra ityāśayavān siddhavat saṅgatibhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāya lakṣaṇamavatārayati---atheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5550: tatra samayabalena samyakparokṣānubhavasādhanaṃ śabda iti eke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5551: iha cādyena padenānumānam, dvitīyena śabdābhāsaḥ, tṛtīyena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5552: savikalpakapratyakṣam, caturthena padārthasmaraṇam, pañcamena kartṛkarmaṇī nirasyete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5553: apare tu ceṣṭāyāmapi gatametadityativyāpakaṃ mattvā śabdatvasamavāye satītyāhuḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5555: yadi ceṣṭā na prāmāṇam, aprasaṅga eva tasyāḥ, kiṃ śabdatvasamavāye satītyanena nirvartanīyam? pramāṇaṃ cet tasyāḥ pratyakṣādyanantarbhāve pañcamapramāṇābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5556: tasmāt śabda eva ceṣṭāyāḥ praveśaḥ samayabalapravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5557: śabda eva tu śabdavyavahāro laukikaḥ prāyikatvāt, cākṣuṣe jñānadarśanavyavahāravaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5561: arthena ca smṛtyutpādanāt śabdaviṣayam evāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam, pramāṇaphalasya pramāṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5565: nanvevaṃ sati ceṣṭayā eḍamūkavyavahārānupapattiḥ, na hyasau tataḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5566: śabdasmṛtimān, agṛhītasamayatvāditi cet? ---ata eva taṃ prati samayabalena śabdavadarthe 'pi ceṣṭāyāḥ kuṇṭhatvameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5569: atha kṛtasamayāpi ceṣṭaiva kiṃ na syāt, avinābhāvābhāvāt? smārayatu vā padārthān, tathāpi na pramāṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5570: dvividhā hi sā samayapramārabhedāt---kṛtyanvayinī, jñaptyanvayinī ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5571: tatra kṛtyanvayinī prayojakābhiprāyaṃ smārayantī pravartayati, na tu kiñcit pramāṇayati śaḍkhadhvanivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5573: jñaptyanvayinī tu kārakeṣu pratipadikārthapradhānā, kriyāsu vartamānārthapradhānā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5574: tathā ca gauraśvaḥ puruṣa ityādipadairiva svatantreṣu padārtheṣu smāriteṣu parasparānvayayogaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5575: padaikadeśavibhaktiviśeṣavat ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣāt prakaraṇādiviśeṣād vā kārakādismṛtiniyama iti cet---ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5577: prakaraṇādayastu viṣayaviśeṣe śabdān niyamayanti, na tu kārakakālaviśeṣeṣu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5579: tathātve vā gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyādāvapi karmatvādīnyunnīya vivakṣitārthāvasāyaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5581: kārakaviśeṣādīnākṣeptumalam, na tu padakadambka ityasti niyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5583: kathaṃ tarhi tato vyavahāraviśeṣāḥ? saṃśayapratibhayoranyatarasmād viśeṣānupalambhe vidūravartini samānadharmiṇi sthāṇvarthina iveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5585: ataḥ kasya caturṣu praveśāpraveśau cintanīyau? etacca saṃbhāvitaprāmāṇyam aitihyādyantarbhāvayatā ceṣṭāpabhraṃśalipidhvanipadaikadeśān sāvyavahārikānapyakīrtayatā sūtrakṛtā sūcitamapi mandamatayo na gṛhṇantīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5591: kiṃ tu tatrāpi vākyameva pradhānam, asādhāraṇatvādindriyādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5594: tadanena nirākāḍkṣāyogyānāsannāni padāni nirasyātā ceṣṭādayo 'pi nirastā bhavantīti vijātīyavyudāsaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5599: nanu nāyamupadeśaśabdasyārtho yathāśruti cāvyāpakatā siddhārthāsaṃgrahādivadityata āha---yadyapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5600: na kevalaṃ bhūtārthāsaṃgrahaḥ sādhyārthamapi na kiñcit
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5603: yenānayorūpadeśapadenāsaṃgraha ityatastābhyāṃ vidhervaidharmyaṃ pratipādya tayorapi tato vaidharmyamuktam---te hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5606: yadyapi lakṣaṇayā te api saṃgrahītuṃ śakyete parasthāne prayoktṛpadaṃ prakṣipya, tathāpi nāstyasmākaṃ tadasaṃgrahe 'pi kācit prayojanakṣatiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5607: svargāpavargopāyaviṣayasya śabdaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇārambhāt śāstrasya tadadhikāreṇa pravṛtteḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5608: sāmānyalakṣaṇe tvakṛte viśeṣalakṣaṇānavatāra ityataḥ prathamaṃ tathaiva vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5610: parapadamapahāya prayojanavānityeva vākyārthapratipattiḥ phalamiti ca lākṣaṇikapadaprayogasya cāyamevopayogo yadubhayalakṣaṇalābhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5615: nanu yadi upaniṣadaḥ prayojanavatyaḥ, nūnaṃ kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayantyaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5617: na cet paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ kathaṃ paraprayojanavattyaḥ pravṛttivirahāḍkitatvāt prayojanābhāvasyetyata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5626: tathā ca sthānakaraṇādīnāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanipatti prati sāmarthyāvagamāt, tadadhiṣṭhānaśūnyatayā tasya nāgamakartṛtvaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5631: na vayamasya bhagavataḥ kāryaviśeṣeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvatayopakaraṇaṃ śarīraṃ nirākurmaḥ, tryaṇukādiniṣpattaye dvyaṇukādivaccharīrānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyikāryaniṣpattaye tadupagrahasyāpīṣyamāṇatvāt api tvāyatanatayā kartṛtvanirvāhakatayā vyāpakatayā ca tat tasya neṣyate bhogābhāvāt, kartṛtvasya nityatvāt, kāryasya kartrā nirūpādhisaṃbandhāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5633: tadevaṃ rūpa āptaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt niścetavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5635: anyathāpi saṃbhavādityāśaḍkya mlecchā api hītyādinā bhāṣyatātparyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ tanniścayopāyamapi leśato darśayati---hetudarśanaśūnyā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5638: tatra pūrvasya tāvat sattvaprasādhakādeva pramāṇād rāgadveṣamohavirahasiddhāvanāptatvaṃ nirastam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5639: uttarasyāpi jñānecchāprayatnasthānakaraṇapāṭavāni tāvadupadeśamātreṇaiva niścīyanta iti tatra sarveṣāmavivāda eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5641: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vipralipsā vā syāditi sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5643: tajjñānasya yathārthatvaniścayaḥ, yathābhyāsadaśāpannamidamaraṇyamamīṣāṃ mlecchānāmataḥ asminnete mārgāmārgavibhāgajñā iti pānthānāmevaṃ niścayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5644: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5645: sa ca dvirūpaḥ, svopakāraḥ paropakāro vā? tatra tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mlecchādīnāṃ na kaścit svopakāraḥ, svasya gṛhītatvāt śarīramātrasya ca karaṇīyāntarābhāvāt, bhāve vā aparityāgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5647: nāpi parāpakāramātraṃ puruṣārthaḥ tathā sati sarvaḥ sarvamapakuryādityevaṃ vipralipsāpi nivāryate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5648: anabhyāsadaśāpannaviṣaye tu pravṛttisāmarthyāt pramāṇāntarasaṃvādād vā mohavipralipsayornivṛttiriti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5649: mlecchā apyāptā bhavanti yataḥ pratītigocarāḥ, tataḥ kaḥ sandeho
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5650: mahādhiyām āryāṇāṃ ca tattvāvadhāraṇa iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5651: etena yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitam, na tat tena vyavahriyate, yathā rathyāpuruṣaḥ sarvajñatvena, na pratīyate cābhimataḥ puruṣa āptatveneti vyāpakānupalabdherasiddhatvamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5658: prakaraṇasamājātiḥ, satpratipakṣatayā cet svargādīnāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kutaḥ setsyatītyata āha---yogaje tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5662: tasmādāpātatastāvat satpratipakṣā evaite hetava ityata āha---asmākaṃ tu sabhyañca iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5666: na hi smaraṇānubhavavibhāge api sākṣī praṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5667: kiṃ tarhi? idaṃ smarāmīdamanubhavāmīti pratītyā svasākṣiko 'yam arthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5668: na cāropitaṃ tatrānubhavatvam--abādhānāt, smṛtitvānullekhanāt anupalabdhasya svaśiraścchedāderavabhāsanācca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5669: smṛtiviparyāso 'sāviti cet? yadi smṛtiviṣaye viparyāsa ityarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5671: atha smṛtāvevāyamanubhavatvaviparyāsa ityarthaḥ, tadā prāgeva nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5672: na ca saṃbhavatyapi, na hyanyenākāreṇa vyavasāyaviṣayībhūto 'yamartho
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5674: tathā ca sa ghaṭa ityutpannāyāṃ smṛtau bhrāmyatastaṃ ghaṭamanubhavāmīti syāt, na tvimaṃ ghaṭam, na hyayaṃ ghaṭa iti smṛterākāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5676: asti ca svapnānubhavasyāpi kasyacit satyatvam, saṃvādāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5677: tacca kākatālīyamapi na nirhetukam, sarvasvapnajñānānāmapi tathātvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5681: tasmād yogināmanubhavo dharmajatvāt pramā, sākṣātkāripramātvāt pratyakṣaphalam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5684: asmākaṃ tu sabhyañca iti bahavaśceti anvācaye cakāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5685: yadyapi cāsmākaṃ paramasarvajñasiddhāvavāntarasarvajñe na sidhyatyapi na kācit prakṛtahāniḥ, tathāpi tatsadbhāve api pramāṇasadbhāvāt so 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5687: iha dignāgena bhāvasādhanatvakarmasādhanatvābhyāmupadeśapadaṃ vikalpya dūṣitam karaṇasādhanatvapakṣastvasmadamito 'pi kuta upekṣita ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5689: arthena hi sākṣāt pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣasyaiva, paramparāpratibandho
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5693: apratibandhe tvaprāmāṇyameva ityasaṃbhava eva karaṇavyutpattipakṣasyeti manyata ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5694: atra bhāvavyutpattipakṣe āptatvaniścayaḥ śabdaphalam, taddvārā vākyārthaniścayo vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5699: āptopadeśaḥ tasminnevāpte niścayaṃ kurvan śabdaḥ pramāṇam, atha vā āpte niścayaṃ kṛtvā tatsahāyo vākyārthaniścayaṃ janayannityubhayaṃ dūṣayatītyāha--imamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5706: upadiśyamānor'thaḥ prāptaḥ, prāptatvena niścito yasmāditi vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5707: tathātvena niścita iti vā sūtrayojanā, ubhayamapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5715: atra cobhayorapi pakṣayorāptoktatvapravṛttisāmarthyahetupradhānayoḥ śabdasya prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ phalamiti śaḍkitumucitamapi na śaḍkitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5721: nanvanabhyupagatebhyaḥ pakṣebhyo na kañcidabhyupagatasya viśeṣaṃ paśyāma ityata āha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5727: yathā tu pūrvapakṣe vyākhyātam, tathātrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5730: yadyevaṃ tarhi kkāptoktatvaniścaya upayujyata ityata āha---āptatvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5733: sa khalu kathamarthamapratyāyya pratyāyayituṃ śakyet? tataśca punarāptoktatvenārthaniścaya āyāta ityata āha---na ca yata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5741: tathānāptoktatvenāpi hetunā kiṃ niścīyeta? tathā ca kasyāvacchedakatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5743: pratyakṣaṃ janyate, jātāduṣṭatvaistu pramāṇatayā niścīyate, tathā sattāmātrāvasthitenāptena pramāṇaṃ śabdo janyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5744: jñātāptatvena tūpadeṣṭrā tathātvena niścīyata iti pratyakṣavat svaviṣaye vyavastheti jñānamātramanumāpayet
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5748: na cāyaṃ laiḍgikaḥ, vacanamātrasyānaikāntikatvāt, āptoktatvasya prāgevāsiddheḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5750: tathā hi, na tāvat tādātmyatatprāptī saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5753: na ca tadevānumeyam, tasya svātantryeṇa bhavadbhiranabhyupagamāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5755: na ca liṅgasya svātmano laiḍgikajñānajanakatvamevānumeyam, tasya liḍgāntaraviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5756: tasmād vacanamātraliṅgapakṣe yad vacanaṃ tad buddhipūrvakamityudāharaṇīyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5758: svabhāvādevollekhyamātrapratilambhaḥ, na tu tatrāpi bhūtābhūtavibhāgo, na tu tarāṃ prakāravibhāgaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5765: tasya ca na kaścid viśeṣor'thāhitākārādilakṣaṇaḥ samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5768: sa cet jñānasiddhāvantarbhūtaḥ kimaparaṃ tena sādhanīyam? na cedantarbhūtaḥ punarapyaviśiṣṭameva jñānamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5771: yadyapi vacanamātramarthaviśeṣollekhi jñānapūrvakatāṃ vyabhicarati, tathāpi yaḥ padakadambakaviśeṣo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5772: yatpadārthajātaṃ smārayati, sa tatsaṃsargajñānapūrvaka ityasti niyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5773: evaṃ ca samayagrahasyāpyupayoga iti cet---na, gauraśvaḥ puruṣa ityādipadakambakena vyabhicārāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5775: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na tāvat svarūpataḥ, padānāṃ parasparaṃ svātantryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5777: avagame vā kastato 'paraḥ padārthānāṃ saṃsargo, yo jñānāvacchedakatayā anumātumiṣṭaḥ? ākāṅkṣādimattve satīti viśeṣaṇānna vyabhicāra iti cet? atha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5778: keyamākāṅkṣā? na tāvadavinābhāvaḥ svarūpator'thataśca, tasyā abhāve 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5781: evaṃ tarhi vākyārthaviśeṣapratipādakaṃ yat padakadambakam, tat tatsmāritārthasaṃsargajñānapūrvakamiti prayogārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5782: tathā ca prāgeva sādhyaviśeṣasiddhaye hetuviśeṣasiddhimicchatā vākyādeva vākyārthaviśeṣapratyaya eṣitavya ityupasaṃharannāha---tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5784: tathāpyasaṃbaddhasya prakāśakatve 'tiprasaṅga ityata āha---na ceti nanu na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5785: hi saṃbandha ityeva gamako 'tiprasaḍgāt api tvavinābhāva eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5786: sa ca śabdasyārthena nāstītyata āha---na cāvineti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5787: yat tvatroktam, cakṣurapi rūpakāryatvādeva rūpaṃ prakāśayatīti, tadayuktam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5788: yadi hi tatkṛtatvādeva tad gamayet, rūpamiva rasādīnapi gamayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5790: na hyavinābhāvasyaiṣa mahimā yadayaṃ sattāmātreṇaiva gamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5791: tathātve vā dhūmādapi cakṣuṣa iva sattāmātrāvasthitādevāgniḥ pratīyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5792: api ca jñānasamasamayo vārthaḥ prakāśate, anantarasamayo vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5793: tasmācca na cakṣuṣo janma, svakāraṇādevāyamasya svabhāvabhedalābho yadanātmānamapyakāraṇamapi kāraṇatvāviśeṣe 'pi vā rūpamevājñātameva satprakāśayatīti rūpolabdhilakṣaṇakāryadarśanabalenaiva tadvyavasthāpyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5794: tasyāśakyāpahnavatvāditi cet? tarhi yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti, na tasya tatra prāmāṇyam, yathā dahane 'pratibaddhasya rāsabhasyeti vyāpakānupalabdhistvayaivānaikāntikī kṛtā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5797: tatraiva kiṃ nibandhana iti cet? idaṃ mahāpāṇḍityaṃ yat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5800: tabdalenaiva śabdasyāpi tadanuguṇaḥ sa svabhāvabhedaḥ svakāraṇādāyāto vyavasthāpyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5801: yataḥ tattatsaḍketopadhānasūtramarthaṃ pratipādayatīti, tathāpi samayasya puruṣāyattatvāt kimayaṃ sāṃvyavahārikasaḍketāneva śabdān prayuḍkte? kiṃ vā svayamidānīmarthabhedeṣu saḍketyeti sandeho na nivartata iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5804: śabdānuccārayet? jānātyeva hyayaṃ nāviditasamayā ete pratipādakā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5805: atha vipralambhakaḥ, tathāpi samayāntarakaraṇe ka upayogaḥ,
