GSP29nvtp1_1u:5807: yatrāpi hi guptasamayairvyavahāraḥ, tatrāpi na pratipādyaṃ prati samayo gopyaḥ, api tvaviśvastān pratīti hṛti nighāyāha---tasamāditi //7 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5811: ṭīkāgiro viśadapāradavipruṣo vā yeṣāṃ vaśe nanu vaśe jagadeva teṣām //8 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5816: nanu yadi prameyameva mumukṣuṇā pratipitsitam, tadullaḍghya kimiti prathamataḥ pramāṇamamihitamityata āha---tacceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5817: tarhi uktāni pramāṇānīdānīṃ parīkṣayantāṃ kiṃ prameyalakṣaṇenetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5821: nanu pramāṇaṃ tāvat prathamata eva vaktavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5823: idānīṃ tu pañcadaśasu prathamaṃ kimabhidhīyatāmiti jijñāsā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5827: etasmād viśeṣāt pramāṇaprakaraṇāt apakarṣaḥ saṃśayādiprakaraṇebhyaśca utkarṣaḥ prameyaprakaraṇasyeti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5828: ārabhyatāṃ tahi prameyalakṣaṇam, kimantargaḍunā vibhāgenetyata āha---tadiheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5830: kiṃ tadarthajātamiti bhāṣyakārīyaḥ praśnaḥ śliṣṭaḥ, ki lakṣaṇaṃ katividhaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5836: prathamastu viśiṣṭaṃ prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśna ityanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5837: tatra vārttikakāreṇa tuśabdasūcitaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhītvā vibhāganiṣṭhaḥ praśna ityanena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5838: tatra vārttikakāreṇa tuśabdasūcitaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhītvā vibhāganiṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ kṛta ityāha---sa ca viśeṣa iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5839: nanvayameva ca sūtrārtha iti vibhāga evāsya sūtrāsyārtha iti gamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5840: tathā ca na vivakṣitaviśeṣalābhaḥ sūtrāt, evaṃ ca prameyamātravibhāgo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5849: nanu yadā digādayo 'bhihitā evārthata iti samādhānam, tadā tadabhidhāne ka
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5852: nanu pratyakṣamapyātmani pramāṇameva, ahamiti vikalpasya parairapīṣṭatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5862: tasmād vāsanāvādamātraṃ vihāya āgantukamapi kiñcit kāraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5863: taccāptānāptaśabdau vā liṅgatadābhāse vā pratyakṣatadābhāse vā? tatra yathā prathamamadhyamaprakārābhāvāt nīlavikalpaśyaramaṃ kalpamālambate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5867: tadābhāse tu mūle 'sya pāramparyāt savastutā // iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5869: na ca bāhyapratyakṣanivṛttāveva nirmūlatvam, buddhivikalpasyāpi nirmūlatvaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5870: tatra svasaṃvedanaṃ mūlam, ihāpi mānasamiti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5874: ato na tadatirikte vastuni pramāṇayituṃ śakyate tāvad yāvad dehādibhyo bhinna ātmā pramāṇāntareṇa na sādhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5877: yathā hi ghaṭādijñānaṃ śarīrādipratyayavaiyadhikaraṇyāt tadatirikte vastuni drāgevapramāṇayitu śakyate, tathā nedamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5878: nanu yadi nāma na drāgeva, vicārakrameṇa tu pramāṇayiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5880: nirūpādhiśarīrabuddhitatsamudāyālambanatvena ahaṃ pratyayasyātiprasaḍgāt svasaṃbandhini śarīrādāvayamahaṃpratyaya iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5883: tathā ca yadā tenaiva tadanubhūyate tadā pratyetuḥ pratyetavyādananyatvādahamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5884: ata eva ghaṭādayo na kadācidapyananyānubhavitṛkā iti na kadācidapyahamāspadamiti cet? evaṃ tarhi tvanmate 'pyayamahamiti pratyayaḥ śarīrādāvāroparūpa eva, tataḥ pratyeturanyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5885: buddhau mukhya iti cet---na, tasyāḥ kriyātvenānubhūyamānāyā bhinnasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5886: tatkarturahaṃ chinadmītivadahaṃ jānāmītyanubhavāt nīlādipratyetavyākāravat pratipattrākāro 'pi pratīterevāyamātmā tathā bhāsata iti cet? tarhi pratyetavyākārasamānayogakṣematvena pratipatrākārasyāpi siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5887: astu svopādānamātramiti cet---na, tatpratibhāsane tadgatārthākārasyāpi pratibhāsaprasaḍgāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5890: yamālayavijñānamācakṣata iti cet? evaṃ tarhi pravṛttivijñānopādānamanādinidhanaḥ siddho 'dhikaḥ pratipattā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5891: sa kiṃ saṃtanyamānajñānarūpaḥ, tadviparītarūpo veti cintā pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5896: kāryakāraṇaviśeṣayorekasaṃtānaniyamo vā? ādye tattvataḥ pratyabhijñānamasiddham, abhimānato viruddham, aviśiṣṭamanaikāntikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5899: tadatra pratisaṃdhāne kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pareṇopanyastaḥ kimupādhitayā vipakṣavyāvṛttisaṃdehamudbhāvayitum? atha svadarśane pratisandhānavyavasthāṃ pratipādayitum? pratisandhānasya tu kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanameva bādhanamityāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5900: tatra pratyabhijñānaṃ pratisandhānamiti gṛhītvopādhilakṣaṇamapaninīṣān kāryakāraṇabhāvapratisandhānayoḥ paraspareṇa vyāpti khaṇḍayati---na hi yatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5906: viśiṣṭo 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratisandhānaṃ prati prayojako yatastannivṛttāvapi nedaṃ nivartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5907: na ca sādṛśyamātramevāstu tannibandhanamiti sāmpratam, bhedagrahe tasyāpi vyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5908: tadagrahapakṣastu vācya iti tamupekṣyāsmadabhipretaṃ pratisandhānamādāya śaṅkate---pūrvāpareti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5909: yatra kartari pratisandhānaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ pratisandhayānāṃ buddhīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5910: yatra caiṣa evabhūtaḥ, tatrāvaśyaṃ kartṛpratisandhānamiti na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5915: sa kimātmanaḥ pūrvāparapratyayānekakartṛkatayā pratisaṃdhatte na vā? ādye tatpratisandhānādeva pratisandhāturekatvaṃ siddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5918: atha na pratisandhatte, na tarhi kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ kartaryapi pratisandhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5919: na hyasti saṃbhavo yadanvaye 'pi yasyānanvayastat tāvanmātranibandhanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5925: yadi pāralaukiker'the vipralambhakā eva vaktāra iti niścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5929: tataśca na kāṣakāraṇabhāvo na tasya nibandhanam avyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5935: upadeśastu pūrvapratisandhānabalopanītakarūṇābhyāsaprakarṣādeva virodhapratisandhānabalena suptasyeva prabodha iti śaḍkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5937: na ca sphaṭikavad viṣayoparāgaparihāreṇa buddhiṣu bhedagraha iti yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5939: tathābhāve buddhimātreṇa bhedāgrahe pārthivatayā vṛkṣāt kāṣṭhaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5942: tasmānnimittavyāvṛttau pratisandhānaṃ na syāt, bhavad vā nimittāntaramākṣipatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5949: tadantaḥpātikādācitkānekāhaṃpratyayarupo vā? na tāvadādyaḥ, na hyahamahamikayā parasparasvatantrasantānadvayamanubhūyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5953: kimaparāddhamavayavisaṃyogādibhiḥ? na cālayavijñānopāttaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ na kiñcidupādatta ityapi yuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5954: tathā sati nimittatāmapi na yāyāt, upādānatvavyāptatvānnimittatāyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5955: evaṃ ca yadi jñānāntaramupādadīta, tadā apūrvānantasantānapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5959: asya hi bhedāgrahaḥ svarūpato vā syāt, viṣayato vā? svarūpato 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5960: pūrvāhamiti pratyayamātrād vā, pravṛttivijñānebhyo 'pi vā? na tāvadādyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5962: kathañcid bhedāgrahe 'pi tadarthasyaiva pratisandhānamucitam, na pravṛttivijñānānām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5963: na ca tebhyo 'pi bhedāgraha iti coktameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5966: vastvantarameva vā, alīkaṃ vā? nādyaḥ, prāgdūṣaṇenaiva gatatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5967: na hyanena svākāraḥ svātmano bhedenāropitaḥ, api tu svātmaviṣaya eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5970: nāpi tṛtīyaḥ, ahamiti vikalpasya savastukatāyāḥ prāgeva prasādhanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5972: sa hi vidyamāna eva bhedo na gṛhyate, avidyamāna eva vā, āropito vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5975: na ca paramārthata eva nānāvikalpollikhitamalīkamekātmakam anātmakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5976: tathātve vā kva bhedāgrahasyopayogaḥ, ekatvādevaikatvenānusandhānāt? nāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5978: yadi hi tatra bhedāropaḥ, kathaṃ tadagrahaḥ? tadagrahe vā kathaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5981: ghaṭapaṭayoryo bhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ, śaśaviṣāṇanaraviṣāṇayorvā yo bhedaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5982: kālpanikaḥ, sa iha na gṛhyate ityabhedānusaṃdhānamiti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5985: tatra bhedagraho 'pyastīti cet? tarhi yathābhūto bhedaḥ tatra gṛhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5987: na caitadalīkaviṣayatvapakṣe saṃbhavatīti sthiravastugocaratvam eva sattvabuddherjyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5989: tadidamuktarūpaṃ pratisandhānaṃ nimittavattayā vyāptaṃ nirnimittatve niyamānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5990: taccānekakartṛtve nāstīti vyāpakānupalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamānaṃ nimittavatyekakartṛkatve viśrāmyatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5994: tathā hi vyavahitakālā api pratyayā yadyekakartṛkāḥ, kva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5995: buddhīnāmupādānopādeyabhāvaḥ? sa cet, kva teṣāmekakartṛkatā? sā hyekopādānataiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5998: bhedāgrahe satītyapi na yuktam, samastopādhisvīkāraparihāreṇa śiṣyācāryabuddhyorapi bhedāgrahāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6003: ekādhāratāniyama ityapi na yuktam, tasya vāstavasya kṣaṇikapakṣe
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6005: asti hi sarveṣāmabhimāno yatraiva ghaṭe gandhaḥ tatraiva rūparasasparśā iti, yatraiva śarīraṃ tatraiva jñānamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6008: kāṣṭhasya tu prakṛtervikṛtiraḍgāra iti kuto niścitaṃ bhavatā? yāvatā vahnerevāsau vikāraḥ kiṃ na syāt, vahnisaṃbandhe kāṣṭhādeva tadutpatteriti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6009: cet---na, kāṣṭhasaṃbandhe vahnereva tadutpattirityevaṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6010: pārthivaṃ pārthivopādānakameveti niścayāditi cet? kuta etat? sabhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāditi cet? tadapi kutaḥ? abhrāntasamataikāvasāyāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6013: asti hi teṣāṃ tadutpattau satyāṃ mamatā ābhimānikaikatvāvasāyaśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6015: astu piṇḍitānāṃ rūparasaparamāṇūnāṃ sarveṣā sarvopādānatvamityapi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6016: yuktam, anekavṛtteḥ ekasya svayamanabhyupagamāt, saprasidhānāṃ samānadeśatvābhāvācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6017: etena bhrāntasaṃmataikāvasāya iti pāṭhāntaramapāstam, laukikānāṃ bhrāntasaṃmatestatrāpi tulyatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6021: kiñcideva svakāraṇasāmagrīvaśādutpadyate jñānaṃ yat kāṃścideva kāraṇasāntānikān pratyayān pratyavekṣate nānyat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6026: kimatinirbandhena? yatra yathā kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra tathā kalpyata iti cet? tat kimidānīṃ kiṃbhūtasya kutra sāmarthyamityanuyogo 'nuttara eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6027: evaṃ tarhi sarvatra jñāpakajanakeṣvanāśvasāt nirīhaṃ jagat jāyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6029: athānenaitat kiṃ na bādhayate? tasya nirdeṣatvāditi cet? asya tarhi doṣāntaraṃ vacanīyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6030: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvādastūbhayoḥ satpratipakṣatvamiti cet? nanvidamapi te vyasanaṃ nivartayiṣyāmo mā tvariṣṭā ityupasaṃhāraśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6032: vaisadṛśyād daṇḍaghaṭavanna pratisaṃdhatta ityapi pariharedata uktam---yogicittamapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6033: tasyāpi yogicittena pratisandhānaṃ syāditi viparyayo hetuviparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6034: tasyāpi yogicittena pratisandhānaṃ syāditi viparyayo hetuviparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6036: ihānubhavo vā kālāntarabhāvinīṃ smṛtiṃ janayati, jajjanito vā saṃskāraḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6038: saṃtanyamāno vā? adhyakṣāsiddho 'pi taduttarabuddhidhārārūpo vā, tadanyo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6040: anubhavitṛsantānavaijātyaṃ ceti? tatra prathamaṃ dūṣayati---na hyajāteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6044: na hi karmakarakaropanītam eva bījaṃ kṣitimāsādyaḍkuraṃ kurute /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6045: na tu tathābhūtamapi pramādapatitam, tathā nīlādyanubhavasantānaḥ pītādyanubhavena vopanīyatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6046: nīlādyanubhavenaiva veti na kaścit svarūpakṛto viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6047: evaṃ cānanubhūte 'pi smaraṇaprasaḍgo na cānubhūte 'pīti vaijātyaṃ tu viśeṣo bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6048: yathā kṣīrāvasekādamlatvaṃ parihṛtya mādhuryamādāyānuvartamānāmalakī kālāntare api phale mādhuryamunmīlayati, lākṣārasāvasekād dhavalatāṃ parihṛtya raktatāmupādāyānuvartamānaṃ kārpāsabījaṃ kusumeṣu raktatām, na caivaṃ prakṛte saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6049: javākusumādyupadhānāt tadrūpatāṃ parihṛtya dhavalimānamupādāyaiva saṃtanyamānasya sphaṭikasyeva jñānasyāpi viṣayoparāgaṃ parihṛtya cidrūpatāmātramupādāyānuvṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6050: sarvākāratvameva sarvavijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu kaścidākāra ḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6051: sphuṭaḥ, anye tvapaṭava iti tu svadarśanaśraddhā, yato viruddhadharmādhyāsādapi na bhīḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6056: sa cet kālāntarasthāyī, nūnaṃ tadupādānamapi tathaiva sthāyi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6061: pṛthaksaṃskārasantāno hi na tāvat parābhyupeto nāpyupapannaḥ, ālayasya prāgeva pratiṣedhāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6063: tasmāt pravṛttisantāne phalānavakāśāt anyatra saṃskāre 'nyatra phale
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6065: tasmād pravṛttisantāne phalānavakāśāt anyatra saṃskāre 'nyatra phale
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6069: tasmād yatrānubhavastatra saṃskāraḥ, yatra ca sa tatra smṛtyādiphalamiti paramupapadyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6072: etena yo yaḥ saṃskāraḥ kvacit santāna āhitaḥ, sa tatraiva phaladānayogyo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6074: viśeṣalakṣaṇasya ca svarūpāsiddhatvāt, aviśiṣṭottarakāryapravāhalakṣaṇasya ca viruddhatvāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6078: guṇatvaṃ tu yadarthaṃ sādhitam, tat tatsādhakenaiva sādhitamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6081: nanu yadi vaiyarthyamasya hṛdi nihitameva vārttikakṛtā, tat kimathamamumeva hetumupanyastavānityata āha, tadapi pūrvamūktam, na tu prasādhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6082: na cāsiddhaṃ sādhanaṃ nāmeti kṛtvā iti garbhaśoṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6086: na tāvadanayoḥ sādhanatvaṃ prati kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6088: so 'pi nāsti, ekahetusiddhe 'pi hetvantarajijñāsuṃ prati bhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6101: tatra yadyapi dvitīyasya nivṛttau na sādhyanivṛttiḥ, tathāpi prathamasya nivṛttāvavaśyaṃ nivarteta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6103: ārambhake sati ca tat kāryadravyaṃ sāvayavaṃ vyavasthāpyeta, vāyuvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6104: na ceha kvacidupalabhyamānasparśavattāstīti nārambhasaṃbhavaḥ, tadabhāve na sāvayavatvamākāśavat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6109: tathā satyeva hīcchādīnāṃ sārvatrikatvamupapadyate yata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6113: atha gatereva kiṃ na taṃ tamāpnotītyata āha---gatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6115: tayā aparidṛśyamānāpi gatiḥ kalpyate manasi paramāṇuṣu ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6117: tathā hi, na paramāṇvāśrayā icchādayaḥ, anityatve
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6119: niravayavadravyāśritatvaṃ ca sādhayatā sāvayāśritatvaṃ prāgeva nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6123: nanu tathāpi kimanayā kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā, yāvatā guṇatvamanyathāpyamīṣāṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam? tathā hi icchādayo guṇā anityatve satyekendriyagrāhyajātimattvāt, rūpādivadityādinā ityata āha---tadanayeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6130: teṣāmapi śarīramāśritya tathābhāvāt śarīrādapakarṣa iti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6132: indriyāṇāṃ manasaḥ aṃśator'thādeḥ paramparayā tu śarīrāśritatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6137: samuccayapakṣe vyabhicāradarśinaḥ kathaṃ ceṣṭāśraya iti praśno
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6140: yadyapi ceṣṭā kāyavyāpārastathāpi tasyaiva lakṣyatvāditaretarāśrayabhiyā vyāpāramātraṃ vaktavyamityāha---ceṣṭā vyāpāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6146: tadidamubhayaṃ vivakṣatoktam---api tu viśiṣṭo vyāpāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6152: atra ca sparśavaddravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrtiriti paralakṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa mūrtiśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6157: tena yadyapi śarīrasya prayojakaṃ mano 'styeva, tathāpi na tat sparśavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6158: yadyapi ca śarīreṇāpi tatra prayatyate, tathāpi na tat tato 'nyat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6165: na ca tasyāpi prāṇitvenocchvāsaniḥśvāsānumānāt nayanodarādyavayavasaṃkocavikāśalakṣaṇā ceṣṭāstīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6169: nanu yadyapīndriyāṇi śarīre na samavayanti, tathāpi saṃyujyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6170: tāvataiva āśrayārtha upapanna ityato vārttikakārasya bhāvamāviṣkaroti---saṃyogitayā tviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6173: na hi golakamātrasyopadhāte 'nugrahe vā tvagādīnyupahanyante anugṛhyante
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6175: yathā jarāyauvanādinā śarīropaghātānugrahābhyāṃ sarvāṇi vikalāyante paṭūni vā sampadyanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6176: tadetad bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyāmevānugṛhyante upahanyanta iti bahuvacanaprayogeṇa spaṣṭaṃ darśitamityupekṣitavān
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6179: nanu sukhādyupalabdhihetutvamarthānāṃ kāryopahitaṃ rūpam, na tu tadeva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6182: yadavacchinne ātmani arthā bhogaṃ janayanti taccharīram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6186: nāpīndriyaiḥ, tadavacchedena tatra bhogotpattau bahirapi bhogaprasaṅgaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6187: tadetat tasya bhogadhiṣṭhānamiti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā eva prāk darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti neha vitanyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6190: ceṣṭādayaḥ sāmānyaśabdā iti vārttike bahuvacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntabrahmaṇādiśabdāntarbhāvena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6197: yasyāpi pramāṇena śarīratvaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati, tatrāpi vyāpāraśrayatvaṃ gatamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6203: prathamapakṣe mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatāprasaḍgāt, ekasya dravyasya anārambhakatvāt, pṛthivyā abādidravyānārambhakatvācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6209: śarīrāvayavāntareṇa ghrāṇasya samavāyo vā saṃyogo vā? prathame 'pi dvayī
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6210: gatiḥ, ghrāṇasya vā śarīrāvayave samavāyaḥ, tasya vā ghrāṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6213: na hi kāraṇaṃ kāryakārye samavaitītyarthaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhatatpuruṣapakṣe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6216: ghrāṇasya śarīrāvayave samavāya iti tu na sambhavatyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6224: na tu miśrairiti vyāptiḥ, tāmupobdalayitumapratyakṣatvaprasaṅga uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6226: tathā ca na tatra śarīrasamavāyasambhava iti kimanena śaḍkitenāpītyupekṣitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6234: yoginastadapi tatheti yadi tadendriyaparamāṇubhireva vyabhicāraḥ, teṣāmapi tathābhāvāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6236: paramārthatastu yadi dvandvānantaraṃ bahuvrīhiḥ ka liṅgasaṅgatirarthasaṅgatiśca? atha prathamata eva bahuvrīhiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6241: śarīrādīnāmeva dharmaḥ pretyabhāvo dharminirūpaṇādhīnatvācca dharmasya tebhyaḥ pretyabhāvasyāpakarṣaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6242: arthādīnāṃ doṣāntānāṃ śarīramāśritya duḥkhahetutvāviśeṣe 'pi paramparayā śarīrāśriyatvādindriyāṇāṃ tu sākṣāt tathābhāvādebhyasteṣāmapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6243: manasastvevaṃrūpatve satyapi bāhyendriyavaidharmyajñāpanārthatvāt buddhikramānumeyatvācca buddheḥ sakāśādapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6251: nanu bhāṣyakṛd āha---bhogasādhanānīti, tatkathametat tena sūcitamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6253: yadyapi bhujyeta iti bhogau sukhaduḥkhe iti sākṣādeva bhogasādhanatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ sambhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6254: tathāpi bhogo buddhiriti tatra tatra bhāṣyadarśanāt tadanusāreṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6256: yathā ca sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa na viśeṣalakṣaṇāvasaraḥ, tathā vibhāgamantareṇāpīti so 'pi vaktavyaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6260: gandharasarūpasparśaśabdā iti pratiniyatārthavibhāgaṃ kurvatā sūtrakṛtā eva darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6261: yadi hyaparamapi bāhyam indriyaṃ syāt, kathaṃ pañcaiva pratiniyatā viṣayā iti tadeva vyavacchedyaṃ darśayanneva manāk smārayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6262: rasanādi pratiniyataviṣayam, mana ādi sarvaviṣayamiti ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6266: tat kathaṃ tato na viśeṣa ityata āha---pramāṇādyudyeśeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6268: atha vibhāgasūtratve 'pi lakṣaṇasūtraṃ kiṃ na syāt? na hyanayoḥ kaścid
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6273: lakṣyasya pakṣarūpatayā sādhyatvāt, lakṣaṇasya ca liṅgarūpatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6275: tathāpi kathamebhya eva padebhyo vivakṣitobhayalābha ityata āha---atra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6279: tena śrotrapadamapyavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya nabhaso viśiṣṭādṛṣṭopagṛhītakarṇaśaṣkulyavacchinnatve vartata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6283: nanu kevalenāvayavārthena lakṣaṇe ativyāptiḥ, ghrāṇatvādisahitena tu itaretarāśrayatvamityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6285: yāvatā vyabhicāro nivartate tāvadupalakṣaṇaparam, na tu samuccitaṃ padaṃ nirūcyate tvakpadaṃ tvanavayavaṃ vṛddhikṣayavaddravyasahajāvaraṇamātre vartata ityabhiprāyavatā bhāṣyakṛtā lakṣaṇaṃ tadbījaṃ ca darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6290: saṃyogādhāratvāditi grāhyasya mṛgamadādigandhasya tatrāsamavāyāt mṛgamadādīnāṃ svāvayavasamavāyena samavetasamavāyābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6293: atha ko niyamārthaḥ? kiṃ yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tattajjātīyasyaiva guṇaviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇāti? atha yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tajjātīyasya tenaiva guṇaviśeṣo gṛhyate ityata āha---na caivamiti yadyapi prathamamapyavadhāraṇaṃ ghrāṇaśravasoḥ saṃbhavati, tathāpi rasanādiṣu vyabhicārāt tadupekṣyottaraṃ grahītavyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6294: tathāpi bhūtebhya iti sūtrapadasya kiṃ tātparyam ityata āha---anena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6296: yadyapi viśeṣasiddhireva śeṣaṃ niṣedhati, tathāpi viparyaye bādhakaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6298: na tvekaprakṛtikatvamāha sāṃkhyo na tvekasvābhāvyamindriyāṇāmityata āha---śliṣṭaṃ padamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6303: tathā ca lakṣyahāniriti---na hyasti saṃbhavo nirhetuko vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ //12 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6314: yeṣāṃ mithyājñānaviṣayīkṛtānāṃ nimittānuvyañjanasaṃjñāviṣayīkṛtānāṃ saṃsārahetutvaṃ ta hame lakṣyanta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6316: tatastadarthā iti lakṣaṇapadaṃ cet, lakṣyapadaṃ nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6320: ke te? ya indriyāṇāmarthā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6321: āgāmino vārttikasya bhāṣyeṇa virodhaṃ parijihīrṣurāha---na ṣaṣṭhīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6340: majjadhātumalā hame bahavaḥ śmaśāne tarāviva śarīre saṃyuktā ityudvegaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6350: śarīrāpekṣayā parāparabhāvo na madapekṣayeti na kiñcit /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6356: vakrabhrūḥ ṛjuromarājī gabhīranābhirūnnatapayodharā pṛthunitambā kṛśamadhyeti snehaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6357: annapānapariṇatiriyaṃ bhedomāṃsādyapacayāpacayasaṃsthānabhedavatī acirasthāyinīti nirveda iti nimattasaṃjñayā saha aśubhasaṃjñeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6363: na tāvadādyaḥ, na hi bhavati yadeva rūpaṃ sa eva sparśa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6364: na ca rūpaṃ dvīndriyagrāhyam, andhasyāpi nīlapītādiprayatyayaprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6365: na caikameva vastu kāraṇabhedādanyathā prathata iti yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6367: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, sa hyekadeśatayā vā, ekakālatayā vā, ekakāryatayā vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6370: saṃbhave vā tadeva dravyamiti paryavasitaṃ vivādena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6372: tathā hi cakṣuṣopalabhyamāne bhūtale rūpaviśeṣe ghaṭo 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6375: tadadhikaraṇāḥ sparśādayo 'pīti tu kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ? na hi sparśādayaścākṣuṣe cetasi cakāsati, tvaco 'yaṃ vyāpāra ityapi na yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6377: na ca samudāyayorevādhārādheyabhāvānubhavaḥ, parasparāśrayaprasaḍgāt ekādhāratayā samudāyānusandhānam, tadanusandhāne caikādhāratānubhava iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6390: sa hi vijñānanayamāśritya vā syāt, dvicandrādivad visaṃvādād vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6391: sthairyavadbādhakād veti? ādye rūpādiṣu kaḥ pakṣapātaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6393: te dve api rūpādīnāmeveti cet? na teṣāṃ kiṃ tu tasyaivetyeva kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6394: bādhakāditi cet? sa yadi kramayaugapadyavirodhaḥ, kṣaṇikaṃ tāvadastu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6397: kathaṃ tadvat pratīyeteti cet? taiḥ saha tathotpādāditi parihāro 'stu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6405: abhedasādhanāni pramāṇāni bādhakamiti tu cintyata ityāśayavān
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6407: atra para āha anākalitasamaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6410: yathā nīladravyasamparkād dhavalo 'pi nīlo mahārajanasaṃparkādrakta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6411: atra nīlādayo dravyavyapadeśaṃ vihāya rūpavyapadeśameva labhante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6413: ādiśabdena gandhādīnāṃ vāsanādikāḥ vāsanādikāḥ kriyāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6417: utpādamātraṃ vā, trailokyavilakṣaṇotpādo vā, sabhāgasantānabhedotpādo veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6420: dṛṣṭisṛṣṭiviṣaye hi kasmiścid ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6421: sa cedanayā vacobhaḍgyātiriktaḥ samarthitaḥ, siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitamityāha---anyatva iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6424: te ca kathamapyutpadyantām, na kadācidapi dvīndriyagrāhyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6426: tathā ca dṛṣṭisṛṣṭiviṣayo naikaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6429: yadyapi kṣaṇikaparamāṇurūpe dravye na kaścid vicāravirodhaḥ, tathāpi sthirāvayavyabhiprāyeṇa śaḍkā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6435: atra prayogaḥ, ye ghaṭādipratyayā na satyāḥ, ta evambhūtasamyakpratyayapūrvakā mithyāpratyayatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6439: tathā hi keyamanāditā? kimevaṃrūpamithyājñānapravāhāvicchedaḥ, kiṃ vā pūrvamapyevaṃbhūtasya vibhramasya kadāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6445: na ca viparyaye bādhakābhāvād vibhramaśca syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6449: tathā hi mithyāpratyayā apyābhimānika pākṣikaṃ vā prāmāṇyamupādāyaiva pravartayeyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6455: tathāpi ghaṭādipratyayānāṃ satyatve kiṃ nibandhanā bauddhasyerṣyeti jijñāsuṃ pratibubodhayiṣurāhetyāha---taṃ pratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6461: asti hi viṣayāgrahe buddhijātīyāgraho na cābhedobāhyasthitau satyāṃ guṇaguṇivādārambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6479: tato na pāribhāṣikeṇa vyabhicāraśaḍkāsamānārthānāṃ prakṛtīnāmiti prakṛte
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6482: nanvāpa ityapi toyagatāmeva bahutvasaṃkhyāmācaṣṭām, ko doṣa ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6484: yadyupanibandhena yadi toyaparamāṇāvapyāpa iti śiṣṭaprayogastadaivaṃ neyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6495: vastutastu pītaśaḍkhavibhrame ayam api na pītasyaiva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6506: sa hyevaṃ pravartate, candano 'yaṃ surabhiḥ, tiktaḥ, śuklaḥ, śītaḥ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6507: tādātmyabhramanirāsārthaṃ tu śabdo vyapadeśakatayopāttaḥ, candanasya śuklaṃ rūpamityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6509: na kevalaṃ hetusvarūpālocanena pratijñālocanenāpi candanasyopālambhābhyupagamo 'vasīyate parasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6512: svātantryeṇa vā sattve sādhye āśrayāsiddho heturiti tṛtīye vyutpādanīyamiti ihopekṣitavāniti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6514: tathā hi, ayaṃ cakṣurgocaraḥ candano rasādibhyo bhidyate, tadanupalambhe
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6516: yadyasminnanupalabhyamāne 'pyupalabhyate tat tato bhidyate, yathā rūpādibhyaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6519: spamātrāttu vyavacchedaḥ sandigdhaḥ tatra vyapadeśo heturiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6524: atra ca hetutayā vyāpti pradhānīkṛtya ṣaṣṭhyanto heturūktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6538: atra yadi ghaṭamanatareṇāpi jāyamānatvādityetāvanmātraṃ kriyeta tadaikaghaṭaparityāge ghaṭāntare jāyamānaghaṭapratyayena vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6552: tadguṇayogāt tu tadvyavahāro māṇavake siṃhavyavahāravat tadavayavārabdhatvāt tadīyatāvyavahāraḥ kṣīrasya dadhīvivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6553: sarpeṇāntyāvayavinā ekenānārambhāt tadavayavānāṃ kāryāvaṣṭabdhatvāt sarpakuṇḍalakaṃ saṃsthānameva sphuṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6557: rāhoḥ śira ityatra tu saṃsthāne śiraḥ śabdopacāramātram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6561: vyatirekopadeśaviveko yadi syāt tadā buddhiśarīrābhyāmevānaikāntikaṃ syādata āha---atādātmyeti // pariśuddhiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6564: sarvajanīnenāpi samayena gośabdavad yadyarthāntare 'pyete pravarteran tadā ko virodha ityata āha---tatra sarvajanīnaḥ śaknotīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6567: eteṣāṃ śabdānāṃ vyavahriyamāṇānāṃ yadekaṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ tadyogād itarebhyo buddhirbhidyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6571: tathābhūtāyāṃ ca tasyāmeteṣāṃ samayo grāhya ityanyonyāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6595: mayeti hi cetanoparāgo darpaṇasyeva mukhoparāgo bhedāgrahādatāttvikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6596: idamiti viṣayoparāgaḥ indriyapraṇālikayā pariṇātibhedo darpaṇasyeva malasaṃbandhaḥ pāramārthikaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6600: tena saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātāttvikasya saṃbandho darpaṇapratibimbitasya mukhasyeva tadgatamalinimnā sopalabdhiriti teṣāṃ rahasyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6602: sā ca na tāvad buddheḥ, tasyā acaitanyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6607: yatra hi cetanācetanayorasaṃsargāgrahe saṃsargabhramaḥ, tādātmyabhramo vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6609: na hi tatra darpaṇasya śarīrasya vā bhrama iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6610: api ca buddhirātmānaṃ cetayamānā bhrāmyet, puruṣeṇa vā cetyamānā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6612: na ca svataḥ parato vā aprakāśamānaiva buddhirbhrāmyatīti yuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6613: na hyadṛśyamāna eva darpaṇaḥ timire maitrasannidhānamātreṇa tatpratibimbamudgrāhayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6617: vaidharmyādindriyaprakaraṇādapasāritasya buddhikramonneyatayā pravṛttihetutayā ca tayoḥ madhyer'thādavasaro
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6623: indriyaṃ pradhānīkṛtya vā ātmani sahakārivāda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6624: nanu mano vibhu sarvadā sparśarahitadravyatvāt, viśeṣaguṇaśūnyadravyatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6628: tathā hi yadā sukhādyupalabdhīnāṃ kriyātvena karaṇatayā mano 'numitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6634: tathā ca tadavacchedena vṛttilābhe śirasi me vedanā, pāde me sukhamityādyavyāpyavṛttitvapratītivirodhaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6638: tathāpi tasyaivendriyatve svābhāvike adhikakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt dharmigrāhakapramāṇabādhaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6639: atha jñānakrameṇendriyasahakāritayā tadanumānaṃ tadā sutarāmeva prāguktadoṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6640: yadi tu manaso vaibhave 'pi adṛṣṭavaśāt krama upapadyate, tadā manaso 'siddherāśrayāsiddhireva vaibhavahetūnāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6641: atha yatrādṛṣṭasya dṛṣṭakāraṇopahāreṇopayogaḥ, tatra tatpūrṇatāyāṃ kāryamutpadyata eva, anyathā antyatantusaṃyogebhyo 'pi kadācitpaṭo na jāyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6644: balavatā kulālena dṛḍhadaṇḍanunnamapi cakraṃ na bhrāmyet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6645: yatra tu dṛṣṭānusaṃhāreṇa adṛṣṭasya vyāpāraḥ tatra tadveguṇyāt kāryānudayo yathā paramāṇukarmaṇāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6646: tadihāpi yadi viṣayendriyātmasamavadhānam eva jñānahetuḥ, tatsadbhāve sadaiva kāryaṃ syāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6650: tacca yadyapi sarvāṇyevendriyāṇi vyāpnoti, tathāpi karaṇadharmatvena kriyākramaḥ saṃgacchate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6651: akalpite tu tasmin nāyaṃ nyāyaḥ, pratipatturakaraṇatvāt cakṣurādīnāmanekatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6652: tasmādantaḥkaraṇamastīti cet? nanvevamapi yugapajjñānāni mā bhuvan /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6653: yugapajjñānaṃ tu kena vāryate? bhavatyeva samūhālambanamekaṃ jñānamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6655: teṣvapi bhavatyeveti cet---na, vyāsaṅgakāle jñānakrameṇa vivādaviṣaye
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6657: bubhutsāviśeṣeṇa vyāsaḍge kriyākrama iti cet---naivam, na hyeṣa bubhutsāyā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6658: mahimā, yadabubhutsite viṣaye jñānasāmagryāṃ satyāmapi na jñānamapi tu tatra saṃskāraviśeṣādhāyakaḥ pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6660: tathā ca ghaṭāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣuḥ paṭaṃ na darśayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6661: tasmād bubhutsāpīndriyāntarādākṛṣya bubhutsitārthagrāhiṇīndriye mano niveśayantī yugapat jñānānutpattāvupayujyate, na tu svarūpata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6663: gandhādikriyānyatve satīti vārttikaṃ yathāśrutaṃ dravyakarmādijñānenānaikāntikamato vyācaṣṭe---cakṣurādibhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6666: tato naite karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ prabhavantītyata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6677: na ca tadantareṇa viśeṣalakṣaṇāvakāśa ityāśaḍkya sūtravākyaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6682: yadi tvayatamānasyaivecchāmātraṃ jñānamātraṃ dveṣamātraṃ vā pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6685: atra yadyapi vāgityādiyathāśrutaviśeṣalakṣaṇāvasare dayādyasaṃgraha iti vuddhipadaṃ mano 'bhiprāyeṇa vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā, tathāpi viśiṣṭadevatādyanucintanādyasaṃgraha ityata āha---sa ca dvividheti jñātuṃ jñāpayituṃ vā prayatnaḥ ubhayathāpi jñānahetuḥ, tena vāggocaro 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6687: kartuṃ kārayituṃ vā prayatnaḥ ubhayathāpi kriyāhetuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6690: tadarthaṃ prayatno jñānaṃ janayan jñāpakahetuviṣayo bhavatīti jñāpakaikadeśena vācopalakṣayatā svasamavetajñānamātraheturityapi bhramo nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6691: kāyanimitteti kāyo nimittaṃ viṣayatayā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6692: dānasteyādyartha yaḥ khalu prayatnaḥ sa kāyaviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6693: evaṃ manonimittaṃ dayādrohādyarthaṃ yaḥ khalu prayatnaḥ, sa manoviṣayo bhavatīti neyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6694: anyathā nāstyevāsau puruṣavyāpāro yatra kāyamanasī na nimittamiti //17 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6705: atra ca samavāyo yadyapi na vyāpāraḥ tathāpi mohādeḥ pravartakasya svāśrayasamavetarāgadveṣamohajananāvāntaravyāpārasya pravartakatvamityadūraviprakarṣeṇa sambandhasambandhinoretad draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6706: tena phalagocarau moharāgau mohadvaiṣau vā tatsādhanaviṣayau moharāgau mohadveṣau vā janayantau puruṣaṃ pravartayataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6707: tataḥ phalaviṣayā rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartakāḥ, sādhanaviṣayāstu tadekārthasamavāyinaḥ pravartanā iti vastugatiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6708: vyāpāro 'pi ca kāryānuguṇa iti kṛtvā rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6712: śarīrādīnāṃ doṣaparyantānāṃ parityāgapūrvakaḥ prāptilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ pretyabhāva iti tadanantaramevāsyāvasara ityāha---uddeśakrameti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6714: na cotpattimātraṃ pretyabhāvaḥ, ekasminnapi janmani tathāvyavahāraprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6719: tathāpi kiṃ vakrokteḥ prayojanamityata āha---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6720: nanu dvitīyasūtre duḥkhādīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva saṃsāra ityuktam, iha tu punarūtpattiriti, tat kuto na virodha ityāśayavato vārttikakṛta ākṣepaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6723: tatasteṣāṃ tathābhūtapravāhavicchede pretyabhāvāparanāmā saṃsāro vicchidyeta iti tulyapravṛttinimittatvāt sa eva tatra saṃsāra uktaityayo na virodha ityāśayavataḥ parihāro duḥkhādīnāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6725: seyamuktarūpā punarūtpattiryadyacetanasya manasaḥ saṃsāraḥ kimiti nivartanīyaḥ? athātmanastadāśakyanivṛttiḥ, muktasyāpi saṃsāridehādiparityāgāt tadīyāparadehādiprāptisaṃbhavādityāśayavatā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6727: neyaṃ bhogenaviśeṣitā punarūtpattiḥ saṃsāra ityāśayavatā parihṛtam---yadīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6732: sāmānyena jñātā hi viśiṣṭatayā jñātuṃ śakyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6737: yadyapi svarūpato 'pi pravṛtteḥ kāryabhūtau dharmādharmau prati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6738: doṣāṇāmatiśayenopayogo, vakṣyati ca, doṣatuṣāvanaddhā hi karmataṇḍulā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6739: ityādi, tathāpi pravṛttiphale doṣāṇāmupayogo darśanīyaḥ sūtre prakṛtatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6744: svarūpatastu pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ sūtrakāra eva caturthe vakṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6745: tat kiṃ nirdeṣasya sukhaduḥkhe na sta ityupāttakarmapracayasya tādavasthyamadattaphalasyaiva vā vināśa ityata āha---na cāstīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6746: na brūmo nirdeṣasya upabhoga eva nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6753: nanu lakṣaṇaśabdo yadi svarūpavacanaḥ syāt, gauṇaduḥkhāvyāptiḥ syāt āvṛttau vākyabhedaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6759: duḥkhatayā tadviṣayatvaṃ tathātve ca duḥkhatvamiti lokasuprasiddhena bādhanābuddhiviṣayatvena heyatāyāḥ prasādhanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6760: yo hi duḥkhaṃ taddhetuṃ vā śarīrādi tadanuṣaktaṃ vā sukhaṃ jānāno 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6761: sukhatṛṣṇāpariplutamatirna hātumicchati, taṃ pratyucyate śarīrādiduḥkhāntaṃ duḥkhaṃ heyamityarthaḥ, bādhanālakṣaṇatvāt, yattu na heyaṃ na tadevam, yathātmasvarūpāpavargāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6763: yadyapi rāgābhāvo vairāgyaṃ tathāpi suṣuptyādau tasya bhāve mokṣānupayuktatayā ātyantiko vivakṣitaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6766: upanateṣvapi viṣayeṣvaudāsīnyaṃ kiṃ tadupekṣābuddhiḥ prabalatattvasākṣātkārasamunmūlitaniravaśeṣamavidyāsaṃskāre heyopādeyapakṣavyavacchedavatī buddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6767: śarīrādiṣu uktaḥ uktarūpa eva grāhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6771: yathā ca kālotkarṣaḥ sukhasyāgamikaḥ, tathā svarūpotkarṣo 'pyānubhavika
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6774: dharmaphalaṃ hi duḥkhābhāvo bhavan pradhvaṃso vaktavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6778: na hi brahmalokopabhogānantaramevāvaśyaṃ duḥkhena bhavitavyamityasti niyāmakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6779: yathā ca viśiṣṭaśālisūpādinā kulmāṣapiṇḍikayā codarapūraṇe kṛte
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6780: duḥkhanivṛttistulyā, tathendrabrāhmapadayorapīti na kaścit svarūpato viśeṣaḥ syāt, api ca svargārthī yāgādikaṃ kṛtvā kadācillabdhavṛtteradharmānnarakaduḥkhamanubhūya svargamanubhavati kadācit tu manuṣyadehapātānantarameva ityaniyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6782: na cānutpannasya pradhvaṃsaḥ tasmād dharmaṃ caritvā avaśyamakāmayamāno 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6788: śarīrādiṣu pratiyogiṣu lakṣiteṣu tannivṛttirūpasyāpavargasya lakṣaṇāvasara ityāha---krameti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6789: yadyapi mano na jāyate, tathāpi karmopagrahamantareṇa tasyākiñcitkaratvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6790: sa eva tasya janmeti jāyamānāḥ sarva ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6793: tadviśiṣṭasya jīvanmuktyuttarakāle duḥkhasyātyanatābhāvo mokṣa iti nākāśādigatena duḥkhasyātyantābhāvena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6794: pariṇāmo hi pūrvadharminivṛttau dharmyantarotpādo vā syāt, vaināśikānāmiva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6800: yadi dharmadharmiṇorekāntenābhedo yadi vā bhedābhedaḥ, ubhayathāpi na kūṭasthānityatā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6801: ekāntabhedena tu katham brahmaivedaṃ sarvamiti śrutivacanamādriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6805: yathā ghaṭādayo brahmadharmā anityāḥ, tathā tadabhinnasvabhāvaṃ brahmāpyanityaṃ syādityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6809: na caikāntabhinna evāyaṃ brahmadharmaprapañco 'stu iti vācyam, vyaktād vyaktasya niṣpattiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6812: nityamityādi bhāṣyaṃ na yathāśrutaṃ paramatotthāpanamityata āha---asyārtha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6821: yadyenāśrīyate tattena nityena tadvat, yathā paṭena tantava ityutthāpya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6824: nanu sukhatatsaṃvedanena brahmayaṇo bhinno brahma cānuditānastamitarūpaṃ śuddhabuddhasvabhāvaṃ svata eva siddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6825: kastatra pramāṇapraśnāvakāśaḥ? sarveṣāmeva pramāṇānāmanubhava eva sīmā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6828: viṣayasukhasaṃvedane evātmā tadatirikto vā? ādyaṃ dūṣayati---sukhamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6831: na ca kalpito virūddhadharmādhyāso bhedahetuḥ sphaṭikasyāpi javātāpicchādisannidhānāpāditārūṇimanīlimādinā bhedaprasaḍgādityāśaḍkya pariharati---na cātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6832: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svarūpeṇa pūrvāparakālaikatayā sphuranneva nīlīdivyāvṛttātmā nīlādyātmanāropyata iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6833: syādetat, svasaṃvedanamātmasvabhāvamapyanādyavidyāvaśādanātmatayā sphurat tattadviṣayoparāgeṇa bhinnamiva sphuratyātmanyekatayā pratisandhīyamāne
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6837: ayamarthaḥ, na tāvat sa eva tasminneva tadānīmeva bhrānto 'bhrāntaśceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6839: tasmādavidyāyā durghaṭatvaṃ nāmālaḍkāra eveti pādaprasārikayā pratyavastheyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6842: pratibimbe tu suvyakta eva bhrama iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6844: nanvātmani nityaṃ caitanyamiti ka evamāha? ki tvātmaiva nityacaitanyasvabhāva ityata āha---na cātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6846: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti tadajñāsiṣamitivat sukhenāhaṃ svapimīti tadajñāsiṣamityevamapi smaraṇaprasaḍgāt, tarhi kimidaṃ sukhamahamasvāpsamiti duḥkhābhāvānumānamātraṃ supto 'haṃ na kiñcidajñāsiṣamiti jñānābhāvānumānavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6848: ko dharmī? ātmā anubhūyamānaḥ smaryamāṇo vā pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6849: tathāpi suṣuptāvasthā yā nānubhūtā ata eva na smṛtā, kathamiva tacchabdena parāmṛśyata iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6852: yathā prāgupalabdhaḥ paścādupalabhyamāno ghaṭo madhyāvasthāyāṃ nāyaṃ jñāta iti jñānābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'numīyata iti na kiñcidanupapannam, stāmātmano jñānasukhe bhinne na tu mithastathā ca sukhātmakaṃ jñānamātmani
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6854: evametat, svayamapi na prakāśata iti tvasiddhamityata āha---sukhaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6855: tadevamātmani sukhaṃ nityaṃ bhinnaṃ bhinnanaiva jñānena prakāśyamānamāstheyam tatra bhāṣyavārtike ityāha---tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6856: nanu vaiṣayikasukhajñāne kartavye sukhātiriktaṃ kimātmamanaḥsaṃyogo 'pekṣate, yena tatrāpi viṣayamātrāpekṣāyāṃ manasaiva rūpādyupalabdhiprasaḍgo na syāt, atha bahirmanaḥsāpekṣaṃ nanvantariti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6859: āpāditaprayāsavaiyarthyaparihāraṃ parasya vārttikakṛto hṛdisthaṃ sphuṭīkaroti siddhāntavārttikaṃ saṃgamayitum---nanu tvanmata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6860: yathā hi śāstreṇa pravartamānaḥ pravartayitvayaḥ, tathā sa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6866: na hi tasya saṃbandhalakṣaṇā prāptirapratisaṃkramatvāt nāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6876: prayojanaṃ tu duḥkhābhāvaḥ, tasya nirvartyatvāditi vastugatiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6881: tadidaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---śakyau bhogena kṣetumiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6884: tasmānmanāgapyasyā avakāśo na dātavyaḥ paraiḥ, apitvavidyānivṛttimātre prayatitavyaṃ śakyatvāt, avirūddhatvāccetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6885: tasmādupapannānavadyavādinaḥ parameśvarasyopadeśo nāśakyaprayojano na viparītaprayojano na viparītaprayojano vā bhavitumarhatīti bhāktatvamevānandaśrutīnāṃ nyāyyamityāha---tasmāditi nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavatyasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6886: yadyapi kiñcinnārabhate nopādatte tathāpi nimittatayā kiñcitkurvan san bhaviṣyatīti cet? naivam, ṭīkārthānavabodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6889: evamastviti cet? atra ṭīkayottaraṃ, tadevamasmadabhipretāpavargalakṣaṇe saṃpratipannāvapi lābhahānyoradhikavādinau nirastau, saṃkhyādayastu naivamiti notthāpitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6895: sarveṣāṃ pramāṇādhīnatvāt prameyasya tu bubhutsitatamatvāt tābhyāṃ saṃśayādīnāmapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6896: sāṅgepāṅge ca nyāye vyutpādye pūrvāṅgatayā prakaraṇāntarebhyaḥ saṃśayādiprakāraṇasyotkarṣaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6898: na ca prayojanamanusandhāya saṃśaya iti saṃśayasya prāthamyamevaṃlakṣaṇakrame 'pi nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6901: nanu saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ cedidam, vimarśaḥ saṃśaya ityetāvadevāstu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6905: vimarśa ityanena ca viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca sāmānyalakṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6916: saṃśayapadasannidhaśca vimarśapadaṃ vivakṣitamarthamāheti tatsahitamevoktavāniti parasparaniṣedhavadubhayavidhipradhāna ekaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6921: guṇagataṃ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6924: yatastulyārohapariṇāhāvimāviti pratyayo bhavati, tameva vyaktikāraṇamukhena darśayati---saṃkhyāparimāṇeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6927: iha vārtikakāreṇa samānadharmopapatterityādau sattāmātreṇa saṃśayāhetutayā upalabdheraśrutyā ca pūrvapakṣayitvā samādhānatrayamabhihitaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6932: tṛtīye tu sattāvacana eva lakṣaṇayopalabdhipara iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6933: tatra viśeṣāpekṣa iti padaṃ tadā sāmānyajñānamākṣipet, yadi viśeṣajñānaṃ niṣedhet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6936: yadyapi viśeṣāpekṣaśabdaḥ sākṣād viśeṣopalabdhi na niṣedhati, tathāpi lakṣaṇayā tatparaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6937: sā ca mukhye bādhakāt, vivakṣite saṃbandhāt avācakopādāne prayojanātt pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6941: yathā hi gaḍgātīrayoḥ saṃyogamantarbhāvyāvinābhāvastathā agṛhyamāṇasmaraṇabubhutsayorekaviṣayatayā saṃśayamantarākṛtvā paurvāparyaniyamenāvinābhāva eva saṃbandha ityarthaḥ,saukaryaviśeṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6943: viśeṣamapekṣata iti hi viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśaya uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6944: tathā ca viśeṣe jijñāsājanaka ityukte phalamasya darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6951: nanu kṛtakatvaṃ paricchedasya hetuḥ, na vyavacchedasyetyata āha---api
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6953: nanu tathāpi vivakṣitatajjātīyavṛttitve satyanyavṛttireva dharmaḥ samānaśabdavācya iti kuto niyama ityata āha---samāno hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6956: yadi hi samāno dharmo vyavacchedaheturiti kutaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6958: sa cet kathamasau vyavacchedahetuḥ? na copalabdhyādipadaṃ taditarasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6960: nanu tasyeti viśeṣalakṣaṇamastīti, tasmāt tasminnasatyapi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6963: pūrvaṃ hi karaṇākaraṇayorguṇadoṣau na cintitau, idānīṃ tau cintyete
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6968: tathā hi saptamo rasaḥ saṃśayajñāne dharmitayā viṣayaḥ syād, dharmatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6969: vā? na kadācilloka evaṃ sandigdhe yadayaṃ saptamo rasaḥ sthāṇurvā puruṣo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6971: nāpyevaṃ sandigdhe ayamupalabhyamānaḥ padārthaḥ saptamo vā raso daśamaṃ vā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6972: dravyamiti? saptamo rasaḥ kimasti nāsti veti sandeho bhavatyeveti cet na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6977: yathā hi tathāvidhapratyayajanyaḥ saṃskāraḥ, tathā tadudbodhyo 'pīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6982: vārttikakṛt ityata āha---aneketi na sarvatra dravyādau saṃyogajatvamato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6984: ato mukhye bādhakaṃ dṛṣṭavā jaghanyāṃ vṛttim ālambya bhāṣyakṛtā sūtraṃ vyākhyātamiti darśayanniva vārttikam avatārayati---bhāṣyakṛdvyākhyayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6986: yadi lākṣaṇikamidaṃ padaṃ kaḥ saṃbandha ityāśayavāniti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6988: vārttikārthamāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti dharmapadasāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣaśabdasya bhāvasādhanatvaṃ nivartayatītyāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti dharmapadasāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣaśabdasya bhāvasādhanatvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6992: pūrvaṃ hi vibhāgajatvādinā svāśraya eva śabdastadviparītebhyo vyāvartata ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6993: idānīṃ tu svāśrayācchabdāntara eveti na nivartyata ityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6995: tasyānekasya dharmo nivartakatayā yaḥ sa evāneka ityucyate iti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6996: nanvevaṃ sati kiṃ lakṣaṇayā yāvatā mukhya evānekaśabdo 'stu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6997: tathā hi pūrvam anekasya dharmo 'nekadharmaḥ sākṣāt samavāyādivṛttyā cet
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7001: yadi saṃbandhivacana evānekaśabdaḥ syānna dharmaśabdena samānādhikaraṇaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7002: tathā ca bahuvrīheralābhe dharmī na labhyetetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7003: evaṃ bhāṣyānugataṃ vārttikamupasaṃhṛtya svatantraṃ vārttikamutthāpya lakṣaṇānurodhena tāvad vyācaṣṭe---prakāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7011: dravyaguṇakarmabhyo na tu śabdetarebhya eva, tadvyatirekasya saṃśayaṃ pratyanupayogāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7014: tathā pyasādhāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavan tajjātīyatāyāmeva paryavasyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7015: na tu tadvyaktitāyām tajjātoyā api hi vidharmāṇo dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7016: na tu ta evetyetat sūcayitumanekavyaktiniṣṭhatā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7020: udāharaṇaparatāṃ sphuṭayitumasādhāraṇāvasare sādhāraṇamapi sadādi kimityupanyastamiti śaṅkāṃ nivārayati---dravyatvādikoṭīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7034: yadyapi vaṃśadalayorvibhāgānantaraṃ saṃyoganāśaḥ, tato dravyanāśaḥ, tato dravyanāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ svatantraṃ vā avayavamapekṣya dalayorvartamāno vibhāga ākāśādideśād vibhāgaṃ karotīti vaiśeṣikāḥ, tathāpyaprakṛtatvāt saṃyoganāśadravyanāśakramo nopanyastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7035: prakṛtasya hi karmaṇo vibhāgadvayajanakatvaṃ krameṇa vā syād, yaugapadyena vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7037: apekṣāyāṃ vā, ādyamapi vibhāgam anantarameva na kuryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7040: na dvitīyaḥ, yadā ākāśādideśād vibhāgaṃ karoti karma ta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7043: ādye vibhāge hi kartavye karmaṇo nirapekṣatvāt sa eva kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7044: dvitīye tu kartavye prathamānantarakāla eva nairapekṣyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7049: nanu bhavatvevaṃ tāvaduktavyāpteranavadhāraṇam, tathāpi yā kriyā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7051: tathātve vā yataḥ kutaścit karmaṇo yugapadubhayavibhāgopapattau calatyevāvayave sarvadravyanāśaprasaṅgaḥ, na caivam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7056: tadanurodhāt karmaṇo 'pi jātikṛtaṃ sahakārikṛtaṃ vā vailakṣaṇyamavaśyaṃ svīkartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7061: kariṣyati, ko virodhaḥ? yathānārambhakottarasaṃyogajanakatve satyeva kutaścit viśeṣādārambhakottarasaṃyogajanakatvamapi karmaṇaḥ, anyathā tatrāpyanayaiva diśā kāraṇamātrasaṃyogapūrvakāḥ kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogāḥ kalpanīyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7062: yathā ca tatra krame pramāṇaṃ nāsti tathehāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7064: yathā caitadvailakṣṇyaṃ tathā varamevamasatu yadekānārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvinamanyā tu ārambhakānārambhakapratidvandvinaṃ janayatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7065: tasmāt kāraṇamātravibhāgapūrvake kāraṇākāraṇavibhāge pramāṇaṃ nāstīti nābhyupagamyata ityetāvanmātravyaktīkaraṇaphalo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7073: yadyapi vibhāgāpekṣavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇam asādhāraṇaṃ śabde tadeva vaktumucitam, tathāpi kāraṇamātravibhāgajavibhāgamabhyupetyoktaṃ vārttikakṛteti tathaivāha---tadevamiti, etadapi vyabhicārya samarthayati---tadapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7074: yadyapyevamapi vibhāgajatvāditi heturadoṣa eva, na hi vibhāgād dravyasya janma saṃbhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7076: sa hi dravyānārambhakasamaveto 'kāraṇameva, ārambhakasamavetastu saṃyoganāśadvārā vināśaka eva, karmaṇo 'pi kāraṇaṃ vibhāgo bhavanna
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7079: yadā tu tannivṛttiruttarasaṃyogāt, tadā vibhāgasyāpīti kathamuttarakarmajanma vibhāgāt? tasmādasandigdhavyāptikaṃ vibhāgajatvaṃ śabdasya guṇatve pramāṇameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7087: samāno hi dharmaḥ pakṣe vartamānaḥ sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāmekajātīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7089: tathā ca pakṣe vartamānasya sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāṃ vijātīyatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7090: yaśca pakṣagaḥ sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāṃ vijātīyo dharmaḥ, so 'sādhāraṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7094: samānaśabdena pratiyogitayā buddhāvasamāne 'pyusthāpite saṃśayakāraṇatve ca tasya pramāṇasiddhe tasmin vaktavye yadanekapadamupādatte sūtrakārastena jānīmo nūnamayamevārtho 'nayā vacobhaṅgyā anena darśita iti yojanārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7097: pratyabhijñānaṃ tāvadvyaktiviṣayakaṃ nāstyeva gakārādāviti dvitīye vyutpādanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7098: yadāpyasti tadāpyasya viṣayaḥ kiṃ vyaktirutajātiriti viṣayataḥ sandihyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7099: yadāpi vyaktirevāsya viṣayaḥ, tadāpi pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti sandeha ityabhiprāyavān saṃmugdhamāha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7101: yadyapi gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānā iti jātimātrapadārthavādī na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7103: anyathābhidheyasyāvinābhāvapratītireva kathaṃ vyaktibhiḥ? tadabhāve ca kathaṃ lakṣaṇāpīti? kathaṃ netyādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7104: na ca vācyaṃ śabdasya tathābhāvasandehe 'pi ghaṭādau niścitatvena vyāptigraho yadi syāt ko doṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7105: sarvopasaṃhāreṇa hi vyāptiniścaye yatkṛtakaṃ tadavaśyamanityamiti kṛtakatvaṃ śabde niścayameva kuryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7107: apratihatatayā tu buddhyādau karotīti cet---na, pratipakṣasādhane vyāptisaddūṣayati satyapi sādhyasiddheravirodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7110: vyāptidoṣe tu sarvopasaṃhārābhāvāt kathaṃ tadbalena buddhyādau sādhyasiddhiriti sandigdhatattvaṃ śabdaṃ vihāya vyāptiriti cet? evaṃ tarhi śabdādanyatve sati kṛtakatvāditi vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7111: tathā ca yadi daivāt śabdo 'pyanitya eva vastutaḥ, tadā asamarthaviśeṣaṇatvāpattiriti sandigdhāsamarthaviśeṣaṇatvamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7112: tasmāt sūṣṭhūktaṃ sandigdhe nityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ gatamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddhamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7113: pratyayabhedabheditvaṃ kāraṇatīvratvāditāratamyena tīvratīvratarāditvaṃ pratyekaṃ satpratipakṣatvam ityekaikasyānvayato vyatirekato vobhayakoṭyanupanāyakatayā na saṃśayahetutvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7116: tathā ca tenaiva rūpeṇa saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7117: anunāsikatvādayo hi sāmānyaviśeṣāḥ pratyakṣā bhavantaḥ pratyakṣavyaktivṛttaya eva bhavitumarhanti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7120: kevalaṃ sa vyaktirākāśāśrayā vā, anyāśrayā veti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7122: nanu tathāpi naiyāyikānāṃ mate śabdāśrayā evānunāsikatvādayo dharmā, na ca pakṣeṇaitra vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7130: astyātmā nāstyātmetyudāharaṇaṃ tu bhāṣyakṛtaiva darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti na prapañcitaṃ vārtikaṭīkākārābhyām
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7135: etacca tṛtīye prapañcanīyamitīhopekṣitam, śabdo nitya ityeke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7140: anabhyāsadaśāpannopalabdhau hi pramāṇottarabhāvāniścaye buddhitvasāmānyopalabdheḥ satyatvāsatyatvasaṃdeha iti yadyabhimatam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7142: tatastaddvāraker'the saṃdeha iha vivakṣita iti yadi, so 'pi svarūpato deśakālataḥ prakārato vati? ādyastāvadvirodhādevāsaṃgataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7147: tṛtīye tvāha---na nāgo vā nago veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7149: etāvāṃstu viśeṣo yat sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropalabdhyanupalabdhī anutpādādevāvyavasthite
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7150: prakṛte tūdāharaṇe jātameva jalajñānamaprāmāṇyaśaṅkayā na vyavasthitamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7152: yadi viśeṣasmṛtisahitāyā ayogyānupalabdheḥ dharmiṇamanantarbhāvya saṃśayaḥ syāt sa tāvannātyantānupalabdhakoṭyullekhī, tatra smṛterabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7154: na hi bhavati paramāṇurasti naveti astyeva yataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7156: tathā ca sa upalabdhaḥ sannanvayato vyatirekato vipratipattito vā viśeṣau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7157: smārayet, na svarūpata iti pūrvānupraveśa ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7164: pūrvāṅgatvāviśeṣe 'pi saṃśaye sati prayojanānusaṃdhānāt tataḥ prayojanasyāpakarṣa ityuktamṛ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7165: prayojanamanusaṃvāya ca tatsādhanībhūtanyāyamanusandhitsato dṛṣṭāntānusaraṇamiti dṛṣṭāntādasyotkarṣa uddeśe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7169: arthapadaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa anūdyāpi na vivṛtamityata āha---sasādhanāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7172: atra ca ṭīkāyāṃ yadyapi tathāpīti tadacatuṣṭayamadhyāharanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7174: tathā ca prāmāṇikatvādeva prayojanaṃ na vaktavyamiti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7176: tacca tvayā vyutpāditamityata āha---na ca pramāṇamīdṛśamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7178: tathā ca pramāṇopapannaṃ na vācyamiti vadataḥ svacaritāvirodha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7179: kathamasaya prayuktau sādhanatvaṃ sato 'sato vā? asato 'pi svajñānadvārā vyāpārāntareṇa vā? kva ca prayojayati, svātmanyeva vā svasādhane vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7180: kathaṃ ca vyāpakaṃ svarūpeṇa, karmavidyādvārā veti parīkṣāsādhyamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7181: na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasya aṅgamupakārakam, kiṃ tu prayojanavān
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7188: gauṇaṃ prayojanaṃ mukhyasyaiva prayojanasya kṛte upādīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7191: etadeva hi mukhyasya mukhyatvam, yadananyārthatayā puruṣāpekṣitatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7196: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yadyapi na prayojanaṃ nyāyasyāṅgaṃ sādhyatvāt, tathāpi tadabhisandhānamaṅgam tadantareṇa nyāyasyāpravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7198: yathā svargasya yāgānaṅgasyāpi abhisandhānaṃ svayamaphalamapi yāgapravṛttiṃ prati kāraṇatayā saṃnidhīyamānamaṅgamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7200: anye tu, kiṃ tu mukhyamityavacchidya vyācakṣate, pradhānamuddeśyamiti yāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7202: akṣarārthastu vārttikasya ya khalu niṣprayojanā cintā prayojanābhisandhānaśūnyaḥ saṃśayo nāsau nyāyasya pravartaka iti sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ //14 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7205: saṃśaye prayojane ca sati kva punaretat sādhyasambaddhaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7208: na ca sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa viśeṣalakṣaṇāvatāra iti tatsūcakaṃ sūtraṃ tathaiva vyācaṣṭe---sādhyasādharmyāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7211: tathā cāvinābhāvaviṣayatayā aryyate yaḥ, sor'tho dṛṣṭānta iti sāmānyalakṣaṇalābhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7223: api tu vastusthita eva jñāpyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7228: evaṃ nyāyapūrvāṅgaprakaraṇaṃ samarthya parikalitasāmarthyaṃ sādhanaṃ yatropaneyaṃ sa siddhāntāparanāmā nyāyasyāśrayo 'vasaraprāptatvāducyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7231: sūtramapaṭhitvā vyākhyānaṃ tu kuta ityata āha---atreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7234: saṃsthitiritthambhāvavyavastheti bhāṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvā idamiti sāmānyābhyupagame siddhāntabhramaḥ syāt, ato vyācaṣṭe, bhāṣye ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7235: arthābhyupagamo 'bhyupagato vārthaḥ siddhāntaḥ, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ prati kāmacārāditi ca prathama sūtra evoktam, ato na granthacatuṣṭayasyāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7238: nanu yadi tantraṃ pramāṇamabhimatam, kathaṃ vyatirekamāha---yo 'tho na śāstrita ityata āha---aśāstrito 'prāmāṇika iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7239: nanvevaṃ bauddhasiddhāntā na siddhāntāḥ syuraprāmāṇikatvāt, tathā ya vyatikrame 'pi teṣāṃ nāpasiddhānto bhavedityata āha--ābhimānikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7240: etaccāgrato vārttikakāra eva tatpratyayādabhyupagama iti vadan sphuṭīkariṣyatīti //27 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7243: prābhākare niyogo vākyārthaḥ, nyāye upamānaṃ pramāṇamityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7246: tathāpyanekasambandhāpekṣayā ekamapi samānaśabdavācyaṃ bhavatītyata āha---naiyāyikānāṃ hīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7248: ekatra kutracit siddho na sarvatrasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7250: anyathā sarvatantrasiddho 'pi samānatantrasiddha eveti bhramaḥ syāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7253: evaṃ vācanikasiddhāntadvayaṃ lakṣayitvā talliṅgatvādabhiprāyasyābhiprāyikasiddhāntadvayopakrame nyāyapradhānatvādasya śāstrasya nyāyānuṣaḍgiṇaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7256: yasyārthasya sarvajñatvāderviśeṣasya siddhau kṣityādeḥ sakartṛkatvasya pratikriyamāṇasya siddhiḥ sa sarvajñatvādirviśeṣo 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7257: atha vā yasya sakartṛkatvādeḥ siddhāvantarbhūtā anye 'bhiprāyaprakāntāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7259: tadatra pakṣadvaye 'pi phalato na kaścid viśeṣa iti manvānaḥ śliṣṭaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe, sādhyasya vā hetārveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7262: yatsiddhāvityatra nimittaviṣayabhāvapratibhāsanād vyākhyātṛvipratipatteśca saptamyarthe sandehaḥ, tamapākaroti---viṣayasaptamīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7265: nanu ca pakṣo vā heturvā kaṇṭhata eva niyatatantrābhyupagamāt pratitantrasiddhāntānna bhidyata ityata āha---anena rūpeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7266: yadyapi svarūpato 'sya vācanika evābhyupagamaḥ, tathāpyanene rūpeṇabhiprāyika evetyatastato bhidyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7270: nanvetadantarbhāvamantareṇa kimupalabdhimatpūrvakatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyata ityata āha---nānyatheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7271: na hi yathā tārṇapārṇatvādisaṃdehe 'pi vahniniścayasaṃbhavaḥ, tathā paramāṇvādyadṛṣṭāntābhijñānābhijñatvasaṃdehe tatprayoktṛtvaviniścayasaṃbhavaḥ, jñānacikīrṣaikaviṣayaprayatnavattvameva hi prayoktṛtvaṃ kartṛtvamiti vocyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7272: tacca jñānaṃ dvyaṇukādyadṛṣṭaparyantapakṣīkaraṇe yadi sarvaviṣayaṃ na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7274: tasmād yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra tīralakṣaṇāmantareṇa gaṅgāpadārtho na ghoṣapadārthamanveti yathā sakartṛkapadārtho 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7278: tadevaṃ prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa samarthya dvitīye vārttikaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7284: nanu bhāṣyamata eva sūtraṃ sphuṭārthamityata āha---sūtraṃ caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7288: atra hi yathā rūpādijñānaviśeṣasādhanāni cakṣurādīnyupapadyante, tathā sukhādijñānasādhanaṃ mano 'pyupapadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7289: manaḥparihāre vā sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata ityabhihite punaḥ sūtrakāreṇa rūpādijñānaṃ cakṣurādisādhanamasatu niḥsādhanameva tu sukhādijñānamityāśaṅkya sūtritam---
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7292: yadi hyanabhimata evāyamartho 'sya, kathaṃ parīkṣyaṃ vyavasthāpayedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7293: idaṃ ca svābhimatonnayanaprakārāviṣkaraṇaṃ sūtrakṛtaḥ śiṣyahitatayetyato lakṣaṇārthamāha---so 'yamiti uktārthānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ arthasyābhyupagamo 'bhyupagamasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7297: tamimaṃ vibhāgalakṣaṇaprapañcaṃ sarva evāyaṃ pakṣa iti pūrvapakṣavārttikavivaraṇavyājena saṃkalayyāha---sarvatantretyādi // iti nyāyāśrayasiddhāntalakṣaṇaprakaraṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7300: evaṃ ca yatra nyāyalakṣaṇaṃ karaṇamupaneyam, tatprakaraṇaṃ samarthya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7301: upaneyanyāyaprakaraṇam ārabhyata iti sphuṭārthaṃ bhāṣyam---athāvayavā iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7306: sa cānuvidhayastheyagato, yathāyogaṃ vicāryavastugocarastajjñānagocaraśceti vicāramātre tu
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7313: sa cādau vipratipattyā paścāt pratijñayā gatārtha iti matvā tarkābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---yadi śabdo nityaḥ syāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7314: vyudasyate hi tena saṃśayaḥ phalataḥ svarūpataśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7316: saṃśayo hi dve koṭī parispṛśya vartamānāṃ jijñāsāmapi tathābhūtāmeva janayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7318: tadevaṃ tāvantarā vartamānastarka ekasyāṃ koṭau pramāṇabādhitaṃ kañcidarthamāharan tadgatāmicchāṃ vicchidya dvitīyakoṭau niyamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7320: enāṃ ca janayatā tarkeṇa saṃśayaphalaṃ prabalecchā tadaiva vyudasyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7324: utpatticintaivopayogitvāt tatra tatra kṛtā, kariṣyate ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7329: tena sādhyatayā svīkriyamānasyārthasya vacanaṃ pratijñeti sūtrārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7334: yathā ca neyaṃ bhrāntiḥ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7335: tadāloketi, candraśabdo 'yaṃ śaśivācakaḥ prayojyavṛddhaṃ prati asati vṛttyantare tatpratyayajanakatvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7339: evamuttaratra yastu naivaṃvidho na vācyo na lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7341: pakṣa eveti darśayitumiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ca kvacidapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7342: bhavedevaṃ yadi vidhādvayaṃ syāt, na tvetadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7348: etena vārttikakārīyo 'bhyupagamasiddhāntastāvaducita iti darśayatā chalataḥ pañcamasiddhāntāpattirdaśitā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7352: siddhāntatāmupayāyāt, na vādino kadācidapyapasiddhāntena nigraho bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7353: yatra yatra pramādike 'pyarthe śāstravirodhaścodyeta tatra tatrābhyupagamasiddhānto 'yaṃ mametyevamapi nistārāt parāvṛttya ca tenaiva niranuyojyānuyogena nigrahe kathāsamāptau tadvyutpādanaprayāsasyāpyabhāvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7358: tasmāt na hi śāstrāśrayā vādā bhavantīti svapnavilāpaḥ ityarthaḥ //33 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7360: iha pratijñārthaḥ sarvathaiva kathāsu nopayujyate, arthopalabdhyā yukto 'pyanyathaiva labdhaḥ? ādye vipratipattimapi na vibhāvayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7361: avibhāvayaṃśca tāṃ kathamiva prativadet? aprativadataśca vacanaṃ kathaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7362: kathāśarīratāmiyāt? tathā ca kathakaḥ kathaṃ nigṛhyeta, nigṛhnīyād veti na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7364: nāpi dvitīyaḥ, sa hi vivādād vā avayavāntarād vā? vivādādapi vyavahitād vā, avayavāntaraikavākyatāpannād vā? avayavāntarādapi sākṣād vā, ākṣepato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7369: vayamapi hi parābhyupetapakṣaviparītāṃ koṭimupanīya tatsiddhaye 'vayavāntaramabhidadhyāditi brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7371: nāpi tṛtīyaḥ, na hi hetvādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ pratijñārtho 'bhidhīyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7372: nāpi caturthaḥ, sa hyapekṣākāle vā, anyadā veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7376: na tu tannirṇayahetubhūtasādhanāvabodhavanato vivādaviṣayaṃ nirṇayasya nirṇeyarūpamantareṇa nirūpayitumaśakyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7380: ākṣepasyāpi kuto 'vakāśa iti? nanvapekṣitānabhidhāne 'pyapekṣitaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kathamavavadheyavacano nāmetyata āha---yathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7381: yatrāpekṣitamanyathāpi śakyasaṃpādanam, tatrāpi tadanabhidhāne viparītabuddhiḥ kimaṅgaḥ yatra vacanenaivāpekṣitasiddhirityarthaḥ anyadeti pakṣamupasthāpayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7384: yo hi yena yat sādhayitum udyataḥ sa tatsāmagrīmapratikūlayanneva tathā kartumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7386: pratipādyāpekṣāniyamānurodhena tatra tatheti cet? tadihāpi samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7387: tathā ca tatkālātikrameṇākṣepo 'pi nopayogī, śiromuṇḍanāntaraṃ nakṣatraparīkṣāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7392: tathāpi hetvabhidhānena kiṃ tatsvarūpasyopanayenaiva sākṣādabhidhānādityata āha---anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7394: na hyanityaḥ śabda ityukte kṛtakatvānityatvavyāptau vā kṛtakatvasya vā śabdadharmisaṃbandhe śroturākāṅkṣā kiṃ nāma kuta etatpratipattavyamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7396: ata eva gamakatvādetasya mārgasya sarvaśāstrakārā evamevopādadate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7397: saugato 'pi hi mānu tu dvividhaṃ meyadvaividhyāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7402: atha śāstre kimanarthakamabhidhīyate? tatrāsti vā pratijñādeḥ kiñcit
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7403: prayojanamiti? ādye, sādhu paravyutpādakatvamasya nirarthakaṃ pralapataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7404: dvitīye tu śabdoccāraṇasya nārthagaterapyadhikaṃ prayojanaṃ nāma,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7406: nanu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa na viśeṣalakṣaṇāvasara ityata āha---śrutyarthābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7409: tathā ca kathaṃ vākyāvayava ityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7410: nanvalamupalakṣaṇena yāvatā vacanameva sādhanamastu, sādhyate pratipādyate tenāpi hi svārtha ityata āha---yadi tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7413: atha sādhyapadaṃ vihāya sādhanaṃ pratipādakaṃ vacanamityarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7416: yadi tvevaṃ kriyeya liṅgapratipādanadvāreṇa sādhyasādhanaṃ niścāyakaṃ vacanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7419: evaṃ ca vyākhyāne vacanapadamasūtrasthameva ṭīkākṛtā svayamupanīyavirodhātivyāptī kutaḥ śaṅkite iti śaṅkā nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7426: tathācāyaṃ kṛtaka ityasmānna nivartate, api tu kṛtakatvādityasmādeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7427: tarhi kiṃbhūtamupanayāt pratīyata ityata āha---kiṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7431: etaduktaṃ bhavati, na hi hetuvadupanayo 'pi kuta ityākāṅkṣāyā pravartate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7433: bhavatu tāvadetat, tathāpi prakṛto vivādaviṣayaḥ kiṃ vyāptadharmaviśiṣṭo na vetyapekṣāyāṃ sā ca tathā cāyaṃ kṛtaka ityanenaiva paraṃ nivartyate, na tu kṛtakatvādityanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7434: tasmānna hetūpanayayorarthato rūpataḥ prayojanato vā saṃkara ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7435: nanu ca vacanalakṣaṇāyāṃ yadyapi jñāner'the vā na prasaṅgaḥ, tathāpi sādhyasādhanamiti kṛtakatvamatra heturityādau vacana eva prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7438: na ca kuta ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ sādhyasādhanamiti vā kṛtakatvaṃ heturiti vā vacanamaupayikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7440: tena viśeṣaparatvena heturiti lakṣyanirdeśo nānupapanna iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7442: na kvacit pradeśo sādharmyaṃ hetulakṣaṇatvena vihitam, yeneha saviśeṣaṇatayā viśeṣaṇamātropasaṃkrānto vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7443: nāpyatra viśeṣaṇaśūnyasyaiva sādharmyasyopādānam yena tāvanmātragocaro vidhirbhavet, parasparasvatantrobhayarthatve vākyabhedācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7448: nanu yadyaviśiṣṭavidhānenaiva prakṛtasiddhiḥ, kimudāharaṇagrahaṇena? na cet kimaviśiṣṭavidhānenetyata āha---sādharmyādityata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7452: viśeṣato jñātānāṃ teṣā svavākye parivarjanādimukhena bhavatvityetadarthamarthalabdhamapi kaṇṭhoktyābhidhīyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7457: udāhṛte hetau lakṣaṇaṃ yojayituṃ hetvarthe ca vivecayitavye prasaṅgāt pratijñārthaṃ vivecayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7458: tathāpi pradhvaṃsasya nānātvāt jātyāderupasaṃgrāhakasya vā bhāvāt kathaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7459: vyāptyādisiddhiḥ? upalakṣyābhedamātreṇa ca tatsiddhau kuṇḍalavatā devadattena sādhyo vyavahāro daṇḍavatāpi sādhyetetyata āha---virodhīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7460: yathā hyabhāvamātrasya bhāvapratiyogitayaivaupādhikasāmānyasaṃbandhādekavyavahārahetutvaṃ tathā tadviśeṣasyāpi pūrvāparetarerāśrayāntarabhāvapratiyogitayā tattadvyavahārāvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7464: utpadyate ghaṭa ityatra tu ghaṭo na kārakamasattvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7465: tataśca akārakasyaiva kārakairatyantasannidhestathopacāro vā kārakāṇāmeva kāryaśabdopacāro vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7466: ubhayathāpi vyāpārāveśasamaya evākhyātaprayogo na tu dhātvarthamātrāveśasamaye /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7467: na hi pakve dhātvarthamātramupādāya pacyata iti prayujyate lokaiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7471: nanu na sapakṣatābhāvo 'tra sūtre śrūyate, nāpyārtho 'vadhāraṇasya ca vyāptyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7472: pakṣe sattvenopapatteraikāntikaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ mā prasāṃkṣīt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7477: vastutastu, nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvacchīrīraṃ māṃsādimayatvāt ityasaṃkīrṇamudāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7478: etaddvayamapi nirākarta vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti pūrvāvadhāraṇena pakṣavyāptau labdhāyāṃ vaidharmyamevetyanena sādharmyarūpatā nirākṛtāvayamarthaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7479: pakṣasya vyāpako dharmastaditaravaidharmyarūpa eveti tathā cebhayorapi kaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7481: sa ca vipakṣodāharaṇeneti viśeṣayatā sapakṣābhāvapradarśanena nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7482: yadi hi sati sapakṣe anvayo vivakṣitaḥ tadā tathā vaidharmyādityanārabhyameva, pūrvalakṣaṇenaiva gatārthatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7486: udāharaṇaṃ ca sapakṣo 'pi bhavatīti kathaṃ viśeṣalābha ityāśaṅkya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7488: vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi sandehādalakṣaṇamiti bhāva iti tatra tatroktamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7491: tasmiśca sādhye sidvāsādhanaṃ vyatirekyasaṃbhavaśca svaśarīre prāṇasya prayatnapūrvakatvāvadhāraṇena svapakṣānvayasyāpi saṃbhavādityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7493: tathāpyasmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kiścityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityata āha---prāṇādikāraṇecchādikāraṇarahitamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7494: paraśarīre pakṣapraviṣṭe hetusiddhyarthaṃ vipakṣībhūte ca ghaṭādau sādhyarahite hetuvyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ tathoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7497: na ca kevalavyatirekī tāvanmātrasyānvayenaiva siddherityata āha---yaśceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7498: anvayinā hi tatkāraṇamātraṃ siddham, anena tu tadeva pṛthivyādivilakṣaṇaṃ sidhyatīti na niravakāśo vyatirekī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7503: viśeṣasmaraṇe ca saṃśayāt, anupalabdhacare ca tadabhāvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7504: dvidhā hi prakṛtavyatirekigatiḥ, kāryaṃ kāryavattā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7506: tad yathā, icchādayo dravyāṣṭakātiriktadravyāśritāḥ, tadanāśritatve sati kāryatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7507: iha tu kāryavattā darśitā nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ necchādisamavāyikāraṇībhūtadravyaviśeṣarahitamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7520: nanu yadi nāma sāmānyata icchādisamavāyikāraṇamātravyāvṛttirghaṭādau pratipannā kimāyātaṃ nairātmyasyetyata āha---nirātmakaśabdenāpīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7521: evamarthagati pariśodhya vārttikaṃ yojayitvā dvatīyaṃ pradhānīkṛtyāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7524: iśvarānumāna iva pakṣadharmatāvalenaiva vivakṣito viśeṣaḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7525: nanvanvayinā viśeṣaṃ sādhayatā kevalavyatirekiṇaḥ kiṃ khaṇḍitam, yenāyaṃ tasmin sambhavatyevodāste, khaṇḍane vā, atha tenaiva viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ sukaratvādityata āha---ṛjumārgeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7527: tasyāparivarta eva ṛjutvam, parivartastaṃ vakratetyarthaḥ pariharati---kāraṇamātrasyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7530: sa cābhiprāyeṇa vyāpyate, yatsiddhimanyareṇa śabdārthaḥ pratyetuṃ na śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7531: na ca dravyāṣṭakātiriktamapratītya teṣāṃ samavāyikāraṇameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7532: na hīcchādīn prati pṛthivyāḥ samavāyikāraṇatve teṣāṃ tadvattā abhidhīyamānā virudhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7547: tasmāt vyatireka evārthaḥ, tadvān pariśeṣo vyatirekīti suṣṭhūktam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7551: nanu yatra dravyāṣṭakātiriktadravyāśritā iti pratijñā, tatra yuktametat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7552: yatra tu nedaṃ nirātmakamiti tatra nirātmakaśabdenāpi ayamevārtha ucyata iti vadatā icchādisamavāyikāraṇavirahaniṣedha eva pratijñārthaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7560: nanu tathāpi ghaṭādibhyo nirātmakebhya icchādivyatirekaḥ kiṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7565: yadi sādhyenāsya kvacidapyanvayo nāsti, tadā viruddha evāyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7573: ajñaistu tathā na vyavahriyata ityanyadetaditi śaṅkate---na ca pakṣa eveti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7577: tatpratiṣedhaścet kathaṃ nānvayaḥ? atha tatpratiṣedhe 'pi tāvanmātramave
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7578: nānvayaḥ, evaṃ tarhi sapakṣavat pakṣe 'pi nairātmyapratiṣedhe 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7579: nātmasadbhāva iti parākṣepaṃ parihṛtya tadgranthaṃ paṭhati śarīrādiṣviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7580: vipakṣe hi sati sata eva kasyacid vyatirekaḥ pratīta iti pramāṇena pratīta iti pratipāditam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7581: tasya ca pramāṇapratītasya vyatirekasya pakṣe 'pi satyeva niṣedhaḥ pramāṇena kriyata iti yuktā niṣedhalakṣaṇā vidhisiddhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7582: sapakṣastu na kenacit pramāṇena pratīta iti na tatrānvayavyatirekatanniṣedhāḥ paramārthataḥ kenacitpramāṇena śakyate pratyetum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7587: atha sapakṣavyatirekaniṣedhasyāpi vyatirekaniṣedhamātraparyavasāyitayānvayāparyavasānāditi manyase, tadā pakṣe 'pi nairātmyaniṣedhe 'pi tāvanmātraparyavasāyitayā na sātmakatvaparyavasānamiti vārttikārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7590: na tasya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'pi tasya vyatirekadharmatayā tadabhāve
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7593: vyabhicāravadavyabhicāro 'pi taddharma eva so 'pi kathaṃ tadabhāve bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7597: nanvetāvatyeva sūtrārthe ko doṣaḥ syādityata āha---tathā satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7598: śeṣamanumānalakṣaṇa iti sapakṣe siddha ityādi vṛttipadāntaradūṣaṇaśeṣam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7601: yadāhuḥ ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca trayametadasaṃskṛtam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7602: sadṛśakṣaṇa sabhāgasantānalakṣaṇanirodhabhedena nirodhau dvau vināśau yayorapratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāviti paribhāṣā //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7605: sādhyavargaṃ prameyetyādinā sādhanavargaṃ sapakṣaḥ khaṃ ghaṭo buddhirviyadgaganamambaram //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7607: iti sapakṣavargaṃ kumbho viyat taḍidvyomnī ghaṭaḥ kumbhastaḍiddhaṭau /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7610: tatra prapañcaṃ vihāya yāvanmātreṇa heturnirdhāryate tāvadupanyasyati---atreti //35 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7613: prayoge kiṃ sautra eva kramo grāhyaḥ, kramāntaraṃ veti sandehamudāharaṇasya prayojanaṃ darśayan nivārayati---hetāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7614: yato nāvyāpto nāpratītavyāptiko hetubhāve vyavatiṣṭhate sādhyasiddhāvekāgrībhavati, ato vyāpterbubhūtsitatvāt saiva pratipādayituṃ yujyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7617: na tūpanīya paścāt sāmarthyaṃ jijñāsanta iti sarvalokasiddhamiti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7618: tathāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgau vinā nāvasaro viśeṣalakṣaṇasyetyata āha---sūtramitīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7619: nanūdāharaṇopalakṣaṇamaprakṛtamapi kasmādupādīyate? kasmācca vibhyatā lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtamapahīyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7627: tena hi samānajātīyād vipakṣodāharaṇād vijātīyācca pratijñāderidaṃ vyavacchidyata iti boddhavyam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7630: tena tādṛśena dṛṣṭāntena sādhanadharmaprayuktasādhyadharmavatā upalakṣitaṃ viṣayatayā tadviṣayaṃ vacanamudāharaṇaṃ sapakṣodāharaṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7631: yasmādityādivārttikaṃ yadyapi ke 'pi nānumanyante, tathāpi vākyaśeṣabhūtenāpyanena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ tadantarbhāvyaiva śaṅkāmutthāpayati---yasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7632: iyaṃ cāśaṅkā tairāgāmivāvārttikaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhyenaivetyavadhāraṇākṣepiketi buddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7638: sādhyenaiva sādharmyamiti viśeṣyasaṃgata evakāro 'nyayogaṃ vyavacchinatti, na tu sādharmyasyāprayojakatvamapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7640: na ca pakṣo 'pi vipakṣa iti tatra tatra darśitameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7641: sādharmyamevetyayamapi viśeṣaṇasaṃgata evakāro 'yogaṃ vyavacchindyāt, na tu tasyāprayojakatvamapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7644: evaṃ ca sati prathamamavadhāraṇaṃ mandaprayojanamapi paraśucchedyatāṃ ko vā nakhacchedye sahiṣyata iti nyāyena darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7651: evamarthadvārakamudāharaṇābhāsacatuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā śabdadvārakaṃ dvayaṃ darśayituṃ pīṭhamāracayati---pañcamīti tadviparyayādvā viparītam //37 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7655: yadyapyataddharmabhāvitvāt sādhyavaidharmyavān dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti vyatyayo yujyate, tathāpyārjavānurodhād yathāśruti vyācaṣṭe---sātmakatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7656: ata eva padāni vibhajya saṃkalitamarthamāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7658: arthadvārakamābhāsacatuṣṭayaṃ vyudastam, yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7659: yat punarna nityaṃ tadaśrāvaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathākāśam, yathā dhvaniḥ, yathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7664: yat punaricchādimanna bhavati, tannirātmakaṃ thā ghaṭa iti ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7667: na kevalaṃ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam, api tu tadviparyayād viparītaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7677: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ kevalavyatirekiṇi sāmānyato 'nvayavyatirekiṇi tu viśeṣato 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7678: yathā ca kevalavyatirekī satyapi sāmānyānvaye na tenopasaṃhartuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7687: satyam, sidhyatyanvayo na tu sapakṣe, kiṃ tu pakṣa eveti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7689: nanvanvayavyatirekiṇo 'pi pakṣādeva vyatirekapratyayo mā bhūdityetadarthaṃ vipakṣe niyamo darśayitumucitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7692: tathā ca na kevalānvayīti cet---na, aviśeṣavidhitvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7693: yatra hi sapakṣataditarau staḥ, tatra viśeṣavidhau śeṣaniṣedho gamyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7695: anitya eva kṛtakatvamityukte arthād gamyate na nitya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7696: na cābhidheyānabhidheyakoṭidvayasaṃbhavo, yato 'bhidheya eva prameyatvamityukte gamyatāṃ nānabhidheya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7699: nanvadhikapunaruktabhiyā mā bhūt samuccayo, vikalpastu bhavedityata āha---ṛjumārgeṇeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7702: tathā cānvayaṃ pratītya tanniṣedho vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7703: upalabhya ca tanniṣedhaṃ sa evānvayaḥ? so 'yaṃ prāk yadi pakṣa eva pratipannaḥ kimadhikaṃ vyatirekeṇa sādhitam? sapakṣe cet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7704: sa eva pakṣe kiṃ nopasaṃhṛtaḥ? na hyayamasādhako, nāpi prathamaṃ buddhāvupanipatito, nāpi na ṛjuriti, sapakṣāddhi kṛkāṭikābhaṅgena vipakṣagamanam, vipakṣācca tathaiva pakṣāgamanamiti vakro mārgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7707: na hi ghaṭamānayeti vaktavye 'naghaṭaṃ na mānaiṣīriti vaktāro bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7708: yathā svayamanvayamapratītya vyatirekāpratipattiḥ, tathā tamapratipādya tadabhāvapratipādanamaśakyamityavaśyamanvayoktau tadevādhikaṃ punaruktaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7711: evamudāharaṇayorviśeṣavyavasthāṃ darśayatā vāśabdasya vyavasthitavibhāṣāvacanatve 'pi saṅgatirityapi darśitam //37 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7721: te ca yathā svasyotpadyete tathā parasyāpyutpādanīye,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7723: svayaṃ ca vyāptijñānādindriyādisahāyāt pakṣadharmatāvagamo na tu viparyayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7724: tataḥ parasyāpyudāharaṇavacanena vyāptijñānumutpādya tatsahacaritenopanayavacanena pakṣadharmatāpratyaya utpādanīyaḥ, kevalasya vyāptismaraṇasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7727: tasmādarthasiddhaḥ paurvāparyaniyama udāharaṇopanayayorityartha iti antataḥ phakvikā yojyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7738: yadyapi pāñcarūpyopapannaliṅgānusandhānaṃ vyutpannasyāpi pratipattisādhanaṃ niyatameva, tathāpi pratisandhānaṃ pratyaniyamaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7741: yāvatā yādṛśā vopāyena svayamarthaḥ pratītaḥ, tāvattādṛgupāyapratipādanena para pratipādyaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7744: nanu vacanena svabodhasaṃkrāntiḥ pratipādanam, sacārthaḥ pratipādyaḥ svaśabdena yaḥ śabdāntareṇākṣipto 'pi na /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7746: etāvadatra syādupanayārthaṃ vyutpannaḥ svayaṃ vā ūheta, hetuvacanād vā pratipadyeta, tadākṣepato vā niścinuyāt? ādyo vyutpannetyādinā dūṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7749: athaivaṃ manvīthā yadyapi kṛtakatvāditi sādhanaparaṃ vacanam tathāpi dvidhā hi tatparatā śabdānām, upapannatayā upapādanīyatayā ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7751: tannāntarīyakamarthamākṣipati, yathā jitaṃ nakuleneti siddhāvasthāyāṃ sarpaparājayam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7752: dvitīyastu upapādanīyatayā svārthaṃ pratipādayannapi kathaṃ tannāntarīyakamapyarthamākṣipet, yathā sa eva nakulavijayaḥ sādhanīyāvasthāyām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7753: tathātve vā pratijñaiva sarvamākṣipediti gataṃ hetunāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7754: tasmāt sādhanatvenoddiṣṭe 'pi kṛtakatve tādrūpyasyāsiddhatvāt na tena vyāpterākṣepa iti nānarthakam udāharaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7758: nanu yathā hetvanurodhena tadupasaṃhāra upanaye dvividhaḥ, tathā sādhyānurodhena tadupasaṃhāro 'pi dvividha eva prāptaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7759: avaśyaṃ ca sādhyena dvividhenaiva bhāvyam, sādhanānurodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7760: na hyanvitād vyatirekaḥ sākṣāt sidhyati, vyatiriktād vānvayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7762: tasmāt pratijñānigamanayorapi dvaividhyaṃ prāptamiti kuto nābhihitaṃ iti sūtrakṛtā pratijñālakṣaṇe śaṅkitumucitamapi granthalaghimne sukhapratipattaye vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7765: hetvādīnāmavayavānāṃ yeṣāṃ yatsaṃbandhi nigamanaṃ tasya samānamekaṃ lakṣaṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7766: na hi vidhiniṣedhayoḥ pratijñātayorniṣedhavidhyupasaṃhāre pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ lagati, yenātiprasaṅgabhiyā sūtrakṛt tanniyamayedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7768: na hyanvayivyatirekiṇorhetvoḥ vyatiriktanvitapratijñāne sādhyanirdeśa itilakṣaṇaṃ lagati, tayostadasādhyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7770: ata eva tatra vārttikam---anityaḥ śabdo, nedaṃ nirātmakamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7771: tat kiṃ kṛtakatvādityādika eva hetūpadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ? netyāha---tasmāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7772: na ca vācyaṃ tathaiva kiṃ na syāt, anupasaṃhāratvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7775: upasaṃhārasyaiṣa ca guṇo yad viparītakalpanāvilopanaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7777: evaṃ ca satyavaśyakartavyatayā tasmāditi kṛte kṛtakatvāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7778: mandaprayojanam, vivaraṇamātratayā tu bhāṣyakāreṇoktam, ye tu nipuṇaṃmanyāḥ sarvanāmnā hetuvat pratijñābhidhānamapi manyante, teṣāṃ tathāśabdaḥ svarūpavacano vā syāt, prakāravacano vā? ādye tasmāt sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7782: tathāpi na tenaiva tādṛśatvam, anyasādṛśyaparāmarśe tu na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7784: atha yathoktaḥ tathetyarthaḥ, tathāpi kathaṃ tatheti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7788: omiti cet? tatra vakṣyāma ityāśayavānāha---anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyāḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7796: na brūmaḥ siddhasya nirdeśo nigamanamapi tu siddhatayā nirdeśa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7797: tathaiva tataḥ pāñcarūpyapratīteḥ na hyupapādanīyatayā nirdeśaḥ sādhanasya rūpāntarasampadamākṣeptumapyalamityuktam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7798: tadetadabuddhā yastu manyate ityādi taṃ pratyabhyupetyeti //39 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7802: evaṃ nyāyasvarūpaprakaraṇaṃ samarthya taduttarāṅgaprakaraṇasyāvakāśaḥ tatrāpītikartavyatāyatnatvāt phalasyeti tarko 'vasaraprāpta iti saṃgatibhāṣyamavatārya pūraṇena tadarthamāha---uddeśeti abhyanujñātavyo niyatajijñāsāviṣayīkartavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7808: sa cāpāditasandehe sandehāpanne ca pravartata iti jñāpanārthamavijñātatattva ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7811: evaṃvyāpāraścohaḥ prasaṅga ityeveti tathaiva ṭīkākṛtā uktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7812: sa cāhāryahetorutpadyata iti jñāpanārthaṃ kāraṇopapattita iti padaṃ tadarthatayāpi kvacid vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7815: phalaṃ pramāṇaparatantrasya sataḥ phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgamiti nyāyena tattvanirṇayaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7820: ata eva vivaraṇakārāṇāṃ saṃkulānīva vacāṃsīti tadatra nipuṇena pratipattrā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7821: tathā hi vyāpāravyāpāriṇoraniṣṭāpattyetyādinā bhedaṃ vyutpādyābhedaṃ vivakṣannāha---tayā pramāṇasyopapatyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7824: prapañcitaṃ caitat prathama sūtra eva ṭīkākṛtā iti kṛtaṃ prapañceneti //40
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7826: evaṃ sādhanasampattau darśitāyāṃ so 'yaṃ parikarabandhaḥ kimavadhikaḥ kiṃparaśceti jijñāsāyāṃ nirṇayo 'vasaraprāptaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7827: tatrārthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti vaktavye tarkaikaviṣayatāpratipādanaṃ bhāṣyakṛtaḥ kvopayujyata ityata āha---naitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7830: yadyapi vādagatau lakṣaṇīyāviti prakṛtānupayogi, tathāpi yadiha sādhanopālambhaśabdau vivṛṇeti, vāde ca pakṣapratipakṣaśabdau vivariṣyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7835: nanu nāyaṃ kathānirṇayo lakṣyate, tatkuto vādiprativādyupakrabheṇa codyamityata āha--atreti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7837: atha kathānirṇayalakṣaṇamevedaṃ kiṃ na syāt? yena codyaparihārāvapi saṃgatau syātāmityata āha---na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7840: ayamarthaḥ, yadyapi parīkṣāyāṃ na vādiprativādinau staḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7843: catuṣpādavyavahārapradarśanāt phalato na kaścid viśeṣaḥ, ekavaktṛkatve 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7845: tasmād yadyapyanipuṇaścodakastathāpi codyaṃ sāvakāśameveti yathāśrutameva abhyupetya pariharatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7846: nanu kathaṃ śāstre saṃśayānapekṣo nirṇayo mīmāṃsāyā vaiyarthyaprasaṅgādityata āha---nahīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7848: tatra ca saṃśayo na pratiṣidhyate, tannirṇayasya parīkṣāsādhyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7849: tadarthanirṇaye tu śāstreṇa kartavye kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ? śāstrārthasya sarvathānupalabdhacaratayā saṃśayānāspadatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7850: atha kathānirṇaye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ na syāt? kathamanyathā caturthe bhāṣyakṛd
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7851: eva vādasya saṃśayavyudāsaṃ phalaṃ vakṣyatītyata āha---niścitayoreveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7852: vādāt pūrvaṃ sandigdhāvapi pravṛttikāle niścitāvevābhimānāt, nānyathā tayoḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7853: nanu bhāṣyakāreṇa codyopasaṃhāre yo 'vatiṣṭhate tena nirṇaya iti vadatā tābhyāmiti tṛtīyā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7854: sā ca pakṣācca pratipakṣācceti vadatā vārttikakṛtā avadhīritā kayā śaṅkayetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7857: nirṇayaḥ? na caitat saṃbhavatītyata āha śāstre tu nirṇaya eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7860: yat taduktaṃ vārttike sphuṭībhaviṣyatīti, tadāha---arthagrahaṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7861: nanu catuḥpañcādikakṣāpi kvacit kathā bhavati, tat kathaṃ kakṣātraye
